#russia2 decisions
SOV_russia_reworked_load_decision_category_russia2 = {

	SOV_russia_reworked_load_decision_russia2 = {
		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			always = no
		}
	}
}

SOV_great_purge_decisions = {

	SOV_move_on_from_purges = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_speech

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_idea = SOV_Remnants_purge
		}

		available = {
			has_idea = SOV_Remnants_purge
			surrender_progress > 0.25
		}

		custom_cost_trigger = {
            has_army_experience > 49
			has_political_power > 74
        }

        custom_cost_text = SOV_reform_purge_major_cost_tt

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10000
		}

		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				add_political_power = -75
				army_experience = -50
			}
			add_stability = 0.05
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = SOV_move_on_from_purges
				cost_reduction = 0.25
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			remove_ideas = SOV_Remnants_purge
		}
	}

	SOV_reform_military_staff = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_speech

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
			has_country_flag = sov_purge_over
			OR = {
				check_variable = {
					var = party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = send_volunteer_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
			has_completed_focus = SOV_reign_of_terror
		}

		custom_cost_trigger = {
            has_army_experience > 24
			has_political_power > 49
        }

        custom_cost_text = SOV_reform_purge_no_major_cost_tt

		days_remove = 70

		days_re_enable = 1

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10000
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = SOV_reform_military_staff
				cost_reduction = 0.1
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				army_experience = -25
				add_political_power = -50
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge_temp = party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge_temp = 0.025 }
			set_temp_variable = { send_volunteer_factor_great_purge_temp = send_volunteer_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { send_volunteer_factor_great_purge_temp = 0.05 }
			set_temp_variable = { political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge_temp = political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge_temp = -0.05 }

			add_to_variable = { party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge = 0.025 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge
				min = var:party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge_max
				max = 0
			}
			add_to_variable = { send_volunteer_factor_great_purge = 0.05 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = send_volunteer_factor_great_purge
				min = var:send_volunteer_factor_great_purge_max
				max = 0
			}
			add_to_variable = { political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge = -0.05 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge
				min = 0
				max = var:political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge_max
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						check_variable = {
							var = party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = send_volunteer_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_org_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_attack_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_defence_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = training_time_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_reform_military_staff_tt
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_reform_purge_remove_purge_idea_tt
				hidden_effect = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
						}
						remove_ideas = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_engage_new_officer = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_army_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
			has_country_flag = sov_purge_over
			OR = {
				check_variable = {
					var = experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = army_org_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
			has_completed_focus = SOV_train_new_officers
		}

		custom_cost_trigger = {
            has_army_experience > 24
			has_political_power > 49
        }

        custom_cost_text = SOV_reform_purge_no_major_cost_tt

		days_remove = 70

		days_re_enable = 1

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10000
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = SOV_engage_new_officer
				cost_reduction = 0.1
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				army_experience = -25
				add_political_power = -50
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge_temp = experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge_temp = 0.05 }
			set_temp_variable = { army_org_factor_great_purge_temp = army_org_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { army_org_factor_great_purge_temp = 0.05 }

			add_to_variable = { experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge = 0.05 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge
				min = var:experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge_max
				max = 0
			}
			add_to_variable = { army_org_factor_great_purge = 0.05 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = army_org_factor_great_purge
				min = var:army_org_factor_great_purge_max
				max = 0
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						check_variable = {
							var = experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_org_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = send_volunteer_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_attack_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_defence_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = training_time_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_engage_new_officer_tt
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_reform_purge_remove_purge_idea_tt
				hidden_effect = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
						}
						remove_ideas = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_review_military_tactics = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_draw_up_staff_plans

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
			has_country_flag = sov_purge_over
			OR = {
				check_variable = {
					var = army_attack_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = army_defence_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = training_time_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
			has_completed_focus = SOV_new_russia_military
		}

		custom_cost_trigger = {
            has_army_experience > 24
			has_political_power > 49
        }

        custom_cost_text = SOV_reform_purge_no_major_cost_tt

		days_remove = 70

		days_re_enable = 1

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10000
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = SOV_review_military_tactics
				cost_reduction = 0.1
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				army_experience = -25
				add_political_power = -50
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { army_attack_factor_great_purge_temp = army_attack_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { army_attack_factor_great_purge_temp = 0.05 }
			set_temp_variable = { army_defence_factor_great_purge_temp = army_defence_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { army_defence_factor_great_purge_temp = 0.05 }
			set_temp_variable = { training_time_factor_great_purge_temp = training_time_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { training_time_factor_great_purge_temp = -0.025 }

			add_to_variable = { army_attack_factor_great_purge = 0.05 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = army_attack_factor_great_purge
				min = var:army_attack_factor_great_purge_max
				max = 0
			}
			add_to_variable = { army_defence_factor_great_purge = 0.05 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = army_defence_factor_great_purge
				min = var:army_defence_factor_great_purge_max
				max = 0
			}
			add_to_variable = { training_time_factor_great_purge = -0.025 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = training_time_factor_great_purge
				min = 0
				max = var:training_time_factor_great_purge_max
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						check_variable = {
							var = army_attack_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_defence_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = training_time_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_org_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = send_volunteer_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_review_military_tactics_tt
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_reform_purge_remove_purge_idea_tt
				hidden_effect = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
						}
						remove_ideas = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_emergency_training_reservist = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_military

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
			has_country_flag = sov_purge_over
			OR = {
				check_variable = {
					var = party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = send_volunteer_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
			any_country = {
				is_major = yes
				has_war_with = SOV
			}
		}

		custom_cost_trigger = {
            has_army_experience > 49
			has_political_power > 74
        }

        custom_cost_text = SOV_reform_purge_major_cost_tt

		days_remove = 35

		days_re_enable = 1

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10000
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = SOV_emergency_training_reservist
				cost_reduction = 0.25
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				army_experience = -50
				add_political_power = -75
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge_temp = party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge_temp = 0.05 }
			set_temp_variable = { send_volunteer_factor_great_purge_temp = send_volunteer_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { send_volunteer_factor_great_purge_temp = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge_temp = political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge_temp = -0.1 }

			add_to_variable = { party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge = 0.05 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge
				min = var:party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge_max
				max = 0
			}
			add_to_variable = { send_volunteer_factor_great_purge = 0.1 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = send_volunteer_factor_great_purge
				min = var:send_volunteer_factor_great_purge_max
				max = 0
			}
			add_to_variable = { political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge = -0.1 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge
				min = 0
				max = var:political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge_max
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						check_variable = {
							var = party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = send_volunteer_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_org_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_attack_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_defence_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = training_time_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_emergency_training_reservist_tt
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_reform_purge_remove_purge_idea_tt
				hidden_effect = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
						}
						remove_ideas = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_abolish_temporarily_political_commisars = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_arrest

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
			has_country_flag = sov_purge_over
			OR = {
				check_variable = {
					var = experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = army_org_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
			any_country = {
				is_major = yes
				has_war_with = SOV
			}
		}

		custom_cost_trigger = {
            has_army_experience > 49
			has_political_power > 74
        }

        custom_cost_text = SOV_reform_purge_major_cost_tt

		days_remove = 35

		days_re_enable = 1

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10000
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = SOV_abolish_temporarily_political_commisars
				cost_reduction = 0.25
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				army_experience = -50
				add_political_power = -75
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge_temp = experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge_temp = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { army_org_factor_great_purge_temp = army_org_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { army_org_factor_great_purge_temp = 0.1 }

			add_to_variable = { experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge = 0.1 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge
				min = var:experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge_max
				max = 0
			}
			add_to_variable = { army_org_factor_great_purge = 0.1 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = army_org_factor_great_purge
				min = var:army_org_factor_great_purge_max
				max = 0
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						check_variable = {
							var = experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_org_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = send_volunteer_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_attack_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_defence_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = training_time_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_abolish_temporarily_political_commisars_tt
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_reform_purge_remove_purge_idea_tt
				hidden_effect = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
						}
						remove_ideas = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_restore_military_rank_decoration = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_propaganda_campaigns

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
			has_country_flag = sov_purge_over
			OR = {
				check_variable = {
					var = army_attack_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = army_defence_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = training_time_factor_great_purge
					value = 0
					compare = less_than
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
			any_country = {
				is_major = yes
				has_war_with = SOV
			}
		}

		custom_cost_trigger = {
            has_army_experience > 49
			has_political_power > 74
        }

        custom_cost_text = SOV_reform_purge_major_cost_tt

		days_remove = 35

		days_re_enable = 1

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10000
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = SOV_restore_military_rank_decoration
				cost_reduction = 0.25
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				army_experience = -50
				add_political_power = -75
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { army_attack_factor_great_purge_temp = army_attack_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { army_attack_factor_great_purge_temp = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { army_defence_factor_great_purge_temp = army_defence_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { army_defence_factor_great_purge_temp = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { training_time_factor_great_purge_temp = training_time_factor_great_purge }
			add_to_temp_variable = { training_time_factor_great_purge_temp = -0.05 }

			add_to_variable = { army_attack_factor_great_purge = 0.1 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = army_attack_factor_great_purge
				min = var:army_attack_factor_great_purge_max
				max = 0
			}
			add_to_variable = { army_defence_factor_great_purge = 0.1 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = army_defence_factor_great_purge
				min = var:army_defence_factor_great_purge_max
				max = 0
			}
			add_to_variable = { training_time_factor_great_purge = -0.05 }
			clamp_variable = {
				var = training_time_factor_great_purge
				min = 0
				max = var:training_time_factor_great_purge_max
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						check_variable = {
							var = army_attack_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_defence_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = training_time_factor_great_purge_temp
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = experience_gain_army_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = army_org_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = party_popularity_stability_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = send_volunteer_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
						check_variable = {
							var = political_advisor_cost_factor_great_purge
							value = 0
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_restore_military_rank_decoration_tt
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_reform_purge_remove_purge_idea_tt
				hidden_effect = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
						}
						remove_ideas = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_search_trotsky_in_from = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_nationalism

		state_target = yes

		target_array = SOV.sov_trotsky_hiding_states

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = FROM.Capital
			}
		}

		visible = {
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = sov_leon_trotsky_dead
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_civil_war = no
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					character = SOV_Leon_trotsky
					ruling_only = yes
				}
				has_country_flag = sov_purge_ongoing
				has_country_flag = sov_searching_for_trotsky
				has_global_flag = sov_leon_trotsky_dead
			}
		}

		cost = 150

		days_remove = 200

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_idea = SOV_Great_purge_idea_russia2
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_search_trotsky_in_from_tt
			set_country_flag = sov_searching_for_trotsky
		}

		remove_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_search_trotsky_in_from_tt2
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						FROM = {
							state = var:sov.sov_leon_trotsky_hiding_state
						}
					}
					country_event = russia2_russia.650
				}
				else = {
					random_list = {
						50 = {
							country_event = russia2_russia.648
						}
						50 = {
							country_event = russia2_russia.649
						}
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = sov_searching_for_trotsky
			}
		}
	}
}

				tooltip = move_capital_is_not_195
				any_state = {
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
					is_capital = yes
					NOT = {
						state = 195
					}
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 25

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_war = yes
				surrender_progress > 0.25

					has_war_with = FIN
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia2_russia.236 }
		}
	}

SOV_europe_expansion = {

    SOV_join_the_war_against_poland = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_tank

     	available = {
			date > 1939.09.17
			has_idea = SOV_molotov_ribbentrop_pact
			POL = {
				exists = yes
				has_war_with = GER
				NOT = {
					has_capitulated = yes
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					is_subject_of = ROOT
					has_capitulated = yes
				}
			}
			poland_controls_eastern_poland_trigger = yes
			if = {
				limit = {
					ROOT = {
						is_ai = yes
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					any_country = {
						NOT = {
							tag = POL
						}
						is_major = yes
						is_faction_leader = yes
						is_in_faction_with = POL
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				is_neighbor_of = POL
				any_country = {
					OR = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
					is_neighbor_of = POL
				}
			}
     	}

		visible = {
			POL = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			tag = SOV
			has_completed_focus = SOV_russian_expansion
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				tag = POL
			}
		}

     	fire_only_once = yes

     	cost = 50

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 2000
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					any_other_country = {
						is_major = yes
						OR = {
							is_in_faction_with = POL
							has_guaranteed = POL
						}
					}
					POL = {
						has_idea = anti_soviet_pact
					}
				}
			}
		}

     	complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = sov_russian_expansion_war_poland
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					has_guaranteed = POL
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = POL
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				declare_war_on = {
					target = POL
					type = take_state_focus
					generator = { 89 91 93 94 95 96 784 }
				}
			}
		}
	}

    SOV_demand_poland = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

     	available = {
     	    has_army_manpower = {
    			size > 1500000
    		}
			NOT = {
				has_idea = SOV_molotov_ribbentrop_pact
			}
			poland_controls_eastern_poland_trigger = yes
			POL = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
					is_subject_of = ROOT
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			OR = {
				AND = {
					ROOT = {
						is_neighbor_of = POL
					}
					is_neighbor_of_poland_eastern_state_trigger_root = yes
				}
				any_country = {
					OR = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
					is_neighbor_of = POL
					is_neighbor_of_poland_eastern_state_trigger_puppet = yes
				}
			}
     	}

		visible = {
			POL = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			tag = SOV
			has_completed_focus = SOV_russian_expansion
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				tag = POL
			}
		}

     	fire_only_once = yes

     	cost = 100

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 2000
			modifier = {
				GER = {
					has_war_with = POL
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}

     	complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = sov_russian_expansion_ultimatum_poland
			if = {
				limit = {
					POL = {
						is_subject = yes
					}
				}
				POL = {
					OVERLORD = {
						country_event = { hours = 6 id = russia2_poland.1 }
						custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_demand_poland_tt
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				POL = {
					country_event = { hours = 6 id = russia2_poland.1 }
				}
			}
		}
    }

    SOV_demand_bessarabia = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

     	available = {
     	    has_army_manpower = {
    			size > 1000000
    		}
			78 = {
				OWNER = {
					has_full_control_of_state = 78
					NOT = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
						is_subject_of = ROOT
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					}
					is_neighbor_of = ROOT
				}
				any_neighbor_state = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
				}
			}
     	}

		visible = {
			NOT = {
				owns_state = 78
			}
		}

     	fire_only_once = yes

     	cost = 50

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1000
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			tag = SOV
			has_completed_focus = SOV_russian_expansion
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				owns_state = 78
			}
		}

     	complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = sov_russian_expansion_ultimatum_bessarabia
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_country = {
						is_subject = yes
						owns_state = 78
					}
				}
				78 = {
					OWNER = {
						OVERLORD = {
							country_event = { hours = 6 id = russia2_romania.1 }
							custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_demand_bessarabia_tt
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						owns_state = 78
					}
					country_event = { hours = 6 id = russia2_romania.1 }
				}
			}
		}
    }

    SOV_demand_estonia = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

     	available = {
     	    has_army_manpower = {
    			size > 1000000
    		}
    		EST = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
					is_subject_of = ROOT
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			OR = {

					OR = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT

					}
					is_neighbor_of = EST
				}
			}
     	}

		visible = {
			EST = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			tag = SOV
			has_completed_focus = SOV_russian_expansion
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				tag = EST
			}
		}

     	fire_only_once = yes

     	cost = 50

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1000
		}

     	complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = sov_russian_expansion_ultimatum_estonia
			if = {
				limit = {
					EST = {
						is_subject = yes
					}
				}
				EST = {
					OVERLORD = {
						country_event = { hours = 6 id = russia2_baltic.1 }
						custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_demand_estonia_tt
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				EST = {
					country_event = { hours = 6 id = russia2_baltic.1 }
				}
			}
		}
    }

    SOV_demand_latvia = {

     	available = {

SOV_integrate_the_baltics = {

	SOV_integrate_lithuania = {

		available = {
			LIT = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
			date > 1940.05.15
		}

		visible = {
			LIT = {
				is_subject_of = ROOT
				is_ai = yes
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			tag = SOV
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				tag = LIT
				is_subject_of = ROOT
			}
		}

		}

			}
		}

			FROM = {
				OR = {
					state = 191

				}
				is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
			}
		}

		visible = {
			owns_state = FROM
			NOT = {
				has_government = fascism

			add_state_core = FROM

SOV_unhappy_peasants = {

	SOV_peasants_rebelion = {

		icon = generic_civil_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		    	tooltip = SOV_peasants_rebelion_tt
				NOT = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants1
					has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants2
					has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants3
					has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants4
					has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants5
					has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants6
				}
			}
		}

		activation = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants1
				has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants2
				has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants3
				has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants4
				has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants5
				has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants6
			}
		}

		visible = {

		}

		is_good = no

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_mission_timeout = 2920

		cancel_trigger = {
			hidden_trigger = {
				has_idea = SOV_Happy_peasants
			}
		}

		timeout_effect = {
            country_event = russia2_russia.18
        }

		complete_effect = {
			add_manpower = 100000
		}
	}

	SOV_peasants_propaganda = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_propaganda_campaigns

        cost = 50

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 300
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_subject = no
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = SOV_terrible_fate
					focus_progress = {
						focus = SOV_terrible_fate
						progress > 0.01
					}
					AND = {
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = RUS_AI_VLADIMIR_KIRILLOVICH_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR
							has_country_flag = RUS_AI_ANASTASIA_NIKOLAEVNA_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR
							has_country_flag = RUS_AI_ANDREY_VLASOV_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR
							has_country_flag = RUS_AI_PAVEL_BERMONDT_AVALOV_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR
							has_country_flag = RUS_AI_KONSTANTIN_RODZAEVSKY_FASCIST_BEHAVIOR
							has_country_flag = RUS_AI_ANASTASY_VONSYATSKY_FASCIST_BEHAVIOR
						}
						date < 1936.05.01
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_completed_focus = SOV_right_to_believe
					has_completed_focus = SOV_second_civil_war
				}
			}
		}

        fire_only_once = yes

        visible = {
			has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants1
        }

        available = {
        	has_completed_focus = SOV_start_five_year_plan
        	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
	        	tooltip = SOV_unhappy_peasants_tt
	            has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants1
            }
        }

        complete_effect = {
	        swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants1
				add_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants2
			}
        }
    }

    SOV_peasants_compensations = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_attract_foreign_investors

        cost = 100

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 300
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_subject = no
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = SOV_terrible_fate
					focus_progress = {
						focus = SOV_terrible_fate
						progress > 0.01
					}
					AND = {
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = RUS_AI_VLADIMIR_KIRILLOVICH_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR
							has_country_flag = RUS_AI_ANASTASIA_NIKOLAEVNA_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR
							has_country_flag = RUS_AI_ANDREY_VLASOV_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR

							has_country_flag = RUS_AI_ANASTASY_VONSYATSKY_FASCIST_BEHAVIOR

					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_completed_focus = SOV_right_to_believe

				}
			}
		}

        fire_only_once = yes

				has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants1
				has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants2
			}
        }

				remove_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants2

			}

							has_country_flag = RUS_AI_ANDREY_VLASOV_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR
							has_country_flag = RUS_AI_PAVEL_BERMONDT_AVALOV_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR
							has_country_flag = RUS_AI_KONSTANTIN_RODZAEVSKY_FASCIST_BEHAVIOR
							has_country_flag = RUS_AI_ANASTASY_VONSYATSKY_FASCIST_BEHAVIOR
						}
						date < 1936.05.01
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_completed_focus = SOV_right_to_believe
					has_completed_focus = SOV_second_civil_war
				}
			}
		}

        fire_only_once = yes

        visible = {
        	OR = {
				has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants1
				has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants2
				has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants3
				has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants4
			}
        }

        available = {
        	has_completed_focus = SOV_improve_siberias_railways
            custom_trigger_tooltip = {
	        	tooltip = SOV_peasants_recruiting_tt
	            has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants4
            }
        }

        complete_effect = {
	        swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants4
				add_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants5
			}
        }
    }

    SOV_peasants_demands = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

        cost = 150

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 300
			modifier = {

				is_subject = no
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = SOV_terrible_fate
					focus_progress = {
						focus = SOV_terrible_fate
						progress > 0.01
					}
					AND = {
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = RUS_AI_VLADIMIR_KIRILLOVICH_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR

	            has_idea = SOV_Unhappy_peasants6
            }
        }

			add_ideas = SOV_Happy_peasants
        }
    }

		}

		}
	}

SOV_chinese_war = {

	SOV_send_guns_nationalist = {
		icon = GFX_decision_generic_prepare_civil_war
		cost = 25
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 70
		}
		fire_only_once = yes
		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_weapons_china
			event_target:WTT_current_china_leader = {
				has_war_with = JAP
			}
		}
		available = {
			has_equipment = {
				infantry_equipment > 3999
			}
		}
		complete_effect = {
			send_equipment = {
				equipment = infantry_equipment
				amount = 4000
				target = event_target:WTT_current_china_leader
			}
			army_experience = 25
		}
	}

	SOV_send_planes_nationalist = {
		icon = GFX_decision_generic_air
		cost = 25
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 70
		}
		fire_only_once = yes
		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_weapons_china
			event_target:WTT_current_china_leader = {
				has_war_with = JAP
			}
		}
		available = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}
				has_equipment = {
					small_plane_airframe > 499
				}
				has_equipment = {
					medium_plane_airframe > 499
				}
			}
			else = {
				has_equipment = {
					fighter_equipment_1 > 499
				}
				has_equipment = {
					tac_bomber_equipment_1 > 499
				}
			}
		}
		complete_effect = {

				limit = {
					has_dlc = "By Blood Alone"
				}

					equipment = small_plane_airframe
					amount = 500

SOV_minor_communist_countries_europe = {

	SOV_invite_countries = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_exchange_intelligence_data

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 7

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
			has_completed_focus = SOV_communist_minorities_europe
			has_government = communism
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_government = communism
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_civil_war = yes
				}
				is_major = no
				NOT = {
					tag = SLV
					tag = CRO
					tag = BOS
					tag = SER
					tag = MNT
					tag = MAC
					tag = CAT
					tag = NAV
					tag = GLC
					tag = SCO
					tag = WLS
					tag = NIR
					tag = KOR
					tag = VIN
					tag = CAM
					tag = LAO
					tag = TIB
					tag = ETH
					tag = MOR
					tag = EGY
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_1
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_2
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_3
					has_idea = SOV_Supporters_fourth_international
					has_idea = SOV_Fight_revolution
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_communist_minorities_europe
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_government = communism
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_civil_war = yes
				}
				is_major = no
				NOT = {
					tag = SLV
					tag = CRO
					tag = BOS
					tag = SER
					tag = MNT
					tag = MAC
					tag = CAT
					tag = NAV
					tag = GLC
					tag = SCO
					tag = WLS
					tag = NIR
					tag = KOR
					tag = VIN
					tag = CAM
					tag = LAO
					tag = TIB
					tag = ETH
					tag = MOR
					tag = EGY
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_1
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_2
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_3
					has_idea = SOV_Supporters_fourth_international
					has_idea = SOV_Fight_revolution
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			OR = {
				has_opinion = {
					target = FROM
					value > 29
				}
				FROM = {
					has_opinion = {
						target = ROOT
						value > 29
					}
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				is_subject = no
				is_faction_leader = no
				OR = {
					has_government = communism
					communism > 0.4
				}
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = russia2_russia.69
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_invest_countries = {

		icon = GFX_decision_ger_military_buildup

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 30

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
			has_completed_focus = SOV_help_minor_communist_countries_europe
			has_government = communism
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_government = communism
				is_in_faction_with = ROOT
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_help_minor_communist_countries_europe
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_government = communism
				is_in_faction_with = ROOT
			}
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 0
		}

		modifier = {
			civilian_factory_use = 1
		}

		cost = 25

		remove_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = russia2_russia.375
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}
}

			factor = 70
		}
		fire_only_once = yes
		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_weapons_spain
			country_exists = SPC
			SPC = {
				has_civil_war = yes
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
		available = {
			has_equipment = {
				support_equipment > 299
			}
			SPC = {
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
		complete_effect = {
			send_equipment = {
				equipment = support_equipment
				amount = 300
				target = SPC
			}
			army_experience = 20
		}
	}

	SOV_send_volunteer_communism_rebel = {
		icon = GFX_decision_eng_blackshirt_march
		cost = 50
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 70
		}
		fire_only_once = yes
		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_weapons_spain
			country_exists = SPC
			SPC = {
				has_civil_war = yes
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
		available = {
			SPC = {
				has_government = communism
			}
		}
		complete_effect = {
			SPC = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_spain.4 days = 1 }
			}
			add_manpower = -10500
		}
	}
}

SOV_invite_revolution = {

	SOV_invite_communist_revolution = {

		icon = GFX_generic_political_discourse

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 10

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
			has_completed_focus = SOV_revolution_to_the_utmost
			any_country = {
				has_country_flag = liberated_by_sov
			}
			has_government = communism
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ROOT }
				has_government = communism
				has_country_flag = liberated_by_sov
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_revolution_to_the_utmost
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ROOT }
				has_government = communism
				has_country_flag = liberated_by_sov
			}
		}

		available = {
			OR = {
				has_opinion = {
					target = FROM
					value > 49
				}
				FROM = {
					has_opinion = {
						target = ROOT
						value > 49
					}
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				is_subject = no
				has_government = communism
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = SOV
				}
				NOT = {
					has_idea = SOV_Fight_revolution
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 10

		remove_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = russia2_russia.98
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

SOV_proclaim_revolution = {

	SOV_triumph_warsaw = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_nationalism

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 10

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_consolidate_true_communism
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = 10
			}
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_triumph_warsaw_tt
				OR = {
					10 = {
						is_controlled_by = SOV
					}
					any_allied_country = {
						has_government = communism
						controls_state = 10
					}
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_add_1_scale
			add_to_variable = {
			    var = revolution_count
			    value = 1
			}
			set_variable = { revolution_count_gui = revolution_count }
			multiply_variable = { revolution_count_gui = 100 }
			subtract_from_variable = {
			    var = revolution_final_count
			    value = 1
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = revolution_count
				min = 0
				max = 12
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = revolution_count_gui
				min = 0
				max = 1000
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = revolution_final_count
				min = 0
				max = 12
			}
			set_country_flag = SOV_has_conquered_old_city_europe
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_triumph_london_tt
				OR = {
					126 = {
						is_controlled_by = SOV
					}
					any_allied_country = {
						has_government = communism
						controls_state = 126
					}
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_add_2_scale
			add_to_variable = {
			    var = revolution_count
			    value = 2
			}
			set_variable = { revolution_count_gui = revolution_count }
			multiply_variable = { revolution_count_gui = 100 }
			subtract_from_variable = {
			    var = revolution_final_count
			    value = 2
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = revolution_count
				min = 0
				max = 12
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = revolution_count_gui
				min = 0
				max = 1000
			}
			clamp_variable = {
				var = revolution_final_count
				min = 0
				max = 12
			}
			set_country_flag = SOV_has_conquered_major_city_europe
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_expand_revolution = {

		icon = generic_industry

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 50

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_consolidate_true_communism
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_expand_revolution_tt
				has_country_flag = SOV_secured_revolution
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_expand_revolution_tt2
				has_country_flag = SOV_has_conquered_major_city_europe
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_expand_revolution_tt3
				check_variable = {
					var = revolution_count
					value = 6
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = SOV_Marching_revolution
				add_idea = SOV_Marching_revolution2
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_tech = tech_logistics_company
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						tech_logistics_company = 1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_tech = tech_signal_company
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						tech_signal_company = 1
					}
				}
				division_template = {
					name = "Strazhi Revolyutsii"
					priority = 2
					regiments = {
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }

						infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
						artillery_brigade = { x = 0 y = 4 }

						infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
						infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
						infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
						artillery_brigade = { x = 1 y = 4 }

						infantry = { x = 3 y = 1 }
						artillery_brigade = { x = 3 y = 2 }
					}
					support = {
						artillery = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						logistics_company = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						signal_company = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						mot_recon = { x = 0 y = 3 }
						engineer = { x = 0 y = 4 }
					}
				}
				capital_scope = {
					create_unit = {
						division = "name = \"1st Strazhi Revolyutsii Division\" division_template = \"Strazhi Revolyutsii\" start_experience_factor = 1.0 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

					}

						division = "name = \"2nd Strazhi Revolyutsii Division\" division_template = \"Strazhi Revolyutsii\" start_experience_factor = 1.0 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
						owner = SOV
					}
					create_unit = {
						division = "name = \"3rd Strazhi Revolyutsii Division\" division_template = \"Strazhi Revolyutsii\" start_experience_factor = 1.0 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
						owner = SOV
					}
					create_unit = {
						division = "name = \"4th Strazhi Revolyutsii Division\" division_template = \"Strazhi Revolyutsii\" start_experience_factor = 1.0 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
						owner = SOV
					}
					create_unit = {
						division = "name = \"5th Strazhi Revolyutsii Division\" division_template = \"Strazhi Revolyutsii\" start_experience_factor = 1.0 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
						owner = SOV
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_expand_revolution_tt4
			set_country_flag = SOV_expanded_revolution

	SOV_last_step_revolution = {

		icon = eng_blackshirt_march

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 50

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_consolidate_true_communism
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_last_step_revolution_tt
				has_country_flag = SOV_expanded_revolution
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_last_step_revolution_tt2
				has_country_flag = SOV_has_conquered_old_city
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_last_step_revolution_tt3
				check_variable = {
					var = revolution_count
					value = 9
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = SOV_Marching_revolution2
				add_idea = SOV_Marching_revolution3

					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_tech = tech_logistics_company
						}
					}

					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_tech = tech_signal_company
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						tech_signal_company = 1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { #TODO Check this again

							has_tech = basic_medium_tank
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						basic_medium_tank = 1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_tech = mechanised_infantry
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						mechanised_infantry = 1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_tech = armored_car1
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						armored_car1 = 1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_tech = rocket_artillery
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						rocket_artillery = 1
					}
				}
				division_template = {
					name = "Tanki Osvobozhdeniya"
					priority = 2
					regiments = {
						medium_armor = { x = 0 y = 0 }

						medium_armor = { x = 0 y = 3 }
						medium_armor = { x = 0 y = 4 }
						medium_armor = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						medium_armor = { x = 1 y = 1 }
						medium_armor = { x = 1 y = 2 }
						medium_armor = { x = 1 y = 3 }
						medium_armor = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						mechanized = { x = 2 y = 0 }
						mechanized = { x = 2 y = 1 }
						mechanized = { x = 2 y = 2 }
						mechanized = { x = 2 y = 3 }
						mechanized = { x = 2 y = 4 }
						mechanized = { x = 3 y = 0 }
						mechanized = { x = 3 y = 1 }
						mechanized = { x = 3 y = 2 }
						mechanized = { x = 3 y = 3 }
						mechanized = { x = 3 y = 4 }

					support = {
						rocket_artillery = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						logistics_company = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						signal_company = { x = 0 y = 2 }

	SOV_end_revolution = {

		icon = generic_form_nation

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 100

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_consolidate_true_communism
		}

		available = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_revolution_to_the_utmost
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_end_revolution_tt
				NOT = {
					any_country = {
						is_major = yes
						NOT = {
							has_government = communism
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_end_revolution_tt2
				has_country_flag =  SOV_last_step_of_revolution
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_end_revolution_tt3
				check_variable = {
					var = revolution_count
					value = 12
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			country_event = russia2_russia.92
			remove_ideas = SOV_Marching_revolution3
			add_ideas = SOV_Dancing_revolution
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_end_revolution_tt4

SOV_invest_russian_sphere = {

	SOV_invest_russian_sphere_europe = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_construction

		days_remove = 180

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		target_array = global.russia_reworked_russian_states

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = FROM.capital
			}
		}

		visible = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_country_flag = democratic_russia_chaos_europe
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_investment_russian_sphere
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_country_flag = democratic_russia_chaos_europe
			}
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 2
			FROM = {
				is_subject_of = ROOT
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 0
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = russian_sphere_no_investment
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 3
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 1
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = russian_sphere_low_investment
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 3
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 2
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = russian_sphere_medium_investment
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 3
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
				has_completed_focus = SOV_continue_investments
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 3
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = russian_sphere_high_investment
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 3
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
				has_completed_focus = SOV_continue_investments
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_preemptive_coup_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = united_russia_strength
					value = 3
					compare = less_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		modifier = {
			civilian_factory_use = 3
		}

		cost = 40

		remove_effect = {
			FROM = {
				random_owned_state = {
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
					add_building_construction = {
						type = industrial_complex
						level = 2
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
				random_owned_state = {
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
					add_building_construction = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					var = russian_investment@FROM
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = sov_total_investment
				value = 1
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 500
		}
	}

	SOV_invest_russian_sphere_asia = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_construction

		days_remove = 140

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		target_array = global.russia_reworked_russian_states

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = FROM.capital
			}
		}

		visible = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_country_flag = democratic_russia_chaos_asia
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_investment_russian_sphere
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_country_flag = democratic_russia_chaos_asia
			}
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 1
			FROM = {
				is_subject_of = ROOT
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 0
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = russian_sphere_no_investment
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 3
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 1
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = russian_sphere_low_investment
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 3
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 2
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = russian_sphere_medium_investment
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 3
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 3
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = russian_sphere_high_investment
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 3
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_preemptive_coup_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = united_russia_strength
					value = 3
					compare = less_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		modifier = {
			civilian_factory_use = 2
		}

		cost = 30

		remove_effect = {
			FROM = {
				random_owned_state = {
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
					add_building_construction = {
						type = industrial_complex
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
				random_owned_state = {
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
					add_building_construction = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					var = russian_investment@FROM
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = sov_total_investment
				value = 1
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 250
		}
	}

	SOV_invest_russian_sphere_caucasus = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_construction

		allowed = {

		}

		target_array = global.russia_reworked_russian_states

				state = FROM.capital
			}
		}

			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_country_flag = democratic_russia_chaos_caucasus
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_investment_russian_sphere
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_country_flag = democratic_russia_chaos_caucasus
			}
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 0
			FROM = {
				is_subject_of = ROOT
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 0
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = russian_sphere_no_investment
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 3
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 1
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = russian_sphere_low_investment
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 3
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 2
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = russian_sphere_medium_investment
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 3
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 3
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = russian_sphere_high_investment
					FROM = {
						check_variable = {
							var = russian_investment@FROM
							value = 3
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_preemptive_coup_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = united_russia_strength
					value = 3
					compare = less_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		modifier = {
			civilian_factory_use = 1
		}

		cost = 20

		remove_effect = {
			FROM = {
				random_owned_state = {
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
					add_building_construction = {
						type = industrial_complex
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
				random_owned_state = {
					add_building_construction = {
						type = infrastructure
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					var = russian_investment@FROM
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = sov_total_investment
				value = 1
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

SOV_the_second_civil_war_fn = {

	#This is just for informational purposes.
	SOV_second_civil_war_fn = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_nationalism

		allowed = {
			tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			has_civil_war = yes
			has_completed_focus = SOV_second_civil_war
		}

		activation = {
			has_country_flag = second_civil_war_mission
		}

		days_mission_timeout = 140

		is_good = no

		timeout_effect = {

		}

		complete_effect = {

		}
	}

	SOV_relocate_civ_industry = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_attract_foreign_investors

		allowed = {
			tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			has_civil_war = no
		}

		visible = {
			has_country_flag = second_civil_war_mission
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = control_belarus
					}
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = control_central_asia
					}
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = control_caucasus
					}
					check_variable = {
						var = civilian_relocate_count
						value = 2
						compare = greater_than
					}
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 10

		days_remove = 15

		remove_effect = {

		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_relocate_civ_industry_tt
			add_to_variable = { civilian_relocate_count = 1 }
			hidden_effect = {
				random_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						industrial_complex > 0
						original_white_province_second_civil_war = no
					}
					remove_building = {
						type = industrial_complex
						level = 1
					}
				}
				random_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						original_white_province_second_civil_war = yes
					}
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
					add_building_construction = {
						type = industrial_complex
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_buy_weapons = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_industry

		allowed = {
			tag = SOV
		}
		available = {
			has_civil_war = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_buy_weapons_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = buy_weapons_count
					value = 6
					compare = less_than_or_equals
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = has_tokens_to_buy_weapons
				check_variable = {
					var = token_buy_weapons
					value = 1
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}
		visible = {
			has_country_flag = second_civil_war_mission
			check_variable = {
				var = buy_weapons_count
				value = 7
				compare = less_than
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = control_belarus
					}
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = control_central_asia
					}
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = control_caucasus
					}
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 15

		days_remove = 14
		remove_effect = {

		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = buy_weapons
			set_country_flag = buy_weaps
			add_to_variable = {
				var = buy_weapons_count
				value = 1
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = token_buy_weapons
				value = -1
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = buy_weapons_final_count
				value = 2500
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_contact_foreign_countries = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		target_array = global.sov_foreign_major_country

		allowed = {
			tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			FROM = {
				NOT = {
					has_civil_war = yes
				}
				exists = yes
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_contacting_foreign_major_power
			}
		}

		visible = {
			FROM = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = communism
					has_civil_war = yes
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				exists = yes
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = FROM.capital
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 150
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = control_belarus
					}
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = control_central_asia
					}
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = control_caucasus
					}
					has_country_flag = sov_from_accepts_to_help_scw
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 20

		days_remove = 14

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_contacting_foreign_major_power
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_generic.31 hours = 1 }
			}
			remove_from_array = { global.sov_foreign_major_country = FROM }
			custom_effect_tooltip = result_of_contacting_foreing_country
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_contacting_foreign_major_power
		}
	}

	SOV_sympathize_with_ukraine = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_political_discourse

		allowed = {
			tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			has_civil_war = no
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = 202
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
			}
		}

		visible = {
			has_country_flag = second_civil_war_mission
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 800
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				UKR = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = UKR_AI_ISOLATED_BEHAVIOR
						has_country_flag = UKR_AI_AGGRESSIVE_BEHAVIOR
						has_country_flag = UKR_AI_ALLIANCE_FINLAND_BEHAVIOR
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					UKR = {
						has_country_flag = UKR_AI_ANARCHIST_BEHAVIOR
					}
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = control_belarus
					}
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = control_central_asia
					}
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = control_caucasus
					}
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 50

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = sympathize_with_ukraine_civil_war_tt
			if = {
				limit = {
					UKR = {
						is_ai = yes
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = UKR_AI_ISOLATED_BEHAVIOR
							has_country_flag = UKR_AI_AGGRESSIVE_BEHAVIOR
							has_country_flag = UKR_AI_ALLIANCE_FINLAND_BEHAVIOR
						}
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = sympathize_with_ukraine_will_have_less_effect_tt
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					UKR = {
						is_ai = yes
						has_country_flag = UKR_AI_ANARCHIST_BEHAVIOR
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = sympathize_with_ukraine_wont_have_effect_tt
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_country_flag = sympathize_with_ukraine
			}
		}

	}

	SOV_sabotage_military_industries = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_scorched_earth

		allowed = {
			tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			has_civil_war = no
			command_power > 15
		}

		visible = {
			has_country_flag = second_civil_war_mission
			all_of = {
				array = sabotage_military_count
				value = current
				index = i

				set_temp_variable = { sabotage_count = i }
				check_variable = {
					var = sabotage_count
					value = 4
					compare = less_than
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 9
			modifier = {
				factor = 0

					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = train_caucasian_soldiers_civil_war
					}
					check_variable = {
						var = sabotage_count
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than
					}
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 0

		}

			add_to_array = { sabotage_military_count = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = sabotage_military

				add_command_power = -15
			}

		}

		available = {
			has_civil_war = no
			command_power > 20
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_steal_weapons_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = steal_weapons_count
					value = 6
					compare = less_than
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			has_country_flag = second_civil_war_mission
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 200
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = train_caucasian_soldiers_civil_war
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 0

		days_remove = 20

		remove_effect = {

		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = steal_weapons_count
				value = 1
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = steal_weapons_final_count
				value = 1000
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = steal_weapons
			hidden_effect = {
				add_command_power = -20
			}
			set_country_flag = steal_weaps
		}
	}

SOV_deal_with_britain = {

	SOV_air_raid_british_ships = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_intelligence_operation

		allowed = {
			tag = SOV
		}
		available = {
			has_full_control_of_state = 195
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = sov_air_raid_use_mil_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				random_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						arms_factory > 0
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = give_back_mil_after_air_raid
						}
					}
					remove_building = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 1
					}
					set_state_flag = give_back_mil_after_air_raid
				}
				random_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						arms_factory > 0
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = give_back_mil_after_air_raid
						}
					}
					remove_building = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 1
					}
					set_state_flag = give_back_mil_after_air_raid
				}
				random_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						arms_factory > 0
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = give_back_mil_after_air_raid
						}
					}
					remove_building = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 1
					}
					set_state_flag = give_back_mil_after_air_raid
				}
				random_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						arms_factory > 0
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = give_back_mil_after_air_raid
						}
					}
					remove_building = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 1
					}
					set_state_flag = give_back_mil_after_air_raid
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 100

		days_remove = 60

		remove_effect = {
			ENG = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_russia.126 days = 1 }
			}
			set_country_flag = dealt_with_britain
			hidden_effect = {
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = give_back_mil_after_air_raid
					}
					add_building_construction = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_last_british_ultimatum = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_intelligence_operation

		allowed = {
			tag = SOV
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}

		cost = 50

		complete_effect = {
			ENG = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_russia.128 days = 1 }
			}
			set_country_flag = dealt_with_britain
			custom_effect_tooltip = will_war_with_uk_if_fail_tt
		}
	}
}

SOV_expand_entente_decision = {

	SOV_invite_old_entente = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 10

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_reform_entente
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ROOT }
				OR = {
					tag = ENG
					tag = USA
					tag = ITA
					tag = SER
					tag = MNT
					tag = BEL
					tag = SAU
					tag = POR
					tag = ROM
					tag = GRE
					tag = SIA
					tag = BRA
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			OR = {
				has_opinion = {
					target = FROM
					value > 49
				}
				FROM = {
					has_opinion = {
						target = ROOT
						value > 49
					}
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				is_subject = no
				OR = {
					has_government = democratic
					has_government = neutrality
				}
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = SOV
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						FROM = {
							tag = USA
						}
					}

					has_war_support > 0.5
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						FROM = {
							has_country_flag = is_target_of_SOV_democratic
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = is_target_of_SOV_democratic
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						tag = ENG
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					ENG = {
						has_country_flag = cut_all_diplomatic_ties_with_sov
					}
					has_idea = SOV_Blockaded_by_eng
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		remove_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = russia2_russia.154
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

SOV_perpetual_defense_liberty_decisions = {

	SOV_demand_change_government = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_war_on_pacifism

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 30

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			FROM = {
				NOT = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								has_government = democratic
							}
						}
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					}
					has_capitulated = yes
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_capitulated = yes
					has_government = democratic
					tag = POL
					tag = LIT
					tag = LAT
					tag = EST
					tag = ROM
				}
				any_owned_state = {
					is_controlled_by = FROM
					is_capital = yes
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_perpetual_defense_liberty
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					is_neighbor_of = ROOT
					any_country = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						is_neighbor_of = FROM
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = ROOT
						is_neighbor_of = FROM
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_capitulated = yes
					has_government = democratic
					tag = POL
					tag = LIT
					tag = LAT
					tag = EST
					tag = ROM
				}
				any_owned_state = {
					is_controlled_by = FROM
					is_capital = yes
				}
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = FROM
				is_capital = yes
			}
		}

		war_with_target_on_remove = yes

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_changing_foreign_government
			}
			FROM = {
				is_subject = no
				NOT = {
					has_government = democratic
				}
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_changing_foreign_government
			FROM = {
				country_event = russia2_russia.331
				set_country_flag = is_target_of_SOV_democratic
				activate_mission = SOV_is_building_up_against_from_democratic
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		cancel_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				FROM = {
					clr_country_flag = is_target_of_SOV_democratic
				}
				clr_country_flag = is_changing_foreign_government
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = russia2_russia.170
				}
				clr_country_flag = is_target_of_SOV_democratic
			}
			clr_country_flag = is_changing_foreign_government
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				add = -90
				has_war = yes
				OR = {
					any_country = {
						is_major = yes
						is_in_faction_with = FROM
					}
					any_country = {
						is_major = yes
						has_guaranteed = FROM
					}
					FROM = {
						is_major = yes
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = {
					alliance_strength_ratio > 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

SOV_control_of_church = {

	SOV_change_church_control_base = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_war_on_pacifism

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			check_variable = {
				var = reform_church_control
				value = 1
				compare = greater_than_or_equals
			}
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = has_reformed_church_1_times_or_more
				check_variable = {
					var = reform_church_control
					value = 1
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_change_church_control_base_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_Church_power_idead_tt
			clr_country_flag = church_last_reform
      		set_country_flag = church_last_reform
			set_variable = { pp_gain_church_power = 0.25 }
			set_variable = { stability_gain_church_power = 0 }
			set_variable = { war_support_gain_church_power = 0 }
			set_variable = { research_gain_church_power = 0 }
			set_variable = { resistance_gain_church_power = 0 }
			set_variable = { army_core_attack_gain_church_power = 0 }
			set_variable = { army_core_defense_gain_church_power = 0 }
			set_variable = { mobilization_gain_church_power = 0 }
			set_variable = { building_gain_church_power = 0 }
			set_variable = { infrastructure_gain_church_power = 0 }
			set_variable = { industrial_fac_gain_church_power = 0 }
			set_variable = { efficiency_fac_gain_church_power = 0 }
			set_variable = { reform_church_control = 0 }
		}

		cost = 25

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_change_church_control_stability = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_attract_foreign_investors

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			check_variable = {
				var = stability_gain_church_power
				value = 0.15
				compare = less_than
			}
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = not_has_reformed_church_4_times
				check_variable = {
					var = reform_church_control
					value = 4
					compare = less_than
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = add_15_stability_to_church_control
			custom_effect_tooltip = remove_15_political_daily_gain_to_church_control
			add_to_variable = {
				var = pp_gain_church_power
				value = -0.15
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = reform_church_control
				value = 1
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = stability_gain_church_power
				value = 0.15
			}
			clr_country_flag = church_last_reform
      		set_country_flag = church_last_reform
		}

		cost = 50

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
