SOV_destroy_communist_resistance = {

	SOV_send_recon_team_central_russia = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_intelligence_operation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			command_power > 20
		}

		visible = {
			has_idea = SOV_Communist_resistance3
			has_country_flag = central_russia_claims
			has_completed_focus = SOV_destroy_communist
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = 254
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 15
		}

		cost = 0

		days_remove = 25

		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
						    var = recon_team_central_russia_variables
						    value = 75
						    compare = greater_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					SOV = {
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.199 hours = 2 }
					}
				}
				else = {
					SOV = {
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.200 hours = 2 }
					}
					add_to_variable = {
						var = recon_team_central_russia_variables
						value = 15
					}
					randomize_variable = {
						var = recon_team_central_russia_variables
						distribution = uniform
						min = recon_team_central_russia_variables
						max = 100
					}
					round_variable = recon_team_central_russia_variables
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_send_recon_team_central_russia_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				add_command_power = -20
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_raid_communist_hideout_central_russia = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_prepare_civil_war

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			has_equipment = {
				infantry_equipment > 4999
			}
		}

		visible = {
			has_idea = SOV_Communist_resistance3
			has_country_flag = central_russia_raids
			has_completed_focus = SOV_destroy_communist
			is_ai = no
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = 254
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 15
		}

		cost = 0

		days_remove = 10

		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				SOV = {
					add_state_core = 223
					add_state_core = 222
					add_state_core = 220
					add_state_core = 240
					add_state_core = 260
					add_state_core = 258
					add_state_core = 257
					add_state_core = 255
					add_state_core = 254
					clr_country_flag = central_russia_raids
					set_country_flag = central_russia_done
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_raid_communist_hideout_central_russia_tt
			SOV = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = communism
					popularity = -0.05
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				SOV = {
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = infantry_equipment
						amount = -5000
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

					}
					SOV = {
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.202 hours = 2 }
					}
				}
				else = {
					SOV = {
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.243 hours = 2 }
					}
					add_to_variable = {
						var = recon_team_transvolga_region_variables
						value = 20
					}
					randomize_variable = {
						var = recon_team_transvolga_region_variables
						distribution = uniform
						min = recon_team_transvolga_region_variables
						max = 100
					}
					round_variable = recon_team_transvolga_region_variables
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_send_recon_team_transvolga_region_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				add_command_power = -20
			}
		}
	}

					add_state_core = 833

	SOV_send_recon_team_urals_region = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_intelligence_operation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			command_power > 20
		}

		visible = {
			has_idea = SOV_Communist_resistance3
			has_country_flag = urals_region_claims
			has_completed_focus = SOV_destroy_communist
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = 573
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 15
		}

		cost = 0

		days_remove = 25

		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
						    var = recon_team_urals_region_variables
						    value = 60
						    compare = greater_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					SOV = {
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.203 hours = 2 }
					}
				}
				else = {
					SOV = {
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.244 hours = 2 }
					}
					add_to_variable = {
						var = recon_team_urals_region_variables
						value = 20
					}
					randomize_variable = {
						var = recon_team_urals_region_variables
						distribution = uniform
						min = recon_team_urals_region_variables
						max = 100
					}
					round_variable = recon_team_urals_region_variables
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_send_recon_team_urals_region_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				add_command_power = -20
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_finish_communist_partisan = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_nationalism

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			has_country_flag = central_russia_done
			has_country_flag = kuban_region_done
			has_country_flag = transvolga_region_done
			has_country_flag = urals_region_done
			has_country_flag = artic_region_done
			has_country_flag = siberia_region_done
			has_country_flag = novgorod_region_done
		}

		visible = {
			has_idea = SOV_Communist_resistance3
			has_completed_focus = SOV_destroy_communist
		}

		cost = 0

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 500
		}

		complete_effect = {
			remove_ideas = SOV_Communist_resistance3
			SOV = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = communism
					popularity = -0.05
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = neutrality
					popularity = 0.10
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_partisan_attack = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_scorched_earth

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_resistance3
			}
		}

		activation = {
			has_idea = SOV_Communist_resistance3
		}

		days_mission_timeout = 25

		is_good = no

		timeout_effect = {
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					non_damaged_building_level = {
						building = industrial_complex level > 0
					}
				}
				damage_building = {
					type = industrial_complex damage = 1
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					non_damaged_building_level = {
						building = arms_factory level > 0
					}
				}
				damage_building = {
					type = arms_factory damage = 1
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					non_damaged_building_level = {
						building = infrastructure level > 1
					}
				}
				damage_building = {
					type = infrastructure
					damage = 1
				}
			}
			add_manpower = -4000
		}

		complete_effect = {

		}
	}
}

SOV_buy_guns_foreign_country = {

	SOV_small_shipment = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_prepare_civil_war

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = shipment_in_progress
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = bought_7_times_guns
				check_variable = {
					var = small_equipment
					value = 7
					compare = less_than
				}
			}
			OR = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = weapons_limit_number_10
					has_equipment = {
						infantry_equipment < 10000
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_resistance3
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			check_variable = {
				var = small_equipment
				value = 7
				compare = less_than
			}
			has_completed_focus = SOV_buying_equipment
		}

		cost = 10

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 25
		}

		days_remove = 35

		modifier = {
			civilian_factory_use = 3
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = small_equipment
				value = 1
			}
			set_country_flag = shipment_in_progress
		}

		remove_effect = {
			SOV = {
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
					type = infantry_equipment_1
					amount = 1000
				}
			}
			clr_country_flag = shipment_in_progress
		}
	}

	SOV_medium_shipment = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_prepare_civil_war

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = shipment_in_progress
			}

				tooltip = bought_3_times_guns_m

			factor = 50
		}

		}

				var = medium_equipment

		}

		remove_effect = {

					type = infantry_equipment_1
					amount = 2500
				}
			}
			clr_country_flag = shipment_in_progress
		}
	}

SOV_unite_slavic_nation_ultimatum_decision = {

	SOV_ultimatum_poland_slavic = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_operation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = sending_ultimatum_slavic_country
				has_war_with = POL
			}
			country_exists = POL
			NOT = {
				POL = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
					is_in_faction_with = SOV
					has_capitulated = yes
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			country_exists = POL
			NOT = {
				POL = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 75

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 150
		}

		days_remove = 50

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = sending_ultimatum_slavic_country
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = {
					country_exists = POL
				}
				has_war_with = POL
				POL = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
				POL = {
					is_in_faction_with = SOV
				}
				POL = {
					has_capitulated = yes
				}
			}
		}

		cancel_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = sending_ultimatum_slavic_country
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = sending_ultimatum_slavic_country
			POL = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_generic.15 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_ultimatum_poland_non_slavic = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_ignite_civil_war

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = sending_ultimatum_slavic_country
				has_war_with = FROM
			}
			FROM = {
				any_state = {
					has_state_flag = SOV_slavic_states
					is_core_of = POL
				}
				NOT = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				any_state = {
					has_state_flag = SOV_slavic_states
					is_core_of = POL
					is_owned_by = FROM
				}
				NOT = {
					tag = POL
					tag = CZE
					tag = YUG
					tag = BUL
					tag = SLO
					is_subject_of = SOV
					has_capitulated = yes
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			FROM = {
				any_state = {
					has_state_flag = SOV_slavic_states
					is_core_of = POL
					is_owned_by = FROM
				}
				NOT = {
					tag = POL
					tag = CZE
					tag = YUG
					tag = BUL
					tag = SLO
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 75

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 150
		}

		days_remove = 50

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = sending_ultimatum_slavic_country
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			NOT = {
				FROM = {
					any_state = {
						has_state_flag = SOV_slavic_states
						is_core_of = POL
						is_owned_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				NOT = {
					country_exists = FROM
				}
				has_war_with = POL
				FROM = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
				FROM = {
					is_in_faction_with = SOV
				}
				FROM = {
					has_capitulated = yes
				}
			}
		}

		cancel_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = sending_ultimatum_slavic_country
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = sending_ultimatum_slavic_country
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_generic.15 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_ultimatum_yugoslavia_non_slavic = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_ignite_civil_war

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = sending_ultimatum_slavic_country
				has_war_with = FROM
			}

					has_state_flag = SOV_slavic_states
					is_core_of = YUG
				}
				NOT = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				any_state = {
					has_state_flag = SOV_slavic_states
					OR = {
						is_core_of = YUG
						is_core_of = SLV
						is_core_of = CRO
						is_core_of = BOS
						is_core_of = HRZ
						is_core_of = MNT
						is_core_of = KOS
						is_core_of = MAC
						is_core_of = TRA
					}
					is_owned_by = FROM
				}
				NOT = {
					tag = POL
					tag = CZE
					tag = YUG
					tag = BUL
					tag = SLO
					is_subject_of = SOV
					has_capitulated = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						YUG = {
							has_completed_focus = YUG_limited_self_government
							exists = yes
							NOT = {
								is_subject = yes
							}
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						tag = SLV
						tag = CRO
						tag = BOS
						tag = HRZ
						tag = MNT
						tag = KOS
						tag = MAC
						tag = TRA
					}
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_unite_western_balkan
			FROM = {
				any_state = {
					has_state_flag = SOV_slavic_states
					is_core_of = YUG
					is_owned_by = FROM
				}
				NOT = {
					tag = POL
					tag = CZE
					tag = YUG
					tag = BUL
					tag = SLO
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						YUG = {
							has_completed_focus = YUG_limited_self_government
							exists = yes
							NOT = {
								is_subject = yes
							}
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						tag = SLV
						tag = CRO
						tag = BOS
						tag = HRZ
						tag = MNT
						tag = KOS
						tag = MAC
						tag = TRA
					}
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 75

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 150
		}

		days_remove = 50

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = sending_ultimatum_slavic_country
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			NOT = {
				FROM = {
					any_state = {
						has_state_flag = SOV_slavic_states
						is_core_of = YUG
						is_owned_by = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				NOT = {
					country_exists = FROM
				}
				has_war_with = FROM
				FROM = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
				FROM = {
					is_in_faction_with = SOV
				}
				FROM = {
					has_capitulated = yes
				}
			}
		}

		cancel_effect = {

				add_state_core = 802
				add_state_core = 803
				add_state_core = 804
				add_state_core = 853
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = SOV_slavic_states
						OR = {
							is_core_of = YUG
							is_core_of = SLV
							is_core_of = CRO
							is_core_of = BOS
							is_core_of = HRZ
							is_core_of = MNT
							is_core_of = KOS
							is_core_of = MAC
							is_core_of = TRA
						}
						NOT = {
							state = 106
							state = 107
							state = 108
							state = 764
							state = 45
							state = 109
							state = 104
							state = 103
							state = 105
							state = 102
							state = 802

							state = 804
							state = 853
						}
						is_owned_by = ROOT

					}

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_nationalism

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			OR = {
				FIN = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = full_control_all_states_finland
					has_full_control_of_state = 146
					has_full_control_of_state = 111
					has_full_control_of_state = 150
					has_full_control_of_state = 149
					has_full_control_of_state = 148
					has_full_control_of_state = 147
					has_full_control_of_state = 722
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_russianize_finland
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 150

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 150
		}

		days_remove = 70

		complete_effect = {

		}

		cancel_trigger = {

		}

		remove_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						country_exists = FIN
					}
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = FIN
						is_owned_by = ROOT
					}
					SOV = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = FIN
					FIN = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
					}
				}
				SOV = {
					annex_country = {
						target = FIN
						transfer_troops = yes
					}
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = FIN
						is_owned_by = ROOT
					}
					SOV = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_influence_romanian_government = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_speech

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_russianizing_a_country
			}
			has_completed_focus = SOV_russianize_the_balkans
			ROM = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
		}

		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_russianize_the_balkans
		}

		cost = 50

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 150
		}

		days_remove = 70

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_russianizing_a_country
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			NOT = {
				ROM = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_russianizing_a_country
			custom_effect_tooltip = gain_between_5_and_10_russianization_romania
			set_temp_variable = {
				var = russianization_romania_gain
				value = 5
			}
			randomize_temp_variable = {
				var = russianization_romania_gain
				distribution = uniform
				min = russianization_romania_gain
				max = 10
			}
			round_temp_variable = russianization_romania_gain
			add_to_variable = {
				var = romania_russianization_slavic
				value = russianization_romania_gain
			}
		}
	}

			custom_effect_tooltip = gain_between_10_and_20_russianization_romania
			set_temp_variable = {
				var = russianization_romania_gain
				value = 10
			}
			randomize_temp_variable = {
				var = russianization_romania_gain
				distribution = uniform
				min = russianization_romania_gain
				max = 20
			}
			round_temp_variable = russianization_romania_gain

				var = romania_russianization_slavic

		}

		available = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_russianize_the_balkans
			ROM = {
				is_subject_of = SOV

			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = has_100_or_more_russianization_romania
				check_variable = {
					var = romania_russianization_slavic
					value = 100
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_russianize_the_balkans
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 150

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 150
		}

		complete_effect = {
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ROM
				}
				SOV = {
					add_state_core = PREV
				}
			}
			annex_country = {
				target = ROM
				transfer_troops = yes
			}
		}
	}

				var = russianization_hungary_gain
				value = 5
			}

				var = russianization_hungary_gain

				max = 10
			}

			add_to_variable = {
				var = hungary_russianization_slavic
				value = russianization_hungary_gain
			}
		}

SOV_defend_slavic_borders_category = {

	SOV_fortify_slavic_border_states = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_construction

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		on_map_mode = map_and_decisions_view

		state_target = yes

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_core_of = SOV
				any_neighbor_state = {
					NOT = {
						is_core_of = SOV
						is_fully_controlled_by = SOV
					}
				}
				bunker < 7
				anti_air_building < 4
			}
		}

		available = {
			ROOT = {
				has_full_control_of_state = FROM
			}
			FROM = {
				bunker < 7
				anti_air_building < 4
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = fortification_slavic_country_timeout
			}
		}

		visible = {
			FROM = {
				is_core_of = SOV
				any_neighbor_state = {
					NOT = {
						is_core_of = SOV
						is_fully_controlled_by = SOV
					}
				}
				bunker < 7
				anti_air_building < 4
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 50

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 150
		}

		modifier = {
			civilian_factory_use = 10
		}

		days_remove = 70

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = fortification_slavic_country_timeout
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = fortification_slavic_country_timeout
			FROM = {
				add_building_construction = {
					type = bunker
					level = 2
					instant_build = yes
					province = {
						all_provinces = yes
						limit_to_border = yes
					}
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = anti_air_building
					level = 1
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			original_tag = SOV
		}

		}

			has_completed_focus = SOV_appease_communist

			factor = 250
		}

	SOV_bring_back_kulaks = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_independence

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {

		}

		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_appease_communist
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 75

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 250
		}

		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = give_land_peasants
						has_country_flag = encourage_peasants
					}
				}
				add_stability = 0.05
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = give_land_peasants
						has_country_flag = encourage_peasants
					}
				}
				add_stability = -0.05
			}
			else = {
				add_stability = -0.1
			}
			set_country_flag = kulaks_restored
		}
	}

	SOV_compensate_generals = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_draw_up_staff_plans

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {

		}

		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_appease_communist
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 150

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 250
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = compensate_generals_tt
			set_temp_variable = { random_generals_1 = 0 }
			randomize_temp_variable = {
				var = random_generals_1
				distribution = uniform
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			round_variable = random_generals_1
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = random_generals_1
							value = 20
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					SOV = {
						SOV_Mikhail_tukhachevsky = {
							clr_character_flag = russia_is_in_prison_cw
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = random_generals_1
							value = 60
							compare = greater_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					SOV = {
						SOV_Vasily_kuznetsov = {
							clr_character_flag = russia_is_in_prison_cw
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					SOV = {
						SOV_Maks_reyter = {
							clr_character_flag = russia_is_in_prison_cw
						}
					}
				}
				SOV = {
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.207 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.208 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.209 }
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = compensate_generals
		}
	}

	SOV_finish_appeasement_process = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_exchange_intelligence_data

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			has_country_flag = appease_the_workers
			has_country_flag = appease_the_peasants
			has_country_flag = appease_the_army
		}

		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_appease_communist
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 25

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 250
		}

		complete_effect = {
			remove_ideas = SOV_Communist_resistance7
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_completed_focus = SOV_restoration_tsar
						has_completed_focus = SOV_firm_hand
					}
				}
				add_ideas = SOV_United_society
			}
			SOV = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = communism
					popularity = -0.10
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = neutrality
					popularity = 0.10
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

SOV_transfer_of_power = {

	SOV_allow_transfer_power = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_radio_oranje

		cost = 50

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_AI_PAVEL_BERMONDT_AVALOV_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		available = {
			has_country_leader = {
				character = SOV_Andrey_vlasov
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}

		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_firm_hand
			has_government = neutrality
			is_subject = no
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					character = SOV_Pavel_bermondt_avalov
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = {
				flag = andrey_vlasov_in_power_count
				days > 100
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_allow_transfer_power_tt
			add_to_variable = { transfer_power_pavel_factor = 1 }
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = transfer_power_pavel_factor
							value = 2
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = russia2_russia.349 days = 50 }
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_convince_pavel_move_moscow = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_political_discourse

		cost = 100

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_AI_PAVEL_BERMONDT_AVALOV_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		available = {
			231 = {
				is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
			}
			capital_scope = {
				is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
			}
		}

		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_firm_hand
			has_government = neutrality
			is_subject = no
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					character = SOV_Pavel_bermondt_avalov
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = {
				flag = andrey_vlasov_in_power_count
				days > 100
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_convince_pavel_tt
			add_to_variable = { transfer_power_pavel_factor = 1 }
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = transfer_power_pavel_factor
							value = 2
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = russia2_russia.349 days = 50 }
			}
		}
	}
}

SOV_monarchy_congress = {

	#Have to do each house one by one because Paradox doesn't allow the use of a foreach here
	SOV_monarchy_support_house_1 = {
		icon = GFX_decision_generic_political_discourse

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = less_than_3_house_1
				check_variable = {
					var = house_russia^1
					value = 3
					compare = less_than
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_supporting_house
			}
		}

		cost = house_russia_pp_cost^1

		days_remove = house_russia_pp_cost^1

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_supporting_house
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_supporting_house
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_monarchy_support_house_1_tt

			add_to_variable = {
				var = house_russia^1
				value = 1
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = house_russia^1
						value = 2
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = { house_russia_pp_cost^1 = 20 }
				add_to_variable = {
					var = house_russia_neutral
					value = 1
				}
				subtract_from_variable = {
					var = house_russia_opposed
					value = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = house_russia^1
						value = 3
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				set_variable = { house_russia_pp_cost^1 = 10 }
				add_to_variable = {
					var = house_russia_support
					value = 1
				}
				subtract_from_variable = {
					var = house_russia_neutral
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_coalition_party = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_exchange_intelligence_data

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_coalition_party_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = house_russia_opposed
					value = 1
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_supporting_house
			}
		}

		cost = 60

		days_remove = 30

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_supporting_house
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_supporting_house
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_1_house_go_support

			set_temp_variable = { success_count = 0 }
			set_temp_variable = { random_house = 0 }
			while_loop_effect = {
				break = end_array
    			limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = success_count
						value = 1
						compare = less_than
					}
				}

				randomize_temp_variable = {
					var = random_house
					min = 0
					max = monarchy_houses_russia^num
				}
				round_temp_variable = random_house
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = random_house
							value = monarchy_houses_russia^num
							compare = greater_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					set_temp_variable = { random_house = 0 }
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = house_russia^var:random_house
							value = 1
							compare = equals
						}
					}
					set_variable = { house_russia_pp_cost^var:random_house = 10 }
					add_to_variable = {
						var = house_russia_support
						value = 1
					}
					subtract_from_variable = {
						var = house_russia_opposed
						value = 1
					}
					add_to_variable = {
						var = house_russia^var:random_house
						value = 2
					}
					add_to_temp_variable = { success_count = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_war_economy_law_parl = {

		icon = GFX_decision_ger_military_buildup

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = war_economy
					has_idea = tot_economic_mobilisation
				}
			}
			OR = {
				has_war = yes
				AND = {
					has_war_support > 0.5
					threat > 0.5
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_war_economy_law_parl_support_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = house_russia_support
					value = 6
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_war_economy_law_parl_opposition_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = house_russia_opposed
					value = 2
					compare = less_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		complete_effect = {
			add_ideas = war_economy
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_2_houses_go_opposition

			set_temp_variable = { success_count = 0 }
			set_temp_variable = { random_house = 0 }
			while_loop_effect = {
				break = end_array
    			limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = success_count
						value = 2
						compare = less_than
					}
				}

				randomize_temp_variable = {
					var = random_house
					min = 0
					max = monarchy_houses_russia^num
				}
				round_temp_variable = random_house
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = random_house
							value = monarchy_houses_russia^num
							compare = greater_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					set_temp_variable = { random_house = 0 }
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = house_russia^var:random_house
							value = 3
							compare = equals
						}
					}
					set_variable = { house_russia_pp_cost^var:random_house = 30 }
					add_to_variable = {
						var = house_russia_opposed
						value = 1
					}
					subtract_from_variable = {
						var = house_russia_support
						value = 1
					}
					subtract_from_variable = {
						var = house_russia^var:random_house
						value = 2
					}
					add_to_temp_variable = { success_count = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_increase_resources_law_parl = {

		icon = GFX_decision_tungsten

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		available = {
			owns_state = 219
			owns_state = 232
			owns_state = 233
			owns_state = 827
			owns_state = 828
			owns_state = 821
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_increase_resources_law_parl_support_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = house_russia_support
					value = 4
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_increase_resources_law_parl_opposition_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = house_russia_opposed
					value = 3
					compare = less_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		complete_effect = {
			add_ideas = SOV_Develop_new_resources
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = SOV_Payment_resources
				days = 180
			}
			219 = {
				add_resource = {
					type = rubber
					amount = 10
				}
			}
			232 = {
				add_resource = {
					type = oil
					amount = 10
				}
			}
			233 = {
				add_resource = {
					type = tungsten
					amount = 4
				}
			}
			827 = {
				add_resource = {
					type = tungsten
					amount = 4
				}
			}
			828 = {
				add_resource = {
					type = tungsten
					amount = 4
				}
			}
			821 = {
				add_resource = {
					type = tungsten
					amount = 4
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_2_houses_go_opposition

			set_temp_variable = { success_count = 0 }
			set_temp_variable = { random_house = 0 }
			while_loop_effect = {
				break = end_array
    			limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = success_count
						value = 2
						compare = less_than
					}
				}

				randomize_temp_variable = {
					var = random_house
					min = 0
					max = monarchy_houses_russia^num
				}
				round_temp_variable = random_house
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = random_house
							value = monarchy_houses_russia^num
							compare = greater_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					set_temp_variable = { random_house = 0 }
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = house_russia^var:random_house
							value = 3
							compare = equals
						}
					}
					set_variable = { house_russia_pp_cost^var:random_house = 30 }
					add_to_variable = {
						var = house_russia_opposed
						value = 1
					}
					subtract_from_variable = {
						var = house_russia_support
						value = 1
					}
					subtract_from_variable = {
						var = house_russia^var:random_house
						value = 2
					}
					add_to_temp_variable = { success_count = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_civilian_industry_improvement = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_construction

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_civilian_industry_improvement_opposition_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = house_russia_opposed
					value = 9
					compare = less_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 25

		days_remove = 40

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_1_random_house_go_opposition

			set_temp_variable = { success_count = 0 }
			set_temp_variable = { random_house = 0 }
			while_loop_effect = {
				break = end_array
    			limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = success_count
						value = 1
						compare = less_than
					}
				}

				randomize_temp_variable = {
					var = random_house
					min = 0
					max = monarchy_houses_russia^num
				}
				round_temp_variable = random_house
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = random_house
							value = monarchy_houses_russia^num
							compare = greater_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					set_temp_variable = { random_house = 0 }
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = house_russia^var:random_house
							value = 3
							compare = equals
						}
					}
					set_variable = { house_russia_pp_cost^var:random_house = 30 }
					add_to_variable = {
						var = house_russia_opposed
						value = 1
					}
					subtract_from_variable = {
						var = house_russia_support
						value = 1
					}
					subtract_from_variable = {
						var = house_russia^var:random_house
						value = 2
					}
					add_to_temp_variable = { success_count = 1 }
				}
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
				add_building_construction = {
					type = industrial_complex
					level = 1
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

					level = 1
					instant_build = yes

	SOV_raise_taxes = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_attract_foreign_investors

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}

		available = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = has_enacted_law
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = last_law_more_than_one_year
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = has_enacted_law
						days > 365
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_raise_taxes_parl_support_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = house_russia_support
					value = 1
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = more_support_means_longer
			set_temp_variable = { days_higher_taxes = house_russia_support }
			multiply_temp_variable = { days_higher_taxes = 36 }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = SOV_Higher_taxes
				days = days_higher_taxes
			}
			set_country_flag = has_enacted_law
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_russia.211 days = 365 }
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_focus_military = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_army_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}

		available = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = has_enacted_law
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = last_law_more_than_one_year
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = has_enacted_law
						days > 365
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_military_focus_law_parl_support_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = house_russia_support
					value = 1
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = more_support_means_longer
			set_temp_variable = { days_military_focus = house_russia_support }
			multiply_temp_variable = { days_military_focus = 36 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "No Step Back"
				}
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = SOV_Military_focus_nsb
					days = days_military_focus
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = SOV_Military_focus
					days = days_military_focus
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = has_enacted_law
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_russia.211 days = 365 }
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_alaskan_deal = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_operation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = USA
					ratio < 1
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_alaskan_deal_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = house_russia_support
					value = 6
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			any_country = {
				owns_state = 463
				has_civil_war = no
				is_subject = no
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = SOV
					tag = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_state_claim = 463
			463 = {
				CONTROLLER = {
					country_event = { id = russia2_america.8 days = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_intervention_germany = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_tank

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = GER
					ratio < 1
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_intervention_germany_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = house_russia_support
					value = 8
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
			threat > 0.25
		}

		visible = {
			OR = {
				GER = {
					has_war = yes
				}
				date > 1940.01.01
			}
			GER = {
				has_civil_war = no
				is_subject = no
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			GER = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_germany.14 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_intervention_france = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_tank

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = FRA
					ratio < 1
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_intervention_france_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = house_russia_support
					value = 8
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
			threat > 0.25
		}

		visible = {
			OR = {
				FRA = {
					has_war = yes
				}
				date > 1940.01.01
			}
			FRA = {
				has_civil_war = no
				is_subject = no
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_idea = SOV_French_monarchist_sentiment_idea
					has_idea = SOV_French_monarchist_sentiment_idea_2
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			FRA = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_france.18 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
}

SOV_reintegrate_lost_states_decisions = {

	#Version if you didn't sympathize with the Ukrainian and if they for some reasons agree
	SOV_integrate_ukraine = {

		icon = GFX_decision_infiltrate_state

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			UKR = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
		}

		visible = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = sympathize_with_ukraine
			}
			UKR = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			country_exists = UKR
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = UKR.CAPITAL
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 50

		complete_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { stability_calculator_ukraine_1 = stability_hit_ukraine }
			multiply_temp_variable = { stability_calculator_ukraine_1 = 0.05 }
			set_temp_variable = { army_transfer_calculator_ukr = army_transfer_ukr_lost }
			multiply_temp_variable = { army_transfer_calculator_ukr = 0.2 }
			set_temp_variable = { army_transfer_calculator_ukr_tt = army_transfer_calculator_ukr }
			multiply_temp_variable = { army_transfer_calculator_ukr_tt = 100 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = transfer_ukr_army_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				UKR = {
					transfer_units_fraction = {
						target = SOV
						size = army_transfer_calculator_ukr
						army_ratio = army_transfer_calculator_ukr
						stockpile_ratio = army_transfer_calculator_ukr
					}
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				annex_country = {
					target = UKR
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							check_variable = {
								var = stability_calculator_ukraine_1
								value = 0
								compare = equals
							}
						}
					}
					add_stability = stability_calculator_ukraine_1
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.219 hours = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_reinforce_imperial_ties_ukraine = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_ally_imperialist_coup

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = sympathize_with_ukraine
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = reinforce_imperial_ties_ukraine_tt
					NOT = {
						check_variable = {
							var = stability_hit_ukraine
							value = 3
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = reinforce_imperial_ties_ukraine_tt2
					NOT = {
						check_variable = {
							var = stability_hit_ukraine
							value = 3
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			UKR = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = UKR.CAPITAL
			}
		}

		cost = 20

		days_remove = 30

		remove_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { stability_calculator_ukraine_1 = stability_hit_ukraine }
			multiply_temp_variable = { stability_calculator_ukraine_1 = -5 }
			set_temp_variable = { stability_calculator_ukraine_2 = stability_hit_ukraine }
			multiply_temp_variable = { stability_calculator_ukraine_2 = -5 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = sympathize_with_ukraine
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = stability_ukr_upgrade_tt
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = stability_ukr_upgrade_original_tt
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = stability_hit_ukraine
				value = 1
			}
		}
	}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = reinforce_imperial_ties_georgia_tt
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						var = stability_hit_georgia
						value = 0
						compare = equals
					}
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			GEO = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = GEO.CAPITAL
			}
		}

		cost = 10

		days_remove = 15

		remove_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { stability_calculator_georgia = stability_hit_georgia }
			multiply_temp_variable = { stability_calculator_georgia = -3 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = stability_geo_upgrade_tt
			add_to_variable = {
				var = stability_hit_georgia
				value = 1
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_reinforce_imperial_ties_azr = {

	SOV_army_integration_ukraine = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_army_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = sympathize_with_ukraine
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = SOV_army_integration_ukraine1_tt
					check_variable = {
						var = stability_hit_ukraine
						value = 0
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = SOV_army_integration_ukraine2_tt
					check_variable = {
						var = stability_hit_ukraine
						value = 0
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = army_transfer_ukr_lost_tt
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						var = army_transfer_ukr_lost
						value = 5
						compare = equals
					}
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			UKR = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = UKR.CAPITAL
			}
		}

		cost = 20

		days_remove = 25

		remove_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { army_transfer_calculator_ukr = army_transfer_ukr_lost }
			multiply_temp_variable = { army_transfer_calculator_ukr = 20 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = army_transfer_calculator_ukr
						value = 100
						compare = less_than
					}
				}
				add_to_temp_variable = { army_transfer_calculator_ukr = 20 }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = army_integration_ukr_absorb_tt
			add_to_variable = {
				var = army_transfer_ukr_lost
				value = 1
			}
		}
	}

SOV_reintegrate_lost_states_decisions_ai = {

	SOV_integrate_ukraine_ai = {

		icon = GFX_decision_infiltrate_state

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			UKR = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			has_country_flag = preparation_done_russian_civil_war_russia2_ukr
		}

		visible = {
			has_country_flag = sympathize_with_ukraine
			UKR = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			country_exists = UKR
			is_ai = yes
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 75

		complete_effect = {
			SOV = {
				annex_country = {
					target = UKR
					transfer_troops = yes
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.219 hours = 1 }
				}
				clr_country_flag = ukraine_no_imperial_govern
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 250
		}
	}

	SOV_reintegrate_BLR_ai = {

		icon = GFX_decision_infiltrate_state

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			BLR = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			has_country_flag = preparation_done_russian_civil_war_russia2_blr
		}

		visible = {
			BLR = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			has_country_flag = control_belarus
			country_exists = BLR
			is_ai = yes
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 60

		complete_effect = {
			SOV = {
				annex_country = {
					target = BLR
					transfer_troops = yes
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.225 hours = 1 }
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 250
		}
	}

		icon = GFX_decision_infiltrate_state

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

			TMS = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			has_country_flag = preparation_done_russian_civil_war_russia2_tms

				is_subject_of = SOV

SOV_imperial_obligations = {

	SOV_impose_imperial_governorate = {

		icon = GFX_generic_political_discourse

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			FROM = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
				NOT = {
					has_autonomy_state = autonomy_imperial_governorates
					has_country_flag = ukraine_no_imperial_govern
					has_country_flag = germany_no_imperial_transform
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_idea = SOV_Tsar_we_trust
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_subject_of = SOV
				NOT = {
					has_autonomy_state = autonomy_imperial_governorates
					has_country_flag = ukraine_no_imperial_govern
					has_country_flag = germany_no_imperial_transform
				}
			}
		}

		available = {

		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_impose_imperial_governorate_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = FROM
					autonomy_state = autonomy_imperial_governorates
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

SOV_second_civil_war_during_bonus = {

	SOV_ask_country_guns = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_prepare_civil_war

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = weapons_limit_number_10
				has_equipment = {
					infantry_equipment < 10000
				}
			}
			command_power > 15
		}

		cost = 50

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100000
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_manpower < 100000
				NOT = {
					has_idea = SOV_Organize_volunteer_forces
				}
			}
		}

		days_re_enable = 50

		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				add_command_power = -15
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment_1
				amount = 4000
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_bonus_against_sou = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_civil_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			command_power > 25
		}

		cost = 30

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10000
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_manpower < 100000
				NOT = {
					has_idea = SOV_Organize_volunteer_forces
				}
			}
		}

		days_re_enable = 150

		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				add_command_power = -25
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = SOV_For_the_motherland_civil_war
				days = 100
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_organize_volunteer_forces = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_blackshirt_march

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		available = {
			command_power > 20
		}

		cost = 25

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10000
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_manpower > 500000
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				add_command_power = -20
			}
			add_ideas = SOV_Organize_volunteer_forces
		}
	}
}

			factor = 60
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_stability = -0.05
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_merge_fascist_women_and_blackshirts_tt
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = fascism
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			add_to_variable = { fascism_anastasy_konstantin = 0.05 }
			add_to_variable = { encryption_anastasy_konstantin = 0.1 }
			add_to_variable = { operative_anastasy_konstantin = 2 }
			set_country_flag = merged_fascist_women_and_blackshirts
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = fascist_women_modifiers }
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = fascist_security_modifiers }
				force_update_dynamic_modifier = yes
				remove_ideas = SOV_Blackshirts
				remove_ideas = SOV_Women_fascist_movement
				add_ideas = SOV_Otdel_bezopasnosti
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_propaganda_state = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_radio_oranje

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			has_country_flag = merged_fascist_women_and_blackshirts
			has_idea = SOV_Otdel_bezopasnosti
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = has_correct_level_3
				check_variable = {
					var = women_movement_influence_level
					value = 3
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = less_than_two_times_propaganda
				check_variable = {
					var = war_weekly_anastasy_konstantin
					value = 0.01
					compare = less_than
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			check_variable = {
				var = war_weekly_anastasy_konstantin
				value = 0.01
				compare = less_than
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 60
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_propaganda_state_tt
			add_to_variable = { war_weekly_anastasy_konstantin = 0.005 }
			force_update_dynamic_modifier = yes
		}
	}

			}

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_war_on_pacifism

		activation = {
			has_government = fascism

SOV_custom_formable_nations_endgame = {

	form_north_america_continent = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		available = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = north_america_fascist_nation_puppet
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			is_subject = no
		}


		fire_only_once = yes

	   ai_will_do = {
		   factor = 100
	   }

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = form_north_america_continent_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = north_america_fascist_nation_puppet
						NOT = {
							is_claimed_by = SOV
							is_core_of = SOV
						}
					}
					NAF = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = SOV_Impose_order
					}
					release_autonomy = {
						target = NAF
						autonomy_state = autonomy_state_magistrate
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 10
						neutrality = 10
						fascism = 70
						communism = 10
					}
				}
				else = {
					SOV = {
						release_autonomy = {
							target = NAF
							autonomy_state = autonomy_reichsprotectorate
							freedom_level = 0.5
						}
						set_popularities = {
							democratic = 10
							neutrality = 10
							fascism = 70
							communism = 10
						}
					}
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = north_america_fascist_nation_puppet
						is_claimed_by = SOV
					}
					NAF = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				NAF = {
					NAF_corps_commander_generation = yes
					if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_country_leader = {
									character = SOV_Konstantin_rodzaevsky
									ruling_only = yes
								}
							}
						}
						create_country_leader = {
							name = SOV_Administrative_departments_leader_north_america
							desc = SOV_Administrative_departments_leader_desc
							picture = "Provisional_Government_Fascism.dds"
							expire = "1953.3.1"
							ideology = fascism_ideology
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_idea = SOV_Impose_order
							}
						}
						NAF = {
							create_country_leader = {
								name = SOV_Anastasy_vonsyatsky
								desc = SOV_Anastasy_vonsyatsky_desc
								picture = "gfx/leaders/SOV/Portrait_Russia_Anastasy_Vonsyatsky.dds"
								expire = "1965.1.1"
								ideology = fascism_ideology
								traits = {
									russia2_different_kind_of_fascism
                                    dictator
                                    russia2_memories_america
								}
							}
							set_capital = {
								state = 366
							}
						}
					}
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "North American Order Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
							artillery_brigade = { x = 2 y = 2 }
							artillery_brigade = { x = 2 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 3 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 3 y = 1 }
							artillery_brigade = { x = 3 y = 2 }
							artillery_brigade = { x = 3 y = 3 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "North America Tank"
						priority = 2
						regiments = {
							medium_armor = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							medium_armor = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							medium_armor = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							medium_armor = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							medium_armor = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							medium_armor = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							medium_armor = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							medium_armor = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							medium_armor = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							medium_armor = { x = 1 y = 4 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 0 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 1 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 2 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 3 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 4 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 0 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 1 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 2 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 3 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							light_tank_recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st North American Order Division\" division_template = \"North American Order Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = NAF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd North American Order Division\" division_template = \"North American Order Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = NAF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd North American Order Division\" division_template = \"North American Order Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = NAF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {

							division = "name = \"4th North American Order Division\" division_template = \"North American Order Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

							division = "name = \"3rd North America Tank\" division_template = \"North America Tank\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = NAF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"4th North America Tank\" division_template = \"North America Tank\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = NAF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"5th North America Tank\" division_template = \"North America Tank\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = NAF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"6th North America Tank\" division_template = \"North America Tank\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = NAF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"7th North America Tank\" division_template = \"North America Tank\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = NAF
						}
					}
					add_ideas = CON_Unstable_continent
					news_event = { id = newsrussia2.137 hours = 12 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_government = fascism
						is_subject = no
						all_of_scopes = {
							array = global.russia_reworked_continents

							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						NOT = {
							is_in_array = { global.new_world_order_achievement = THIS }
						}
					}
					add_to_array = { global.new_world_order_achievement = THIS }
					set_variable = { global.new_world_order_achievement_date@THIS = global.date }
					set_country_flag = russia_reworked_new_achievement
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = russia_reworked_achievements_enabled
						}
						scoped_sound_effect = "russia_reworked_unlock_achievement"
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	form_central_america_continent = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		available = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = central_america_fascist_nation_puppet
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			is_subject = no
		}


		fire_only_once = yes

	   ai_will_do = {
		   factor = 100
	   }

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = form_central_america_continent_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = central_america_fascist_nation_puppet
						NOT = {
							is_claimed_by = SOV
							is_core_of = SOV
						}
					}
					CAF = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = SOV_Impose_order
					}
					release_autonomy = {
						target = CAF
						autonomy_state = autonomy_state_magistrate
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 10
						neutrality = 10
						fascism = 70
						communism = 10
					}
				}
				else = {
					SOV = {
						release_autonomy = {
							target = CAF
							autonomy_state = autonomy_reichsprotectorate
							freedom_level = 0.5
						}
						set_popularities = {
							democratic = 10
							neutrality = 10
							fascism = 70
							communism = 10
						}
					}
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = central_america_fascist_nation_puppet
						is_claimed_by = SOV
					}
					CAF = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				CAF = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_country_leader = {
									character = SOV_Konstantin_rodzaevsky
									ruling_only = yes
								}
							}
						}
						create_country_leader = {
							name = SOV_Administrative_departments_leader_central_america
							desc = SOV_Administrative_departments_leader_desc
							picture = "Provisional_Government_Fascism.dds"
							expire = "1953.3.1"
							ideology = fascism_ideology
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_idea = SOV_Impose_order
							}
						}
						create_country_leader = {
							name = SOV_State_magistrate_leader_central_america
							desc = SOV_State_magistrate_leader_desc
							picture = "Provisional_Government_Fascism.dds"
							expire = "1953.3.1"
							ideology = fascism_ideology
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "Central American Garrison Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Central American Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Central American Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = CAF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Central American Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Central American Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = CAF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Central American Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Central American Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = CAF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"4th Central American Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Central American Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = CAF
						}
					}
					add_ideas = CON_Unstable_continent
					news_event = { id = newsrussia2.137 hours = 12 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_government = fascism
						is_subject = no
						all_of_scopes = {
							array = global.russia_reworked_continents

							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						NOT = {
							is_in_array = { global.new_world_order_achievement = THIS }
						}
					}
					add_to_array = { global.new_world_order_achievement = THIS }
					set_variable = { global.new_world_order_achievement_date@THIS = global.date }
					set_country_flag = russia_reworked_new_achievement
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = russia_reworked_achievements_enabled
						}
						scoped_sound_effect = "russia_reworked_unlock_achievement"
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	form_south_america_continent = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		available = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = south_america_fascist_nation_puppet
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			is_subject = no
		}


		fire_only_once = yes

	   ai_will_do = {
		   factor = 100
	   }

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = form_south_america_continent_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = south_america_fascist_nation_puppet
						NOT = {
							is_claimed_by = SOV
							is_core_of = SOV
						}
					}
					SAR = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = SOV_Impose_order
					}
					release_autonomy = {
						target = SAR
						autonomy_state = autonomy_state_magistrate
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 10
						neutrality = 10
						fascism = 70
						communism = 10
					}
				}
				else = {
					SOV = {
						release_autonomy = {
							target = SAR
							autonomy_state = autonomy_reichsprotectorate
							freedom_level = 0.5
						}
						set_popularities = {
							democratic = 10
							neutrality = 10
							fascism = 70
							communism = 10
						}
					}
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = south_america_fascist_nation_puppet
						is_claimed_by = SOV
					}
					SAR = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				SAR = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_country_leader = {
									character = SOV_Konstantin_rodzaevsky
									ruling_only = yes
								}
							}
						}
						create_country_leader = {
							name = SOV_Administrative_departments_leader_south_america
							desc = SOV_Administrative_departments_leader_desc
							picture = "Provisional_Government_Fascism.dds"
							expire = "1953.3.1"
							ideology = fascism_ideology
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_idea = SOV_Impose_order
							}
						}
						create_country_leader = {
							name = SOV_State_magistrate_leader_south_america
							desc = SOV_State_magistrate_leader_desc
							picture = "Provisional_Government_Fascism.dds"
							expire = "1953.3.1"
							ideology = fascism_ideology
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "South American Jungle Guerrilla Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
							artillery_brigade = { x = 2 y = 2 }
							artillery_brigade = { x = 2 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 3 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 3 y = 1 }
							artillery_brigade = { x = 3 y = 2 }
							artillery_brigade = { x = 3 y = 3 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st South American Jungle Guerrilla Division\" division_template = \"South American Jungle Guerrilla Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SAR
						}

							division = "name = \"2nd South American Jungle Guerrilla Division\" division_template = \"South American Jungle Guerrilla Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

						}

							division = "name = \"3rd South American Jungle Guerrilla Division\" division_template = \"South American Jungle Guerrilla Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SAR
						}

							target = MEF
							autonomy_state = autonomy_reichsprotectorate
							freedom_level = 0.5
						}
						set_popularities = {
							democratic = 10
							neutrality = 10
							fascism = 70
							communism = 10
						}
					}
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = middle_east_fascist_nation_puppet
						is_claimed_by = SOV
					}
					MEF = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				MEF = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_country_leader = {
									character = SOV_Konstantin_rodzaevsky
									ruling_only = yes
								}
							}
						}
						create_country_leader = {
							name = SOV_Administrative_departments_leader_middle_east
							desc = SOV_Administrative_departments_leader_desc
							picture = "Provisional_Government_Fascism.dds"
							expire = "1953.3.1"
							ideology = fascism_ideology
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_idea = SOV_Impose_order
							}
						}
						create_country_leader = {
							name = SOV_State_magistrate_leader_middle_east
							desc = SOV_State_magistrate_leader_desc
							picture = "Provisional_Government_Fascism.dds"
							expire = "1953.3.1"
							ideology = fascism_ideology
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "Desert Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Desert Division\" division_template = \"Desert Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = MEF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Desert Division\" division_template = \"Desert Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = MEF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Desert Division\" division_template = \"Desert Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = MEF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"4th Desert Division\" division_template = \"Desert Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = MEF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"5th Desert Division\" division_template = \"Desert Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = MEF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"6th Desert Division\" division_template = \"Desert Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = MEF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"7th Desert Division\" division_template = \"Desert Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = MEF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"8th Desert Division\" division_template = \"Desert Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = MEF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"9th Desert Division\" division_template = \"Desert Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = MEF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"10th Desert Division\" division_template = \"Desert Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = MEF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"11th Desert Division\" division_template = \"Desert Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = MEF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"12th Desert Division\" division_template = \"Desert Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = MEF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"13th Desert Division\" division_template = \"Desert Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = MEF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"14th Desert Division\" division_template = \"Desert Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = MEF
						}
					}
					add_ideas = CON_Unstable_continent
					news_event = { id = newsrussia2.137 hours = 12 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_government = fascism
						is_subject = no
						all_of_scopes = {
							array = global.russia_reworked_continents

							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						NOT = {
							is_in_array = { global.new_world_order_achievement = THIS }
						}
					}
					add_to_array = { global.new_world_order_achievement = THIS }
					set_variable = { global.new_world_order_achievement_date@THIS = global.date }
					set_country_flag = russia_reworked_new_achievement
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = russia_reworked_achievements_enabled
						}
						scoped_sound_effect = "russia_reworked_unlock_achievement"
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	form_africa_russia_continent = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		available = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = africa_fascist_nation_puppet
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			is_subject = no
		}


		fire_only_once = yes

	   ai_will_do = {
		   factor = 100
	   }

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = form_africa_continent_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = africa_fascist_nation_puppet
						NOT = {
							is_claimed_by = SOV
							is_core_of = SOV
						}
					}
					AFF = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = SOV_Impose_order
					}
					release_autonomy = {
						target = AFF
						autonomy_state = autonomy_state_magistrate
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 10
						neutrality = 10
						fascism = 70
						communism = 10
					}
				}
				else = {
					SOV = {
						release_autonomy = {
							target = AFF
							autonomy_state = autonomy_reichsprotectorate
							freedom_level = 0.5
						}
						set_popularities = {
							democratic = 10
							neutrality = 10
							fascism = 70
							communism = 10
						}
					}
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = africa_fascist_nation_puppet
						is_claimed_by = SOV
					}
					AFF = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				AFF = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {

									character = SOV_Konstantin_rodzaevsky
									ruling_only = yes
								}
							}
						}

							name = SOV_Administrative_departments_leader_africa
							desc = SOV_Administrative_departments_leader_desc
							picture = "Provisional_Government_Fascism.dds"
							expire = "1953.3.1"
							ideology = fascism_ideology
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_idea = SOV_Impose_order
							}
						}
						create_country_leader = {
							name = SOV_State_magistrate_leader_africa
							desc = SOV_State_magistrate_leader_desc
							picture = "Provisional_Government_Fascism.dds"
							expire = "1953.3.1"
							ideology = fascism_ideology
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "African's Empire Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st African's Empire Division\" division_template = \"African's Empire Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = AFF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd African's Empire Division\" division_template = \"African's Empire Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = AFF
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd African's Empire Division\" division_template = \"African's Empire Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
