					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"18th Hindu's Division\" division_template = \"Hindu's Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SFR
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"19th Hindu's Division\" division_template = \"Hindu's Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SFR
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"20th Hindu's Division\" division_template = \"Hindu's Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SFR
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"21th Hindu's Division\" division_template = \"Hindu's Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SFR
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"22th Hindu's Division\" division_template = \"Hindu's Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SFR
						}
					}
					add_ideas = CON_Unstable_continent
					news_event = { id = newsrussia2.137 hours = 12 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_government = fascism
						is_subject = no
						all_of_scopes = {
							array = global.russia_reworked_continents

							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						NOT = {
							is_in_array = { global.new_world_order_achievement = THIS }
						}
					}
					add_to_array = { global.new_world_order_achievement = THIS }
					set_variable = { global.new_world_order_achievement_date@THIS = global.date }
					set_country_flag = russia_reworked_new_achievement
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = russia_reworked_achievements_enabled
						}
						scoped_sound_effect = "russia_reworked_unlock_achievement"
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	form_south_east_asia_russia_continent = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		available = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = south_east_asia_fascist_nation_puppet
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			is_subject = no
		}


		fire_only_once = yes

	   ai_will_do = {
		   factor = 100
	   }

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = form_south_east_asia_continent_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = south_east_asia_fascist_nation_puppet
						NOT = {
							is_claimed_by = SOV
							is_core_of = SOV
						}
					}
					SEA = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = SOV_Impose_order
					}
					release_autonomy = {
						target = SEA
						autonomy_state = autonomy_state_magistrate
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 10
						neutrality = 10
						fascism = 70
						communism = 10
					}
				}
				else = {
					SOV = {
						release_autonomy = {
							target = SEA
							autonomy_state = autonomy_reichsprotectorate
							freedom_level = 0.5
						}
						set_popularities = {
							democratic = 10
							neutrality = 10
							fascism = 70
							communism = 10
						}
					}
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = south_east_asia_fascist_nation_puppet
						is_claimed_by = SOV
					}
					SEA = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				SEA = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_country_leader = {
									character = SOV_Konstantin_rodzaevsky
									ruling_only = yes
								}
							}
						}
						create_country_leader = {
							name = SOV_Administrative_departments_leader_south_east_asia
							desc = SOV_Administrative_departments_leader_desc
							picture = "Provisional_Government_Fascism.dds"
							expire = "1953.3.1"
							ideology = fascism_ideology
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_idea = SOV_Impose_order
							}
						}
						create_country_leader = {
							name = SOV_State_magistrate_leader_south_east_asia
							desc = SOV_State_magistrate_leader_desc
							picture = "Provisional_Government_Fascism.dds"
							expire = "1953.3.1"
							ideology = fascism_ideology
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "Guerrilla Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Guerrilla Division\" division_template = \"Guerrilla Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SEA
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Guerrilla Division\" division_template = \"Guerrilla Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SEA
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Guerrilla Division\" division_template = \"Guerrilla Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SEA
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"4th Guerrilla Division\" division_template = \"Guerrilla Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SEA
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"5th Guerrilla Division\" division_template = \"Guerrilla Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SEA
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"6th Guerrilla Division\" division_template = \"Guerrilla Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SEA
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"7th Guerrilla Division\" division_template = \"Guerrilla Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SEA
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"8th Guerrilla Division\" division_template = \"Guerrilla Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SEA
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"9th Guerrilla Division\" division_template = \"Guerrilla Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SEA
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"10th Guerrilla Division\" division_template = \"Guerrilla Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {

							owner = SEA
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"12th Guerrilla Division\" division_template = \"Guerrilla Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SEA
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"13th Guerrilla Division\" division_template = \"Guerrilla Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SEA
						}
					}
					add_ideas = CON_Unstable_continent
					news_event = { id = newsrussia2.137 hours = 12 }

				if = {
					limit = {
						has_government = fascism
						is_subject = no

							array = global.russia_reworked_continents

							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						NOT = {
							is_in_array = { global.new_world_order_achievement = THIS }
						}
					}
					add_to_array = { global.new_world_order_achievement = THIS }
					set_variable = { global.new_world_order_achievement_date@THIS = global.date }
					set_country_flag = russia_reworked_new_achievement

	form_east_asia_russia_continent = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		available = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = east_asia_fascist_nation_puppet
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			is_subject = no
		}


		fire_only_once = yes

	   ai_will_do = {
		   factor = 100
	   }

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = form_east_asia_continent_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = east_asia_fascist_nation_puppet
						NOT = {
							is_claimed_by = SOV
							is_core_of = SOV
						}
					}
					EAR = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = SOV_Impose_order
					}
					release_autonomy = {
						target = EAR
						autonomy_state = autonomy_state_magistrate
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 10
						neutrality = 10
						fascism = 70
						communism = 10
					}
				}
				else = {

						release_autonomy = {
							target = EAR

							freedom_level = 0.5
						}

							democratic = 10
							neutrality = 10
							fascism = 70
							communism = 10
						}
					}

							}

									russia2_lawyer_leader russia2_memories_asia
								}
							}
							set_capital = {
								state = 761
							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_idea = SOV_Impose_order
							}
						}

							name = SOV_State_magistrate_leader_east_asia

					}

					division_template = {
						name = "East Asian Imperial Division"
						priority = 1

							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }

							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 3 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 3 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 3 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 3 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 3 y = 4 }

					add_to_array = { global.new_world_order_achievement = THIS }
					set_variable = { global.new_world_order_achievement_date@THIS = global.date }
					set_country_flag = russia_reworked_new_achievement
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_global_flag = russia_reworked_achievements_enabled
						}
						scoped_sound_effect = "russia_reworked_unlock_achievement"
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	form_oceania_russia_continent = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		available = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = oceania_fascist_nation_puppet
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			is_subject = no
		}


		fire_only_once = yes

	   ai_will_do = {
		   factor = 100
	   }

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = form_oceania_continent_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = oceania_fascist_nation_puppet
						NOT = {
							is_claimed_by = SOV
							is_core_of = SOV
						}
					}
					OCE = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = SOV_Impose_order
					}
					release_autonomy = {
						target = OCE
						autonomy_state = autonomy_state_magistrate
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 10
						neutrality = 10
						fascism = 70
						communism = 10
					}
				}
				else = {
					SOV = {
						release_autonomy = {
							target = OCE
							autonomy_state = autonomy_reichsprotectorate
							freedom_level = 0.5
						}
						set_popularities = {
							democratic = 10
							neutrality = 10
							fascism = 70
							communism = 10
						}
					}
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = oceania_fascist_nation_puppet
						is_claimed_by = SOV
					}
					OCE = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				OCE = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_country_leader = {
									character = SOV_Konstantin_rodzaevsky
									ruling_only = yes
								}
							}
						}
						create_country_leader = {
							name = SOV_Administrative_departments_leader_oceania
							desc = SOV_Administrative_departments_leader_desc
							picture = "Provisional_Government_Fascism.dds"
							expire = "1953.3.1"
							ideology = fascism_ideology
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_idea = SOV_Impose_order
							}
						}
						create_country_leader = {
							name = SOV_State_magistrate_leader_oceania
							desc = SOV_State_magistrate_leader_desc
							picture = "Provisional_Government_Fascism.dds"
							expire = "1953.3.1"
							ideology = fascism_ideology
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "Island Garrison Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Island Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Island Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = OCE
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Island Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Island Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = OCE
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Island Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Island Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = OCE
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"4th Island Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Island Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = OCE
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"5th Island Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Island Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = OCE
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"6th Island Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Island Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = OCE
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"7th Island Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Island Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = OCE
						}
					}
					add_ideas = CON_Unstable_continent
					news_event = { id = newsrussia2.137 hours = 12 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_government = fascism
						is_subject = no
						all_of_scopes = {
							array = global.russia_reworked_continents

							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						NOT = {
							is_in_array = { global.new_world_order_achievement = THIS }
						}
					}
					add_to_array = { global.new_world_order_achievement = THIS }
					set_variable = { global.new_world_order_achievement_date@THIS = global.date }
					set_country_flag = russia_reworked_new_achievement

						limit = {
							has_global_flag = russia_reworked_achievements_enabled
						}
						scoped_sound_effect = "russia_reworked_unlock_achievement"
					}

	SOV_integrate_american_puppet_north_america = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_nationalism

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		available = {
			NAF = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
		}

		visible = {
			NAF = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_subject_of = SOV
				NOT = {
					tag = NAF
					tag = CAF
					tag = SAR
					tag = CAI
					tag = MEF
					tag = AFF
					tag = SFR
					tag = SEA
					tag = EAR
					tag = EUR
					tag = OCE
				}
				any_state = {
					has_state_flag = north_america_fascist_nation_puppet
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = FROM
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_the_thoughts_of_many
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_subject_of = SOV
				NOT = {
					tag = NAF
					tag = CAF
					tag = SAR
					tag = CAI
					tag = MEF
					tag = AFF
					tag = SFR
					tag = SEA
					tag = EAR
					tag = EUR
					tag = OCE
				}
				any_state = {
					has_state_flag = north_america_fascist_nation_puppet
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = FROM
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do =  {
			factor = 100
		}

		complete_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_continent.1 days = 1}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_integrate_central_american_puppet_central_america = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_nationalism

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		available = {
			CAF = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
		}

		visible = {
			CAF = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_subject_of = SOV
				NOT = {
					tag = NAF
					tag = CAF
					tag = SAR
					tag = CAI
					tag = MEF
					tag = AFF
					tag = SFR
					tag = SEA
					tag = EAR
					tag = EUR
					tag = OCE
				}
				any_state = {
					has_state_flag = central_america_fascist_nation_puppet
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = FROM
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_the_thoughts_of_many

			FROM = {

				NOT = {

					tag = MEF
					tag = AFF
					tag = SFR
					tag = SEA
					tag = EAR
					tag = EUR
					tag = OCE
				}
				any_state = {

			factor = 100

	SOV_give_back_north_america_land = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_draw_up_staff_plans

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			NAF = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = north_america_fascist_nation_puppet
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			NAF = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = north_america_fascist_nation_puppet
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do =  {
			factor = 100
		}

		complete_effect = {
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					has_state_flag = north_america_fascist_nation_puppet
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					NOT = {
						is_core_of = SOV
					}
				}
				NAF = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}

					NOT = {
						is_core_of = SOV
					}

SOV_focus_fascist_russia_europe = {

	SOV_bonus_against_from_europe = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_war_on_pacifism

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_country_flag = SOV_fascist_focus_on_europe
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				is_controlled_by = FROM
				is_capital = yes
			}
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
				capital_scope = {
					is_on_continent = europe
				}
				OR = {
					OR = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
						is_justifying_wargoal_against = ROOT
						has_wargoal_against = ROOT
						is_neighbor_of = ROOT
					}
					ROOT = {
						OR = {
							is_justifying_wargoal_against = FROM
							has_wargoal_against = FROM
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
				capital_scope = {
					is_on_continent = europe
				}
				OR = {
					OR = {
						has_war_with = ROOT
						is_justifying_wargoal_against = ROOT
						has_wargoal_against = ROOT
						is_neighbor_of = ROOT
					}
					ROOT = {
						OR = {
							is_justifying_wargoal_against = FROM
							has_wargoal_against = FROM
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			FROM = {
				has_war_with = ROOT
			}
		}

		cost = 10

		days_remove = 100

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}

		targeted_modifier = {
			tag = FROM
			attack_bonus_against = 0.1
			defense_bonus_against = 0.1
		}
	}
}

					OR = {

SOV_expand_russian_dominance = {

	SOV_demande_border_state = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_tank

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		target_array = neighbors

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_new_russian_era
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_neighbor_of = ROOT
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_subject = yes
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_capitulated = yes
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				any_owned_state = {
					is_controlled_by = FROM
					is_capital = yes
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			FROM = {
				is_neighbor_of = ROOT
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_subject = yes
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_capitulated = yes
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				any_owned_state = {
					is_controlled_by = FROM
					is_capital = yes
				}
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = FROM
				is_capital = yes
			}
		}

		available = {
			is_major = yes
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_building_up_border_fascist
			}
			NOT = {
				FROM = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
					if = {
						limit = {
							ROOT = {
								has_idea = SOV_Closed_alliance
							}
						}
						has_country_flag = SOV_is_demanding_alliance
					}
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				add = -90
				has_war = yes
				OR = {
					any_country = {
						is_major = yes
						is_in_faction_with = FROM
					}
					any_country = {
						is_major = yes
						has_guaranteed = FROM
					}
					FROM = {
						is_major = yes
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = {
					alliance_strength_ratio > 1
				}
			}
		}

		war_with_target_on_remove = yes

		days_remove = 15

		cancel_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				FROM = {
					clr_country_flag = is_target_of_SOV_fascist
				}
				clr_country_flag = is_building_up_border_fascist
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			FROM = {
				clr_country_flag = is_target_of_SOV_fascist
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = russia2_russia.319
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_event_tooltip_fate_of
		}

		complete_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = russia2_russia.331
				set_country_flag = is_target_of_SOV_fascist
				activate_mission = SOV_is_building_up_against_from
				save_global_event_target_as = SOV_target_country_fascist
			}
			set_country_flag = is_building_up_border_fascist
		}
	}
}

SOV_third_rome_decision_categories = {

	SOV_form_third_rome = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_form_nation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		fire_only_once = yes


		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = enough_points_to_form_third_rome
				check_variable = {
					var = reformation_third_rome
					value = 6
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = THR
			custom_effect_tooltip = byzantine_legacy_tt
			set_country_flag = take_legacy_byzantine
			set_country_flag = has_formed_third_rome
			add_stability = 0.10
			hidden_effect = {
				news_event = { id = newsrussia2.129 hours = 10 }
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_integrate_romania_state_core = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_operation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		fire_only_once = yes


		available = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = romanian_state_third_rome
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_integrate_romania_state_core_tt
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 6
					766 = {
						is_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					78 = {
						is_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					80 = {
						is_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					79 = {
						is_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					46 = {
						is_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					77 = {
						is_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					76 = {
						is_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					84 = {
						is_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					83 = {
						is_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					82 = {
						is_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					81 = {
						is_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 100

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = gains_core_romania_land
			hidden_effect = {
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						has_state_flag = romanian_state_third_rome
					}
					SOV = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
			}

	SOV_demand_tannu_tuva_integration = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_nationalism

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		available = {
			country_exists = TAN
			TAN = {
				is_subject = no
			}
		}

		visible = {
			country_exists = TAN
		}

		cost = 25

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					any_country = {
						is_major = yes
						is_in_faction_with = TAN
					}
					any_country = {
						is_major = yes
						has_guaranteed = TAN
					}
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			TAN = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_tannu.6 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}

SOV_balkanize_germany = {

	SOV_release_bavaria = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		fire_only_once = yes


		available = {
			OR = {
				52 = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
				any_country = {
					owns_state = 52
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
			OR = {
				53 = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
				any_country = {
					owns_state = 53
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
			OR = {
				54 = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
				any_country = {
					owns_state = 54
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}

		complete_effect = {
			BAY = {
				add_state_core = 52
				add_state_core = 53
				add_state_core = 54
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = BAY
					any_country = {
						OR = {
							tag = SOV
							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						owns_state = PREV
					}
				}
				BAY = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = BAY
					autonomy_state = autonomy_reichsprotectorate
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				BAY = {
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "Bavarian Garrison Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Bavarian Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Bavarian Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = BAY
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Bavarian Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Bavarian Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = BAY
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Bavarian Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Bavarian Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = BAY
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		fire_only_once = yes


		available = {
			OR = {
				62 = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
				any_country = {
					owns_state = 62
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
			OR = {
				63 = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
				any_country = {
					owns_state = 63
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}

		complete_effect = {
			POM = {
				add_state_core = 62
				add_state_core = 63
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = POM
					any_country = {
						OR = {
							tag = SOV
							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						owns_state = PREV
					}
				}
				POM = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = POM
					autonomy_state = autonomy_reichsprotectorate
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				POM = {
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "Pomerania Garrison Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Pomerania Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Pomerania Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = POM
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Pomerania Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Pomerania Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = POM
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Pomerania Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Pomerania Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = POM
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

SOV_invite_neighbours = {

	SOV_demande_alliance = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_exchange_intelligence_data

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		target_array = neighbors #Doesn't seem to work that well so we add is_neighbor_of as well

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_idea = SOV_Closed_alliance
		}

		visible = {
			is_subject = no
			has_government = fascism
			is_faction_leader = yes
			has_idea = SOV_Closed_alliance
			FROM = {
				NOT = {
					is_major = yes
					is_subject = yes
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				is_neighbor_of = ROOT
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_major = yes
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_capitulated = yes
					is_subject = yes
				}
				any_owned_state = {
					is_controlled_by = FROM
					is_capital = yes
				}
				capital_scope = {
					is_in_home_area = yes
				}
			}
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_neighbor_of = ROOT
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_major = yes
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_capitulated = yes
					is_subject = yes
				}
				any_owned_state = {
					is_controlled_by = FROM
					is_capital = yes
				}
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = FROM
				is_capital = yes
			}
		}

		available = {
			is_major = yes
			NOT = {
				FROM = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
					if = {
						limit = {
							ROOT = {
								has_completed_focus = SOV_new_russian_era
							}
						}
						has_country_flag = is_target_of_SOV_fascist
					}
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = communism
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}

		complete_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = russia2_russia.353
				set_country_flag = SOV_is_demanding_alliance
			}
		}
	}
}

SOV_balkanize_japan = {

	SOV_release_shimazu = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		fire_only_once = yes


		available = {
			OR = {
				528 = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
				any_country = {
					owns_state = 528
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}

		complete_effect = {
			SHI = {
				add_state_core = 528
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = SHI
					any_country = {
						OR = {
							tag = SOV
							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						owns_state = PREV
					}
				}
				SHI = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = SHI
					autonomy_state = autonomy_reichsprotectorate
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				SHI = {
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "Shimazu Garrison Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}

						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Shimazu Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Shimazu Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

							division = "name = \"2nd Shimazu Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Shimazu Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

	SOV_release_hosokawa = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		fire_only_once = yes


		available = {
			OR = {
				530 = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
				any_country = {
					owns_state = 530
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}

		complete_effect = {
			HOS = {
				add_state_core = 530
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = HOS
					any_country = {
						OR = {
							tag = SOV
							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						owns_state = PREV
					}
				}
				HOS = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = HOS
					autonomy_state = autonomy_reichsprotectorate
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				HOS = {
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "Hosokawa Garrison Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Hosokawa Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Hosokawa Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Hosokawa Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Hosokawa Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

		complete_effect = {
			RYU = {
				add_state_core = 526
				add_state_core = 645
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = RYU
					any_country = {
						OR = {
							tag = SOV
							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						owns_state = PREV
					}
				}
				RYU = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = RYU
					autonomy_state = autonomy_reichsprotectorate
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				RYU = {
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "Ryukyu Garrison Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Ryukyu Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Ryukyu Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = RYU
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Ryukyu Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Ryukyu Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = RYU
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Ryukyu Garrison Division\" division_template = \"Ryukyu Garrison Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = RYU
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {

				}

		}

				}
			}
		}

		}

SOV_end_second_civil_war = {

	SOV_end_the_second_civil_war_decision = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_civil_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
		}

		available = {
			is_subject = no
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = UKR
				has_war_with = SOJ
				ukr_in_scw = yes
				soj_in_scw = yes
				UKR = {
					AND = {
						exists = yes
						check_variable = {
							var = ukr.scw_claimed_states^num
							value = 5
							compare = greater_than_or_equals
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			SOV = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_russia.260 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = japan_accept_to_help_give_russian_far_east
						has_country_flag = has_negotiated_with_germany_ressource_rights
						has_country_flag = accept_american_occupation_siberia_after_cw
						has_country_flag = accept_french_factories_after_cw
						has_country_flag = accept_diplomatic_relation_with_italy
						has_country_flag = accept_english_help_for_shipment
					}
				}
				SOV = {
					country_event = { id = russia2_generic.34 days = 7 }
				}
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = has_helped_whiteguard_by_volunteers
				}
				country_event = { id = russia2_generic.35 days = 1 }
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

SOV_fourth_international_council = {

	SOV_puppet_communist_influenced = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_exchange_intelligence_data

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
			has_completed_focus = SOV_fourth_int_council
			has_government = communism
			is_subject = no
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_government = communism
				has_country_flag = is_communist_triggered_revolution
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_fourth_int_council
		}

			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_government = communism
				has_country_flag = is_communist_triggered_revolution
				NOT = {

					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

			}
		}

			hidden_effect = {
				every_country = {

						has_civil_war = yes

					}

						add_to_war = {
							targeted_alliance = FROM
							enemy = PREV

					}

				}

	SOV_influence_country_communism3 = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_prepare_civil_war

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 10

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
			has_completed_focus = SOV_fourth_int_council
			has_government = communism
			is_subject = no
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_2
				has_country_flag = communist_influence_3_ready
				NOT = {
					has_civil_war = yes
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_war_with = ROOT
					has_government = communism
					is_subject_of = ROOT
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_1
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_3
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_fourth_int_council
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_2
				has_country_flag = communist_influence_3_ready
				NOT = {
					has_civil_war = yes
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_war_with = ROOT
					has_government = communism
					is_subject_of = ROOT
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_1
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_3
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = FROM
			}
			set_temp_variable = { from_army_size = FROM.num_battalions }
			set_temp_variable = { from_owned_controlled_states = FROM.owned_controlled_states }
			multiply_temp_variable = { from_owned_controlled_states = 1.5}
			round_temp_variable = from_owned_controlled_states
			multiply_temp_variable = { from_army_size = from_owned_controlled_states }
			clamp_temp_variable = {
				var = from_army_size
				min = 0
				max = 30000
			}
			has_equipment = {
				infantry_equipment > from_army_size
			}
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			has_war_with = FROM
		}

		modifier = {
			political_power_gain = -0.20
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { from_army_size = FROM.num_battalions }
			set_temp_variable = { from_owned_controlled_states = FROM.owned_controlled_states }
			multiply_temp_variable = { from_owned_controlled_states = 1.5}
			round_temp_variable = from_owned_controlled_states
			multiply_temp_variable = { from_army_size = from_owned_controlled_states }
			multiply_temp_variable = { from_army_size = -1 }
			clamp_temp_variable = {
				var = from_army_size
				min = -30000
				max = 0
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = from_army_size
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = russia2_russia.366
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10000
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = {
					communism < 0.25
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_influence_country_communism2 = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_speech

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 20

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
			has_completed_focus = SOV_fourth_int_council
			has_government = communism
			is_subject = no
			FROM = {
				exists = yes

				has_country_flag = communist_influence_2_ready
				NOT = {
					has_civil_war = yes
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_war_with = ROOT
					has_government = communism
					is_subject_of = ROOT
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_2
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_3
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_fourth_int_council
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_1
				has_country_flag = communist_influence_2_ready
				NOT = {
					has_civil_war = yes
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_war_with = ROOT
					has_government = communism
					is_subject_of = ROOT
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_2
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_3
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = FROM
			}
			set_temp_variable = { from_popularity_non_communism = 1 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { from_popularity_non_communism = FROM.party_popularity@communism }
			add_to_temp_variable = { from_popularity_non_communism = 4 }
			set_temp_variable = { from_stability = FROM.stability }
			add_to_temp_variable = { from_stability = 1 }
			set_temp_variable = { pp_spend = 25 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { pp_spend = from_stability }
			multiply_temp_variable = { pp_spend = from_popularity_non_communism }
			clamp_temp_variable = {
				var = pp_spend
				min = 0
				max = 500
			}
			has_political_power > pp_spend
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			has_war_with = FROM
		}

		modifier = {
			political_power_gain = -0.15
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { from_popularity_non_communism = 1 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { from_popularity_non_communism = FROM.party_popularity@communism }
			add_to_temp_variable = { from_popularity_non_communism = 4 }
			set_temp_variable = { from_stability = FROM.stability }
			add_to_temp_variable = { from_stability = 1 }
			set_temp_variable = { pp_spend = 25 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { pp_spend = from_stability }
			multiply_temp_variable = { pp_spend = from_popularity_non_communism }
			multiply_temp_variable = { pp_spend = -1 }
			clamp_temp_variable = {
				var = pp_spend
				min = -500
				max = 0
			}
			add_political_power = pp_spend
		}

		remove_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = russia2_russia.364
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1000
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = {
					communism < 0.15
				}
			}
		}
	}

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_propaganda_campaigns

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 30

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV

			is_faction_leader = yes
			has_completed_focus = SOV_fourth_int_council
			has_government = communism
			is_subject = no
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					has_civil_war = yes
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_war_with = ROOT
					has_government = communism
					is_subject_of = ROOT
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_1
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_2
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_3
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_fourth_int_council
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					has_civil_war = yes
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_war_with = ROOT
					has_government = communism
					is_subject_of = ROOT
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_1
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_2
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_3
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = FROM
			}
			set_temp_variable = { number_core_states_from = FROM.core_states }
			multiply_temp_variable = { number_core_states_from = 5 }
			clamp_temp_variable = {
				var = number_core_states_from
				min = 0
				max = 300
			}
			has_political_power > number_core_states_from
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			has_war_with = FROM
		}

		modifier = {
			political_power_gain = -0.1
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { number_core_states_from = FROM.core_states }
			multiply_temp_variable = { number_core_states_from = -5 }
			clamp_temp_variable = {
				var = number_core_states_from
				min = -300
				max = 0
			}
			add_political_power = number_core_states_from
		}

		remove_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = russia2_russia.362
				set_country_flag = SOV_AI_is_target_international
			}
			set_country_flag = SOV_AI_is_influencing_international
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = SOV_AI_is_target_international
			}
		}
	}
}

SOV_communist_influence_international = {

	SOV_end_communist_threat = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_independence

		fire_only_once = yes

		visible = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = communism
			}
			OR = {
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_1
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_2
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_3
			}
        }

        available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = communist_party_threat_big_enough
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = communist_influence_2_ready
						days > 100
					}
					communism > 0.2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_1
				}
				communism < 0.05
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_2
				}
				communism < 0.15
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_3
				}
				communism < 0.25
			}
        }

        complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_1
				}
				remove_ideas = SOV_Communist_influence_international_1
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_2
				}
				remove_ideas = SOV_Communist_influence_international_2
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_3
				}
				remove_ideas = SOV_Communist_influence_international_3
			}
            country_event = russia2_russia.368
        }

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1000000
		}
	}

	SOV_ask_overlord_help_communism = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_political_discourse

		fire_only_once = yes

		visible = {
            is_subject = yes
			NOT = {
				has_government = communism
			}
			OR = {
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_1
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_2
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_3
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_subject = yes
				}
				OVERLORD = {
					NOT = {
						has_government = communism
					}
				}
			}
        }

        cost = 50

		target_root_trigger = {
			is_subject = yes
			OR = {
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_1
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_2
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_3
			}
		}

		target_trigger = {
			ROOT = {
				is_subject_of = FROM
			}
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
			}
		}

        }

            OVERLORD = {
				country_event = russia2_russia.377
			}
        }

			factor = 1000000
		}

	SOV_bully_neutrality_party = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_political_rally

		fire_only_once = yes

		visible = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = communism
				has_government = neutrality
			}
			OR = {
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_1
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_2
				has_idea = SOV_Communist_influence_international_3
			}
        }

		days_remove = 60

        available = {
            NOT = {
				has_government = neutrality
				has_country_flag = bullying_other_party
			}
        }

		modifier = {
			neutrality_drift = -0.10
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { root_neutrality_pop = party_popularity@neutrality }
			divide_temp_variable = { root_neutrality_pop = -2 }
			clamp_temp_variable = {
				var = root_neutrality_pop
				min = -1
				max = -0.05
			}
			add_stability = root_neutrality_pop
			set_country_flag = bullying_other_party
		}

        remove_effect = {
            add_popularity = {
				ideology = communism
				popularity = -0.10
			}
			clr_country_flag = bullying_other_party
        }

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

SOV_iron_curtain = {

	SOV_influence_country_iron_curtain = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_political_discourse

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
			has_completed_focus = SOV_iron_curtain_focus
			has_government = communism
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_government = communism
				}
				is_major = no
				capital_scope = {
					is_on_continent = europe
				}
				OR = {
					is_neighbor_of = ROOT
					any_country = {
						is_neighbor_of = FROM
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				communism < 0.3
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_iron_curtain_focus
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_government = communism
				}
				is_major = no
				capital_scope = {
					is_on_continent = europe
				}
				OR = {
					is_neighbor_of = ROOT
					any_country = {
						is_neighbor_of = FROM
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				communism < 0.3
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_war = no
		}

		cost = 150

		complete_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = russia2_russia.381
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_puppet_country_iron_curtain = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_demand

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
			has_completed_focus = SOV_iron_curtain_focus
			has_government = communism
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_government = communism
				has_country_flag = is_communist_civil_war_iron_curtain
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_iron_curtain_focus
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_government = communism
				has_country_flag = is_communist_civil_war_iron_curtain
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = FROM
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			FROM = {
				NOT = {
					has_idea = SOV_Cold_civil_war
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						has_civil_war = yes
						has_war_with = FROM
						original_tag = FROM
						has_country_flag = civil_war_iron_curtain
					}
					SOV = {
						add_to_war = {
							targeted_alliance = FROM
							enemy = PREV
							hostility_reason = asked_to_join
						}
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				SOV = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = FROM
						autonomy_state = autonomy_soviet_republic
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 10
						neutrality = 10
						fascism = 10
						communism = 70
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						has_civil_war = yes
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = join_civil_war_from
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_careful_next_infiltration = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_speech

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			NOT = {

			}

			base = 1
			modifier = {
				add = 24
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_AI_CHAOS_REUNIFY_RUSSIA_ANARCHIST_BEHAVIOR
					has_country_flag = RUS_AI_CHAOS_FULL_RUSSIAN_LEAGUE_ANARCHIST_BEHAVIOR
					has_country_flag = RUS_AI_CHAOS_SHARED_RUSSIAN_LEAGUE_ANARCHIST_BEHAVIOR
				}
			}
		}
	}

			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_initiate_raid_capital_available_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = population_support_black_revolution
					value = 100
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			SOV = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_russia.413 }
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = anarchy
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					division_template = {
						name = "Patrul'nyy Ttryad Militsii"
						is_locked = yes
						division_names_group = SOV_CAV_01

						regiments = {
							cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }

							cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
						}
						support = 	{
							military_police = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						}
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 10
						neutrality = 10
						fascism = 10
						communism = 50
						anarchy = 20
					}
					set_cosmetic_tag = ANAC
					clr_country_flag = civil_war_black_revolution
					remove_ideas = SOV_Anarchist_terrorist
					remove_ideas = SOV_army_disorganisation

					dismantle_faction = yes
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Strelkovaya Diviziya"
					}

						division_template = "Gornostrelkovaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Motostrelkovaya Diviziya"
					}

						division_template = "Kavaleriyskaya Diviziya"
					}

						division_template = "NKVD Pogranichnaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Mekhanizirovaniy Korpus"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Mekhanizirovaniy Korpus"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Vozdushno-Desantnaya Brigada"
					}
					every_character = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								is_character = SOV_Georgy_zhukov
								is_character = SOV_Aleksandr_vasilevsky
								is_character = SOV_Boris_shaposhnikov
								is_character = SOV_Nikolai_vatutin
								is_character = SOV_Ivan_konev
								is_character = SOV_Semyon_timoshenko
								is_character = SOV_Kliment_voroshilov_military
								is_character = SOV_Kliment_voroshilov_advisor
								is_character = SOV_Mikhail_tukhachevsky
								is_character = SOV_Semyon_budyonny
								is_character = SOV_Ivan_chernyakhovsky
								is_character = SOV_Issa_pliyev
								is_character = SOV_Leonid_govorov
								is_character = SOV_Grigory_kulik
								is_character = SOV_Kirill_meretskov

								is_character = SOV_Andrey_yeryomenko

								is_character = SOV_Yakov_cherevichenko
								is_character = SOV_Nikandr_chibisov
								is_character = SOV_Vasily_kuznetsov
								is_character = SOV_Ivan_fedyuninsky

								is_character = SOV_Kuzma_galitsky
								is_character = SOV_Markian_popov
								is_character = SOV_Nikolai_berzarin
								is_character = SOV_Kirill_moskalenko
								is_character = SOV_Dmitry_lelyushenko

								is_character = SOV_Rodion_malinovsky
								is_character = SOV_Vasily_chuikov
								is_character = SOV_Konstantin_rokossovsky
								is_character = SOV_Andrey_vlasov
								is_character = SOV_Ivan_kononov
								is_character = SOV_Alexander_gorbatov
								is_character = SOV_Vasily_blyukher
								is_character = SOV_Alexander_yegorov
								is_character = SOV_Maks_reyter
							}
						}
						set_character_flag = SOV_character_agains_anarchist_government
					}

			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				add = -100
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_AI_CHAOS_REUNIFY_RUSSIA_ANARCHIST_BEHAVIOR

	SOV_control_state_decision_black_revolution = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		on_map_mode = map_only

		state_target = yes

		target_array = SOV.sov_get_black_revolution_states

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = anarchy
			}
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = SOV_end_revoltion_anarchy
				has_government = anarchy
			}
			has_completed_focus = SOV_black_guard
		}

		available = {
			FROM = {
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = anarchist_state_black_revolution
				}
			}
			has_full_control_of_state = FROM
			check_variable = {
				var = army_vigiliance_black_revolution
				value = 100
				compare = less_than
			}
		}

		days_remove = 5

		cost = 10

		fire_only_once = yes

		cancel_if_not_visible = yes

		fixed_random_seed = no

		complete_effect = {
			FROM = {
				set_state_flag = anarchist_state_black_revolution
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = control_state_futur_revolution

				limit = {
					FROM = {
						has_state_flag = high_risk_state_black_revolution

				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = be_careful_black_revolution
					}
					add_to_variable = {
						var = population_support_black_revolution
						value = 5
					}
					custom_effect_tooltip = population_support_5_tt
					random_list = {
						15 = {
							custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_army_vigilance_0

							add_to_variable = {

							}
							custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_army_vigilance_2
						}
						55 = {
							add_to_variable = {
								var = army_vigiliance_black_revolution
								value = 5
							}
							custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_army_vigilance_5
						}
						5 = {
							add_to_variable = {
								var = army_vigiliance_black_revolution
								value = 8
							}
							custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_army_vigilance_8
						}
					}
					clr_country_flag = be_careful_black_revolution
				}
				else = {
					add_to_variable = {
						var = population_support_black_revolution
						value = 4
					}
					custom_effect_tooltip = population_support_4_tt

						5 = {
							custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_army_vigilance_0
						}
						15 = {
							add_to_variable = {
								var = army_vigiliance_black_revolution
								value = 2
							}
							custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_army_vigilance_2
						}
						50 = {
							add_to_variable = {
								var = army_vigiliance_black_revolution
								value = 5
							}
							custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_army_vigilance_5

	SOV_start_civil_war_black_guard = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_ignite_civil_war

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = army_vigiliance_black_revolution_start_sooner_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = army_vigiliance_black_revolution
					value = 70
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = army_vigiliance_black_revolution
					value = 80
					compare = less_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {

		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = has_choose_to_start_earlier
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_start_civil_war_black_guard_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				division_template = {
					name = "Patrul'nyy Ttryad Militsii"
					is_locked = no
					division_names_group = SOV_CAV_01

					regiments = {
						cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						cavalry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					}
					support = 	{
						military_police = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					}
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = SOV
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = anarchist_state_black_revolution
						}
					}
					SOJ = {
						add_state_core = PREV
						set_cosmetic_tag = SOJC
					}
				}
				SOV = {
					every_character = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								is_character = SOV_Georgy_zhukov
								is_character = SOV_Aleksandr_vasilevsky
								is_character = SOV_Boris_shaposhnikov
								is_character = SOV_Nikolai_vatutin
								is_character = SOV_Ivan_konev
								is_character = SOV_Semyon_timoshenko
								is_character = SOV_Kliment_voroshilov_military
								is_character = SOV_Kliment_voroshilov_advisor
								is_character = SOV_Mikhail_tukhachevsky
								is_character = SOV_Semyon_budyonny
								is_character = SOV_Ivan_chernyakhovsky
								is_character = SOV_Issa_pliyev
								is_character = SOV_Leonid_govorov
								is_character = SOV_Grigory_kulik
								is_character = SOV_Kirill_meretskov
								is_character = SOV_Filipp_golikov
								is_character = SOV_Andrey_yeryomenko
								is_character = SOV_Georgiy_zakharov
								is_character = SOV_Yakov_cherevichenko
								is_character = SOV_Nikandr_chibisov
								is_character = SOV_Vasily_kuznetsov
								is_character = SOV_Ivan_fedyuninsky
								is_character = SOV_Maksim_purkayev
								is_character = SOV_Kuzma_galitsky
								is_character = SOV_Markian_popov
								is_character = SOV_Nikolai_berzarin
								is_character = SOV_Kirill_moskalenko
								is_character = SOV_Dmitry_lelyushenko
								is_character = SOV_Andrei_grechko
								is_character = SOV_Rodion_malinovsky
								is_character = SOV_Vasily_chuikov
								is_character = SOV_Konstantin_rokossovsky
								is_character = SOV_Andrey_vlasov
								is_character = SOV_Ivan_kononov
								is_character = SOV_Alexander_gorbatov
							}
						}
						set_character_flag = sov_character_switched_to_sou
						set_nationality = SOJ
					}
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = anarchy
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 10
						neutrality = 10
						fascism = 10
						communism = 50
						anarchy = 20
					}
					add_country_leader_role = {
						character = SOV_Peoples_council_commune
						promote_leader = yes
						country_leader = {
							desc = SOV_Peoples_council_commune_desc
							ideology = anarchist
							expire = "1965.1.1.1"
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					release = SOJ
					set_country_flag = black_revolution_turned_civil_war
					set_country_flag = black_revolution_civil_war_in_progress
					set_cosmetic_tag = ANAC
					clr_country_flag = civil_war_black_revolution
					remove_ideas = SOV_Anarchist_terrorist
					remove_ideas = SOV_army_disorganisation
					remove_ideas = SOV_Home_of_revolution_russia2
					add_ideas = extensive_conscription
					add_ideas = SOV_Determination
					add_ideas = SOV_Surprise_attack_black_revolution
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.404 hours = 1 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.405 hours = 1 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.406 hours = 2 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.407 hours = 2 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.408 hours = 1 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.411 hours = 2 }
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Strelkovaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Gornostrelkovaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Motostrelkovaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Kavaleriyskaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "NKVD Pogranichnaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Mekhanizirovaniy Korpus"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Vozdushno-Desantnaya Brigada"
					}
					dismantle_faction = yes
					retire_ideology_leader = communism
					destroy_ships = {
						type = destroyer
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = ship_hull_submarine
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = ship_hull_heavy_1
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = light_cruiser
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = destroyer_1
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = submarine_1
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = battleship_1
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = light_cruiser_1
						count = all
					}
					every_army_leader = {
						retire = yes
					}
				}
				SOJ = {
					declare_war_on = {
						target = SOV
						type = annex_everything
					}
					add_ideas = SOV_Slow_industry
					add_ideas = SOV_Damaged_railway
					add_ideas = SOV_Low_support_black_revolution
					inherit_technology = SOV
					unlock_national_focus = SOV_great_purge2
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = SOV
					}
					SOJ = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = SOJ
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = anarchist_state_black_revolution
						}
					}
					SOV = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}

	SOV_the_black_civil_war_timeout = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_ignite_civil_war

		allowed = {
			tag = SOV
		}

		activation = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_black_guard
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = army_vigiliance_black_revolution_timeout_tt
				check_variable = {
					var = army_vigiliance_black_revolution
					value = 100
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = has_choose_to_start_earlier
				has_government = anarchy
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_mission_timeout = 70

		is_good = no

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_the_black_revolution_timeout_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				division_template = {
					name = "Patrul'nyy Ttryad Militsii"
					is_locked = no
					division_names_group = SOV_CAV_01

					regiments = {
						cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						cavalry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					}
					support = 	{
						military_police = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					}
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = SOV
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = anarchist_state_black_revolution
						}
					}
					SOJ = {
						add_state_core = PREV
						set_cosmetic_tag = SOJC
					}
				}
				SOV = {
					every_character = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								is_character = SOV_Georgy_zhukov
								is_character = SOV_Aleksandr_vasilevsky

								is_character = SOV_Semyon_budyonny
								is_character = SOV_Ivan_chernyakhovsky

								is_character = SOV_Leonid_govorov
								is_character = SOV_Grigory_kulik
								is_character = SOV_Kirill_meretskov
								is_character = SOV_Filipp_golikov
								is_character = SOV_Andrey_yeryomenko
								is_character = SOV_Georgiy_zakharov
								is_character = SOV_Yakov_cherevichenko

								is_character = SOV_Vasily_kuznetsov

								is_character = SOV_Maks_reyter
							}
						}
						set_character_flag = sov_character_switched_to_sou
						set_nationality = SOJ
					}
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = anarchy
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 10
						neutrality = 10
						fascism = 10
						communism = 50
						anarchy = 20
					}
					add_country_leader_role = {
						character = SOV_Supreme_military_council
						promote_leader = yes
						country_leader = {
							desc = SOV_Supreme_military_council_desc
							ideology = anarchist
							expire = "1965.1.1.1"
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					release = SOJ
					set_cosmetic_tag = ANAC
					set_country_flag = black_revolution_turned_civil_war
					set_country_flag = black_revolution_civil_war_in_progress
					clr_country_flag = civil_war_black_revolution
					remove_ideas = SOV_Anarchist_terrorist
					remove_ideas = SOV_army_disorganisation
					remove_ideas = SOV_Home_of_revolution_russia2
					add_ideas = extensive_conscription
					add_ideas = SOV_Determination
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.404 hours = 1 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.405 hours = 1 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.406 hours = 2 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.407 hours = 2 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.408 hours = 1 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.411 hours = 2 }
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Strelkovaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Gornostrelkovaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Motostrelkovaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Kavaleriyskaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "NKVD Pogranichnaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Mekhanizirovaniy Korpus"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Vozdushno-Desantnaya Brigada"
					}
					dismantle_faction = yes
					retire_ideology_leader = communism
					destroy_ships = {
						type = destroyer
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = ship_hull_submarine_1
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = ship_hull_submarine_2
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = ship_hull_heavy_1
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = light_cruiser
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = destroyer_1
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = submarine_1
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = battleship_1
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = light_cruiser_1
						count = all
					}
					every_army_leader = {
						retire = yes
					}
				}
				SOJ = {
					declare_war_on = {
						target = SOV
						type = annex_everything
					}
					add_ideas = SOV_Slow_industry
					add_ideas = SOV_Damaged_railway
					add_ideas = SOV_Low_support_black_revolution
					inherit_technology = SOV
					unlock_national_focus = SOV_great_purge2
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = SOV
					}
					SOJ = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = SOJ
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = anarchist_state_black_revolution
						}
					}
					SOV = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
			}
		}

		timeout_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_army_vigilance_100
			add_to_variable = {
				var = army_vigiliance_black_revolution
				value = 100
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				division_template = {
					name = "Patrul'nyy Ttryad Militsii"
					is_locked = no
					division_names_group = SOV_CAV_01

					regiments = {
						cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						cavalry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					}
					support = 	{
						military_police = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					}
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = SOV
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = anarchist_state_black_revolution
						}
					}
					SOJ = {
						add_state_core = PREV
						set_cosmetic_tag = SOJC
					}
				}
				SOV = {
					every_character = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								is_character = SOV_Georgy_zhukov
								is_character = SOV_Aleksandr_vasilevsky
								is_character = SOV_Boris_shaposhnikov
								is_character = SOV_Nikolai_vatutin
								is_character = SOV_Ivan_konev
								is_character = SOV_Semyon_timoshenko
								is_character = SOV_Kliment_voroshilov_military
								is_character = SOV_Kliment_voroshilov_advisor
								is_character = SOV_Mikhail_tukhachevsky
								is_character = SOV_Semyon_budyonny
								is_character = SOV_Ivan_chernyakhovsky
								is_character = SOV_Issa_pliyev
								is_character = SOV_Leonid_govorov
								is_character = SOV_Grigory_kulik
								is_character = SOV_Kirill_meretskov
								is_character = SOV_Filipp_golikov
								is_character = SOV_Andrey_yeryomenko
								is_character = SOV_Georgiy_zakharov
								is_character = SOV_Yakov_cherevichenko
								is_character = SOV_Nikandr_chibisov
								is_character = SOV_Vasily_kuznetsov
								is_character = SOV_Ivan_fedyuninsky
								is_character = SOV_Maksim_purkayev
								is_character = SOV_Kuzma_galitsky
								is_character = SOV_Markian_popov
								is_character = SOV_Nikolai_berzarin
								is_character = SOV_Kirill_moskalenko
								is_character = SOV_Dmitry_lelyushenko
								is_character = SOV_Andrei_grechko
								is_character = SOV_Rodion_malinovsky
								is_character = SOV_Vasily_chuikov
								is_character = SOV_Konstantin_rokossovsky
								is_character = SOV_Andrey_vlasov
								is_character = SOV_Ivan_kononov
								is_character = SOV_Alexander_gorbatov
								is_character = SOV_Vasily_blyukher
								is_character = SOV_Alexander_yegorov
								is_character = SOV_Maks_reyter
							}
						}
						set_character_flag = sov_character_switched_to_sou
						set_nationality = SOJ
					}
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = anarchy
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 10
						neutrality = 10
						fascism = 10
						communism = 50
						anarchy = 20
					}
					add_country_leader_role = {
						character = SOV_Supreme_military_council
						promote_leader = yes
						country_leader = {
							desc = SOV_Supreme_military_council_desc
							ideology = anarchist
							expire = "1965.1.1.1"
							traits = {

							}
						}
					}
					release = SOJ
					set_cosmetic_tag = ANAC
					set_country_flag = black_revolution_turned_civil_war
					set_country_flag = black_revolution_civil_war_in_progress
					clr_country_flag = civil_war_black_revolution
					remove_ideas = SOV_Anarchist_terrorist
					remove_ideas = SOV_army_disorganisation
					remove_ideas = SOV_Home_of_revolution_russia2
					add_ideas = extensive_conscription
					add_ideas = SOV_Determination
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.404 hours = 1 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.405 hours = 1 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.406 hours = 2 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.407 hours = 2 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.408 hours = 1 }
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.411 hours = 2 }
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Strelkovaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Gornostrelkovaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Motostrelkovaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Kavaleriyskaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "NKVD Pogranichnaya Diviziya"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Mekhanizirovaniy Korpus"
					}
					delete_unit_template_and_units = {
						division_template = "Vozdushno-Desantnaya Brigada"
					}
					dismantle_faction = yes
					retire_ideology_leader = communism
					destroy_ships = {
						type = destroyer
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = ship_hull_submarine_1
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = ship_hull_submarine_2
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = ship_hull_heavy_1
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = light_cruiser
						count = all
					}
					destroy_ships = {
						type = destroyer_1
						count = all
					}

						type = submarine_1
						count = all

					destroy_ships = {
						type = battleship_1
						count = all
