SOV_crush_the_anti_revolutionary = {

	SOV_recon_the_area = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_political_discourse

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		on_map_mode = map_only

		state_target = yes

		target_array = SOV.sov_recon_rebel_anarchy_states

		visible = {
			FROM = {
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = recon_units_scout_place
				}
			}
			PREV = {
				NOT = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = found_small_base_1
						has_country_flag = found_small_base_2
						has_country_flag = found_small_base_3
						has_country_flag = found_medium_base_1
						has_country_flag = found_medium_base_2
						has_country_flag = found_large_base
					}
				}
			}

		}

		days_remove = 7

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 7

		available = {
			NOT = {
				PREV = {
					has_country_flag = doing_recon_area
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			FROM = {
				set_state_flag = recon_units_scout_place
			}
			PREV = {
				set_country_flag = doing_recon_area
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_recon_the_area_tt
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						has_state_flag = small_counter_revolution_resistance_1
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					save_event_target_as = SOV_successful_recon_small
					set_state_flag = found_small_counter_revolution_base_1
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					PREV = {
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.416 }
						set_country_flag = found_small_base_1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						has_state_flag = small_counter_revolution_resistance_2
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					save_event_target_as = SOV_successful_recon_small
					set_state_flag = found_small_counter_revolution_base_2
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					PREV = {
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.416 }
						set_country_flag = found_small_base_2
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						has_state_flag = small_counter_revolution_resistance_3
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					save_event_target_as = SOV_successful_recon_small
					set_state_flag = found_small_counter_revolution_base_3
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					PREV = {
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.416 }
						set_country_flag = found_small_base_3
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						has_state_flag = medium_counter_revolution_resistance_1
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					save_event_target_as = SOV_successful_recon_medium
					set_state_flag = found_medium_counter_revolution_base_1
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					PREV = {
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.417 }
						set_country_flag = found_medium_base_1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						has_state_flag = medium_counter_revolution_resistance_2
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					save_event_target_as = SOV_successful_recon_medium
					set_state_flag = found_medium_counter_revolution_base_2
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					PREV = {
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.417 }
						set_country_flag = found_medium_base_2
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						has_state_flag = large_counter_revolution_resistance_1
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					save_event_target_as = SOV_successful_recon_large
					set_state_flag = found_large_counter_revolution_base
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					PREV = {
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.418 }
						set_country_flag = found_large_base
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						NOT = {
							has_state_flag = small_counter_revolution_resistance_1
							has_state_flag = small_counter_revolution_resistance_2
							has_state_flag = small_counter_revolution_resistance_3
							has_state_flag = medium_counter_revolution_resistance_1
							has_state_flag = medium_counter_revolution_resistance_2
							has_state_flag = large_counter_revolution_resistance_1
						}
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					save_event_target_as = SOV_unsuccessful_recon_anti_rev
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					PREV = {
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.415 }
					}
				}
			}
			PREV = {
				clr_country_flag = doing_recon_area
			}
			remove_from_array = { SOV.sov_recon_rebel_anarchy_states = FROM }
        }

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}

	SOV_raid_small_base_1 = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_intelligence_operation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		on_map_mode = map_and_decisions_view

		state_target = yes

		target_array = SOV.sov_small_base_resistance_states_1

		visible = {
			FROM = {
				has_state_flag = found_small_counter_revolution_base_1
			}
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = less_division_small
				divisions_in_state = {
					size < 25
					state = FROM
				}
			}
		}

		days_remove = 7

		available = {
			divisions_in_state = {
				size > 24
				state = FROM
			}
			has_completed_focus = SOV_crush_antirevolutionary
		}

		complete_effect = {

		}

		remove_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = destroyed_base_tt
			FROM = {
				save_event_target_as = SOV_raid_is_done
				clr_state_flag = small_counter_revolution_resistance_1
				clr_state_flag = found_small_counter_revolution_base_1
			}
			SOV = {
				set_country_flag = cleared_small_base_1
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = anarchy
					popularity = 0.05
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.431 }
				}
			}
			remove_from_array = { SOV.sov_small_base_resistance_states_1 = FROM }
        }

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}

				}
			}
			remove_from_array = { SOV.sov_medium_base_resistance_states_1 = FROM }
        }

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}

	SOV_raid_medium_base_2 = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_intelligence_operation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

				tooltip = cleared_all_medium_base

				has_country_flag = cleared_medium_base_2
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = cleared_all_large_base
				has_country_flag = cleared_large_base
			}
		}

		}

			remove_ideas = SOV_Anti_revolutionary
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = anarchy
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_raid_headquarters_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				SOV = {
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.419 }
				}
			}
			clear_array = SOV.sov_recon_rebel_anarchy_states
        }

			factor = 10
		}
	}

	SOV_counter_revolutionary_raid = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_scorched_earth

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = SOV_Anti_revolutionary
			}
		}

		activation = {
			has_idea = SOV_Anti_revolutionary
		}

		days_mission_timeout = 60

		is_good = no

		timeout_effect = {
			SOV = {
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
					type = infantry_equipment
					amount = -750
				}
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
					type = support_equipment
					amount = -25
				}
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
					type = artillery_equipment
					amount = -25
				}
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
					type = motorized_equipment
					amount = -50
				}
				random_owned_controlled_state = {
					limit = {
						non_damaged_building_level = {
							building = industrial_complex level > 0
						}
					}
					damage_building = {
						type = industrial_complex damage = 1
					}
				}
				random_owned_controlled_state = {
					limit = {
						non_damaged_building_level = {
							building = arms_factory level > 0
						}
					}
					damage_building = {
						type = arms_factory damage = 1
					}
				}
				random_owned_controlled_state = {
					limit = {
						non_damaged_building_level = {
							building = infrastructure level > 1
						}
					}
					damage_building = {
						type = infrastructure
						damage = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {

		}
	}
}

				has_country_flag = put_bounty_bandits_western_russia
				has_country_flag = dealt_with_western_russia_bandits
			}
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				divisions_in_state = { #10
					size < 10
					state = 202
				}
				divisions_in_state = { #20
					size < 10
					state = 195
				}
				divisions_in_state = { #25
					size < 5
					state = 206
				}
				divisions_in_state = { #30
					size < 5
					state = 200
				}
				divisions_in_state = { #35
					size < 5
					state = 137
				}
				divisions_in_state = { #40
					size < 5
					state = 242
				}
				divisions_in_state = { #45
					size < 5
					state = 227
				}
				divisions_in_state = { #50
					size < 5
					state = 241
				}
				has_country_flag = put_bounty_bandits_western_russia
				has_country_flag = dealt_with_western_russia_bandits
			}
		}

		days_remove = 50

		complete_effect = {

		}

		remove_effect = {
			set_country_flag = dealt_with_western_russia_bandits
			custom_effect_tooltip = deal_bandits_western_russia_tt
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = anarchy
				popularity = 0.03
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				709 = {
					set_state_name = "Western Russia"
					save_event_target_as = bandit_region_state_name
				}
				country_event = { id = russia2_russia.441 }
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_end_bandits_situation = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_arrest

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_idea = SOV_Bandits_problem
			has_completed_focus = SOV_deal_with_banditry
		}

		available = {
			has_country_flag = dealt_with_steppe_bandits
			has_country_flag = dealt_with_arctic_bandits
			has_country_flag = dealt_with_far_east_bandits
			has_country_flag = dealt_with_western_siberia_bandits
			has_country_flag = dealt_with_kuban_caucasus_bandits
			has_country_flag = dealt_with_transvolga_region_bandits
			has_country_flag = dealt_with_western_russia_bandits
		}

		complete_effect = {
			remove_ideas = SOV_Bandits_problem
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = bounty_lead_to_chaos
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					var = chaos_triumphed_over_order
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

SOV_chaos_all_over_russia = {

	SOV_restore_order = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_form_nation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {

		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = SOV_Bandits_problem
				has_idea = SOV_Anti_revolutionary
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = not_has_sov_no_work
				NOT = {
					has_idea = SOV_No_work
					has_idea = SOV_No_work_2
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = chaos_triumphed_over_order
						value = 2
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
					has_country_flag = black_revolution_turned_civil_war
				}
				country_event = { id = russia2_russia.443 }
			}
			else ={
				country_event = { id = russia2_russia.442 }
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_the_end_of_anarchism_mission = {

		icon = generic_civil_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = SOV_Useless_money
			}
		}

		activation = {
			has_idea = SOV_Useless_money
		}

		visible = {

		}

		is_good = no

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_mission_timeout = 1095

		cancel_trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					exists = yes
					has_government = anarchy
				}
			}
		}

		timeout_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = the_end_of_anarchy_mission_tt
            hidden_effect = {
				release = KHI
				release = VLA
				release = YAK
				release = CKK
				release = TAY
				release = YAM
				release = OVO
				release = BYA
				release = ALT
				release = NEN
				release = BSK
				release = UDM
				release = MEL
				release = CHU
				release = VGE
				release = KKP
				release = BUK
				release = ABK
				release = KBK
				release = NOA
				release = CIN
				BSK = {
					transfer_state = 652
				}
				VGE = {
					transfer_state = 401
				}
				release = PRM
				release = TAT
				release = KAR
				release = KMI
				release = VYA
				release = STP
				release = NOV
				release = EFR
				release = URA
				release = SIB
				release = CRI
				release = CIR
				release = DAG
				release = VLG
				release = ROS
				release = KAL
				release = UKR
				release = BLR
				release = KAZ
				release = TMS
				release = UZB
				release = TAJ
				release = KYR
				release = GEO
				release = ARM
				release = AZR
				GPM = {
					add_state_core = 219
					add_state_core = 223
					add_state_core = 254
					add_state_core = 253
					add_state_core = 248
					add_state_core = 247
					add_state_core = 246
					add_state_core = 242
					add_state_core = 205
					add_state_core = 243
					add_state_core = 224
					add_state_core = 220
					add_state_core = 252
					add_state_core = 255
					add_state_core = 239
					add_state_core = 260
					add_state_core = 240
					add_state_core = 222
					add_state_core = 250
					add_state_core = 257
					add_state_core = 258
					every_state = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = GPM
						}
						GPM = {
							transfer_state = PREV
						}
					}
					every_state = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SOV
						}
						remove_core_of = SOV
					}
				}
				for_each_scope_loop = {
					array = global.russia_reworked_russian_states

					if = {
						limit = {
							exists = yes
						}
						meta_effect = {
							text = {
								division_template = {
									name = "[TEMPLATE_NAME]"
									is_locked = no

									regiments = {
										infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
										infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
										infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
										infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
										infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
										infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
										infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
										infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
										infantry = { x = 2 y = 2 }
									}
									support = {
										artillery = { x = 0 y = 0 }
									}
								}
							}
							TEMPLATE_NAME = "[THIS.GetAdjective] Military Police"
						}
						meta_effect = {
							text = {
								division_template = {
									name = "[TEMPLATE_NAME]"
									is_locked = no

									regiments = {
										light_armor = { x = 0 y = 0 }
										light_armor = { x = 0 y = 1 }
										light_armor = { x = 1 y = 0 }
										light_armor = { x = 1 y = 1 }
										light_armor = { x = 1 y = 2 }
										motorized = { x = 2 y = 0 }
										motorized = { x = 2 y = 1 }
										motorized = { x = 2 y = 2 }
										motorized = { x = 2 y = 3 }
									}
								}
							}
							TEMPLATE_NAME = "[THIS.Capital.GetName] Tank Brigade"
						}

						set_temp_variable = { num_divisions_russian_state = THIS.owned_controlled_states }
						set_temp_variable = { tank_division_russian_state = 0 }
						clamp_temp_variable = {
							var = num_divisions_russian_state
							min = 3
							max = 50
						}

						while_loop_effect = {
							break = break
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									var = num_divisions_russian_state
									value = 1
									compare = greater_than_or_equals
								}
							}

							random_owned_controlled_state = {
								meta_effect = {
									text = {
										create_unit = {
											division = "name = \"[UNIT_NAME]\" division_template = \"[TEMPLATE_NAME]\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
											owner = PREV
											allow_spawning_on_enemy_provs = yes
										}
									}
									UNIT_NAME = "[PREV.GetAdjective] Military Police [?num_divisions_russian_state]"
									TEMPLATE_NAME = "[PREV.GetAdjective] Military Police"
								}
							}
							add_to_temp_variable = { tank_division_russian_state = 1 }
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										var = tank_division_russian_state
										value = 10
										compare = greater_than_or_equals
									}
								}
								capital_scope = {
									meta_effect = {
										text = {
											create_unit = {
												division = "name = \"[UNIT_NAME]\" division_template = \"[TEMPLATE_NAME]\" start_experience_factor = 0.6 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
												owner = PREV
												allow_spawning_on_enemy_provs = yes
											}
										}
										UNIT_NAME = "[THIS.GetName] Tank Brigade"
										TEMPLATE_NAME = "[THIS.GetName] Tank Brigade"
									}
								}
								set_temp_variable = { tank_division_russian_state = 0 }
							}
							subtract_from_temp_variable = { num_divisions_russian_state = 1 }
						}
						delete_unit_template_and_units = {
							division_template = "Strelkovaya Diviziya"
						}
						delete_unit_template_and_units = {
							division_template = "Gornostrelkovaya Diviziya"
						}
						delete_unit_template_and_units = {
							division_template = "Motostrelkovaya Diviziya"
						}
						delete_unit_template_and_units = {
							division_template = "Kavaleriyskaya Diviziya"
						}
						delete_unit_template_and_units = {
							division_template = "NKVD Pogranichnaya Diviziya"
						}
						delete_unit_template_and_units = {
							division_template = "Mekhanizirovaniy Korpus"
						}
					}
				}
			}
        }

		complete_effect = {
			add_popularity = {
			    ideology = anarchy
			    popularity = 0.02
			}
		}
	}
}

SOV_supreme_court_decisions = {

	SOV_improve_from_conditions = {

		icon = generic_police_action

		on_map_mode = map_and_decisions_view

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_war_with = FROM
			any_state = {
				is_owned_by = FROM
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				has_resistance = yes
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			has_completed_focus = SOV_the_supreme_court
			has_government = democratic
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_the_supreme_court
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_war_with = ROOT
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_war_with = FROM
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				is_owned_by = FROM
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				has_resistance = yes
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		cost = var:sov_improve_from_conditions_cost

		complete_effect = {
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_owned_by = FROM
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
					has_resistance = yes
					NOT = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				add_compliance = 10
				add_resistance = -10
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

SOV_track_stalin_decision = {

	SOV_search_for_stalin = {

		icon = GFX_decision_infiltrate_state

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		on_map_mode = map_only

		state_target = yes

		target_array = global.sov_track_available_states

		visible = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_the_track
			has_government = democratic
			has_country_flag = sov_track_begin
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = sov_stalin_track_found
			}
		}

		days_remove = 10

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 10

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_searching_for_stalin
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_searching_for_stalin
			add_to_variable = { sov_stalin_track_tries = 1 }
		}

		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = is_searching_for_stalin
				if = {
					limit = {
						FROM = {
							has_state_flag = sov_stalin_hidding_state
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = sov_stalin_track_found
					if = {
						limit = {
							FROM = {
								CONTROLLER = {
									tag = ROOT
								}
							}
						}
						ROOT = {
							country_event = { id = russia2_russia.434 }
						}
					}
					else = {
						FROM = {
							clr_state_flag = sov_stalin_hidding_state
							set_state_flag = sov_stalin_found_state
							state_event = { id = russia2_russia.432 trigger_for = ROOT }
						}
					}
					FROM = {
						save_event_target_as = stalin_hiding_state_target
					}
					remove_from_array = { global.sov_track_available_states = FROM }
				}
				else = {
					FROM = {
						state_event = { id = russia2_russia.444 trigger_for = ROOT }
					}
					remove_from_array = { global.sov_track_available_states = FROM }
				}
			}
        }

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

SOV_return_ukraine_territory = {

	SOV_return_ukraine_claims_state_decision = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_political_rally

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			any_state = {
				has_state_flag = claim_by_ukr_dem_rus
				is_owned_by = SOV
			}
		}

		available = {

		}

		complete_effect = {
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					has_state_flag = claim_by_ukr_dem_rus
					is_owned_by = SOV
				}
				UKR = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

SOV_diplomatic_plays_decisions_democratic = {

	SOV_support_pro_russian_belarus = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_military

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			country_exists = BLR
			NOT = {
				BLR = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			country_exists = BLR
			NOT = {
				BLR = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
				has_country_flag = is_doing_diplomatic_play
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 25

		days_remove = 30

		fixed_random_seed = no

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_doing_diplomatic_play
		}

		remove_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = result_of_the_coups_belarus
			hidden_effect = {
				random_list = {
					40 = { #Coup was Successful
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.460 days = 10 }
						every_state = {
							limit = {
								is_core_of = BLR
								is_owned_and_controlled_by = BLR
							}
							SOV = {
								add_state_core = PREV
							}
						}
					}
					60 = { #Failure
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.461 days = 10 }
					}
				}
			}
			clr_country_flag = is_doing_diplomatic_play
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_reintegrate_belarus_united_russia = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_military

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_country_flag = blr_coup_failure_dem
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = blr_is_puppet_or_occupied
				OR = {
					AND = {
						241 = {
							is_owned_by = SOV
						}
						194 = {
							is_owned_by = SOV
						}
						204 = {
							is_owned_by = SOV
						}
						206 = {
							is_owned_by = SOV
						}
						207 = {
							is_owned_by = SOV
						}
					}
					BLR = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
					}
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 50

		cost = 25

		complete_effect = {

		}

		remove_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = core_blr_state_core_owned_sov
			hidden_effect = {
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = BLR
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
					}
					SOV = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						country_exists = BLR
						BLR = {
							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
					}
					every_state = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = BLR
							is_owned_and_controlled_by = BLR
						}
						SOV = {
							add_state_core = PREV
						}
					}
					SOV = {
						annex_country = {
							target = BLR
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_incite_tension_central_asia = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_ignite_civil_war

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			OR = {
				country_exists = KAZ
				country_exists = UZB
				country_exists = TMS
				country_exists = TAJ
				country_exists = KYR
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_doing_diplomatic_play
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 30

		cost = 25

		fixed_random_seed = no

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_doing_diplomatic_play
			hidden_effect = {
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = KAZ
							is_core_of = KYR
							is_core_of = TAJ
							is_core_of = TMS
							is_core_of = UZB
						}
					}
					SOV = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				KAZ = {
					random_owned_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"6st Free Infantry\" division_template = \"Free Infantry\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = KAZ
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"7nd Free Infantry\" division_template = \"Free Infantry\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = KAZ
						}
					}
				}
				KYR = {
					random_owned_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"6st Free Infantry\" division_template = \"Free Infantry\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = KYR
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"7nd Free Infantry\" division_template = \"Free Infantry\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = KYR
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"8rd Free Infantry\" division_template = \"Free Infantry\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = KYR
						}
					}
				}
				TAJ = {
					random_owned_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"6st Free Infantry\" division_template = \"Free Infantry\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = TAJ
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"7nd Free Infantry\" division_template = \"Free Infantry\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = TAJ
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"8rd Free Infantry\" division_template = \"Free Infantry\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = TAJ
						}
					}
				}
				TMS = {
					random_owned_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"6st Free Infantry\" division_template = \"Free Infantry\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = TMS
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"7nd Free Infantry\" division_template = \"Free Infantry\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = TMS
						}
					}
				}
				UZB = {
					random_owned_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"6st Free Infantry\" division_template = \"Free Infantry\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = UZB
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"7nd Free Infantry\" division_template = \"Free Infantry\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = UZB
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"8rd Free Infantry\" division_template = \"Free Infantry\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = UZB
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_doing_diplomatic_play
			custom_effect_tooltip = create_tension_in_central_asia_war
			hidden_effect = {
				random_list = {
					85 = { #Tension was successful
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.462 days = 3 }
					}
					15 = { #A Failure, coalition created
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.463 days = 3 }
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_intervene_in_central_asia_democratic = { #TODO National spirit so they won't join foreign faction

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_tank

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_country_flag = can_intervene_central_asia
		}

		available = {
			has_country_flag = successfully_created_tension_central_asia
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_doing_diplomatic_play
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 14

		cost = 25

		fixed_random_seed = no

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_doing_diplomatic_play
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_doing_diplomatic_play
			custom_effect_tooltip = declare_war_remaining_country_central_asia
			custom_effect_tooltip = remaining_central_asia_country_form_coal
			hidden_effect = {
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						exists = yes
						OR = {
							tag = KAZ
							tag = KYR
							tag = TMS
							tag = UZB
							tag = TAJ
						}
					}
					KAZ = {
						white_peace = PREV
					}
					KYR = {
						white_peace = PREV
					}
					TMS = {
						white_peace = PREV
					}
					UZB = {
						white_peace = PREV
					}
					TAJ = {
						white_peace = PREV
					}
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						exists = yes
						is_subject = no
						OR = {
							tag = KAZ
							tag = KY
							tag = TAJ
							tag = TMS
							tag = UZB
						}
					}
					create_faction = anti_russian_coalition
					add_to_faction = KAZ
					add_to_faction = KYR
					add_to_faction = TAJ
					add_to_faction = TMS
					add_to_faction = UZB
				}
				SOV = {
					declare_war_on = {
						target = TMS
						type = annex_everything
					}
					declare_war_on = {
						target = KAZ
						type = annex_everything
					}
					declare_war_on = {
						target = UZB
						type = annex_everything
					}
					declare_war_on = {
						target = TAJ
						type = annex_everything
					}
					declare_war_on = {
						target = KYR
						type = annex_everything
					}
				}
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						exists = yes
						OR = {
							tag = KAZ
							tag = KYR
							tag = TMS
							tag = UZB
							tag = TAJ
							tag = KKP
							tag = KHI
							tag = BUK
						}
					}
					SOV = {
						create_wargoal = {
							type = annex_everything
							target = PREV
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

				is_neighbor_of = SOV

						}
					}
					40 = {
						FROM = {

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		}

			clr_country_flag = is_doing_diplomatic_play
			SOV = {
				add_state_core = FROM
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_investing_broken_market
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 50

		days_remove = 70

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_investing_broken_market
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_investing_broken_market
			add_to_variable = {
			    var = investment_broken_market_var
			    value = 1
			}
			add_resource = {
				type = aluminium
				amount = 20
				state = 581
			}
			add_resource = {
				type = chromium
				amount = 20
				state = 581
			}
			add_resource = {
				type = oil
				amount = 25
				state = 582
			}
			add_resource = {
				type = steel
				amount = 30
				state = 582
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_end_the_reconstruction = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_demand

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {

		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_investing_broken_market
			}
		}

		days_remove = 10

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_investing_broken_market
			custom_effect_tooltip = investment_will_stop_forever
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_investing_broken_market
			custom_effect_tooltip = more_invsetment_equal_more_bonus
			remove_ideas = SOV_Broken_market_2
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = investment_broken_market_var
						value = 1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
					NOT = {
						check_variable = {
							var = investment_broken_market_var
							value = 4
							compare = greater_than_or_equals
						}
					}
				}
				add_ideas = SOV_Reconstructed_economy
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = investment_broken_market_var
						value = 4
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
					NOT = {
						check_variable = {
							var = investment_broken_market_var
							value = 7
							compare = greater_than_or_equals
						}
					}
				}
				add_ideas = SOV_Reconstructed_economy_2
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = investment_broken_market_var
						value = 7
						compare = equals
					}
					NOT = {
						check_variable = {
							var = investment_broken_market_var
							value = 6
							compare = less_than_or_equals
						}
					}
				}
				add_ideas = SOV_Reconstructed_economy_3
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 60
		}
	}
}

SOV_middle_east_conquest = {

	SOV_ultimatum_country_middle_east_dem = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_break_treaty

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_subject = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				any_country = {
					has_country_flag = leader_faction_coalition_middle_east
					is_in_faction_with = FROM
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			FROM = {
				is_neighbor_of = SOV
			}
			NOT = {
				FROM = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
				has_country_flag = is_sending_ultimatum_middle_east
			}
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					tag = TUR
					tag = PER
					tag = IRQ
					tag = SAU
					tag = YEM
					tag = OMA
					tag = AFG
					tag = SYR
					tag = LEB
					tag = JOR
					tag = PAL
					tag = ISR
					tag = EGY
					tag = SUD
					tag = UAE
					tag = QAT
					tag = KUW
				}
			}
		}

		days_remove = 35

		cost = 50

		fixed_random_seed = no

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_sending_ultimatum_middle_east
			randomize_variable = {
				var = middle_east_coalition
				distribution = uniform
				min = middle_east_coalition
				max = 100
			}
			round_variable = middle_east_coalition
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_sending_ultimatum_middle_east
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_russia.469 days = 3 }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = middle_east_coalition
							value = 85
							compare = greater_than_or_equals
						}
						NOT = {
							has_global_flag = coalition_was_formed_middle_east
						}
					}
					set_global_flag = coalition_was_formed_middle_east
					SOV = {
						country_event = { id = russia2_russia.472 days = 2 }
					}
					random_scope_in_array = {
						save_event_target_as = leader_of_middle_east_coalition
						array = global.sov_middle_east_democratic_country
						limit = {
							exists = yes
							is_subject = no
							NOT = {
								has_capitulated = yes
								is_in_faction = yes
							}
						}

						set_country_flag = leader_faction_coalition_middle_east
						create_faction = middle_east_faction_dem
					}
					every_country = {
						limit = {
							exists = yes
							NOT = {
								has_capitulated = yes
								is_in_faction = yes
								is_subject = yes
							}
							OR = {
								tag = TUR
								tag = PER
								tag = IRQ
								tag = SAU
								tag = YEM
								tag = OMA
								tag = AFG
								tag = SYR
								tag = LEB
								tag = JOR
								tag = PAL
								tag = ISR
								tag = EGY
								tag = SUD
								tag = UAE
								tag = QAT
								tag = KUW
							}
						}
						event_target:leader_of_middle_east_coalition = {
							add_to_faction = PREV
						}
						add_ai_strategy = {
							type = alliance
							id = event_target:leader_of_middle_east_coalition
							value = 500
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					add_to_variable = {
						var = middle_east_coalition
						value = 10
					}
				}
			}
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					exists = no
					has_war_with = SOV
					has_capitulated = yes
				}
			}
		}

		cancel_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_sending_ultimatum_middle_east
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_ultimatum_country_middle_east_dem_overlord_edition = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_break_treaty

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

				exists = yes
				NOT = {

SOV_improve_arctic_russia = {

	SOV_improve_arctic_state = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_operation

		state_target = yes

		target_array = global.alaska_upgradeable_states

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {

		}

		available = {
			FROM = {
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = RAS
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_excavating_arctic_russia
			}
		}

		days_remove = 50

		cost = 30

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_excavating_arctic_russia
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_excavating_arctic_russia
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						state = 471
					}
				}
				add_resource = {
					type = oil
					amount = 16
					state = 471
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						state = 472
					}
				}
				add_resource = {
					type = oil
					amount = 25
					state = 472
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						state = 683
					}
				}
				add_resource = {
					type = oil
					amount = 15
					state = 683
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						state = 473
					}
				}
				add_resource = {
					type = oil
					amount = 8
					state = 473
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						state = 470
					}
				}
				add_resource = {
					type = steel
					amount = 30
					state = 470
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						state = 469
					}
				}
				add_resource = {
					type = tungsten
					amount = 20
					state = 469
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						state = 467
					}
				}
				add_resource = {
					type = steel
					amount = 25
					state = 467
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						state = 682
					}
				}
				add_resource = {
					type = aluminium
					amount = 18
					state = 682
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						state = 466
					}
				}
				add_resource = {
					type = aluminium
					amount = 16
					state = 466
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						state = 332
					}
				}
				add_resource = {
					type = chromium
					amount = 30
					state = 332
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						state = 101
					}
				}
				add_resource = {
					type = oil
					amount = 27
					state = 101
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						state = 100
					}
				}
				add_resource = {
					type = tungsten
					amount = 19
					state = 100
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
				add_building_construction = {
					type = arms_factory
					level = 2
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = industrial_complex
					level = 2
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = add_excavation_progress_arctic
			add_to_variable = { local_ressource_ice_puppet = 0.02 }
		}
	}

	SOV_encourage_immigration = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_blackshirt_march

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {

		}

		available = {
			RAS = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			NOT = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = not_reached_max_immigration
					check_variable = {
						var = alaska_emigration_calculation_demo
						value = -10000
						compare = less_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
		}

		days_remove = 35

		cost = 30

		remove_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					AND = {
						SOV = {
							NOT = {
								has_idea = SOV_Emigration_in_alaska_idea
							}
						}
						RAS = {
							NOT = {
								has_idea = SOV_Immigration_in_alaska_idea
							}
						}
					}
				}
				SOV = {
					custom_effect_tooltip = idea_emigration_alaska_tooltip
					hidden_effect = {
						add_ideas = SOV_Emigration_in_alaska_idea
						add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = democratic_alaska_emigration }
					}
				}
				RAS = {
					custom_effect_tooltip = idea_immigration_alaska_tooltip
					hidden_effect = {
						add_ideas = SOV_Immigration_in_alaska_idea
						add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = democratic_alaska_immigration }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				SOV = {
					custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_emigration_malus_alaska
					add_to_variable = { alaska_emigration_calculation_demo = -2000 }
				}
				RAS = {
					custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_immigration_bonus_alaska
					add_to_variable = { alaska_immigration_calculation_demo = 2000 }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_stop_immigration_alaska = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {

		}

		available = {
			RAS = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
				has_idea = SOV_Immigration_in_alaska_idea
			}
			has_idea = SOV_Emigration_in_alaska_idea
		}

		cost = 10

		complete_effect = {
			SOV = {
				remove_ideas = SOV_Emigration_in_alaska_idea
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = democratic_alaska_emigration }
				}
			}
			RAS = {
				remove_ideas = SOV_Immigration_in_alaska_idea
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = democratic_alaska_immigration }
				}
			}
			set_variable = { alaska_emigration_calculation_demo = -2000 }
			set_variable = { alaska_immigration_calculation_demo = 2000 }
		}
	}

					target = BRP

			add_resource = {
				type = tungsten
				amount = 21
				state = 267
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				BRP = {
					random_owned_controlled_state = {

							level = 2

						}

							level = 2

						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 676
						controls_state = 676
					}
				}
				OR = {
					352 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 352
						controls_state = 352
					}
				}
				OR = {
					350 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 350
						controls_state = 350
					}
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = not_able_to_create_mesopotamia_and_kur_middle_east
			ASY = {
				add_state_core = 680
				add_state_core = 676
				add_state_core = 352
				add_state_core = 350
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ASY
					any_country = {
						OR = {
							tag = SOV
							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						owns_state = PREV
					}
				}
				ASY = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = ASY
					autonomy_state = autonomy_middle_east_protectorate
				}
			}
			ASY = {
				give_resource_rights = { receiver = SOV state = 676 }
				give_resource_rights = { receiver = SOV state = 350 }
			}
			add_resource = {
				type = chromium
				amount = 32
				state = 350
			}
			add_resource = {
				type = steel
				amount = 46
				state = 350
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				ASY = {
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
						add_building_construction = {
							type = arms_factory
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 4
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 60
						neutrality = 22
						fascism = 11
						communism = 7
						anarchy = 0
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "Assyrian Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Assyrian Division\" division_template = \"Assyrian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = ASY
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Assyrian Division\" division_template = \"Assyrian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = ASY
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Assyrian Division\" division_template = \"Assyrian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = ASY
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_create_hittite = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_form_nation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			NOT = {
				country_exists = MES
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				country_exists = MES
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = hittite_states_own_by_sov_or_pups
				OR = {
					677 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 677
						controls_state = 677
					}
				}
				OR = {
					799 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 799
						controls_state = 799
					}
				}
				OR = {
					344 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 344
						controls_state = 344
					}
				}
				OR = {
					345 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 345
						controls_state = 345
					}
				}
				OR = {
					346 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 346
						controls_state = 346
					}
				}
				OR = {
					348 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 348
						controls_state = 348
					}
				}
				OR = {
					798 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 798
						controls_state = 798
					}
				}
				OR = {
					349 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 349
						controls_state = 349
					}
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = not_able_to_create_mesopotamia_middle_east
			custom_effect_tooltip = release_hittite_before_anatolia
			HIT = {
				add_state_core = 677
				add_state_core = 799
				add_state_core = 344
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						country_exists = ANT
					}
				}
				HIT = {
					add_state_core = 345
					add_state_core = 346
					add_state_core = 348
					add_state_core = 798
					add_state_core = 349
				}
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = HIT
					any_country = {
						OR = {
							tag = SOV
							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						owns_state = PREV
					}
				}
				HIT = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = HIT
					autonomy_state = autonomy_middle_east_protectorate
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						country_exists = ANT
					}
				}
				HIT = {
					give_resource_rights = { receiver = SOV state = 348 }
				}
			}
			HIT = {
				give_resource_rights = { receiver = SOV state = 799 }
			}
			add_resource = {
				type = tungsten
				amount = 31
				state = 799
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				HIT = {
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
						add_building_construction = {
							type = arms_factory
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 4
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 70
						neutrality = 17
						fascism = 6
						communism = 7
						anarchy = 0
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "Hittites Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Hittites Division\" division_template = \"Hittites Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = HIT
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Hittites Division\" division_template = \"Hittites Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = HIT
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Hittites Division\" division_template = \"Hittites Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = HIT
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2

						}
					}

						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4

						name = "Mesopotamian Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }

							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Mesopotamian Division\" division_template = \"Mesopotamian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

							division = "name = \"2nd Mesopotamian Division\" division_template = \"Mesopotamian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

						}
					}

							division = "name = \"3rd Mesopotamian Division\" division_template = \"Mesopotamian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

						}
					}

	SOV_create_anatolia = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_form_nation

			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {

		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = anatolia_states_own_by_sov_or_pups
				OR = {
					341 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 341
						controls_state = 341
					}
				}
				OR = {

						is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV

					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV

					}

			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = release_anatolia_before_hittite
			transfer_state = 797
			ANT = {
				add_state_core = 341
				add_state_core = 340
				add_state_core = 339
				add_state_core = 342
				add_state_core = 343
				add_state_core = 49
				add_state_core = 347
				add_state_core = 356
				add_state_core = 355
				add_state_core = 187
				add_state_core = 164
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						country_exists = HIT
					}
				}
				ANT = {
					add_state_core = 345
					add_state_core = 346
					add_state_core = 348
					add_state_core = 798
					add_state_core = 349
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						country_exists = KUR
					}
				}
				ANT = {
					add_state_core = 354
				}
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ANT
					any_country = {
						OR = {
							tag = SOV
							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						owns_state = PREV
					}
				}
				ANT = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = ANT
					autonomy_state = autonomy_middle_east_protectorate
				}
			}
			ANT = {
				give_resource_rights = { receiver = SOV state = 49 }
				give_resource_rights = { receiver = SOV state = 343 }
				give_resource_rights = { receiver = SOV state = 339 }
				give_resource_rights = { receiver = SOV state = 342 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						country_exists = HIT
					}
				}
				ANT = {
					give_resource_rights = { receiver = SOV state = 348 }
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				ANT = {
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
						add_building_construction = {
							type = arms_factory
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 4
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 58
						neutrality = 22
						fascism = 13
						communism = 7
						anarchy = 0
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "Anatolian Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Anatolian Division\" division_template = \"Anatolian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = ANT
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Anatolian Division\" division_template = \"Anatolian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = ANT
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Anatolian Division\" division_template = \"Anatolian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = ANT
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"4th Anatolian Division\" division_template = \"Anatolian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

	SOV_release_kurdistan = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_form_nation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			NOT = {
				country_exists = KUR
				country_exists = ASY
				country_exists = MES
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				country_exists = KUR
				country_exists = ASY
				country_exists = MES
				KUR = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = release_kurdistan_states_own_by_sov_or_pups
				800 = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
				}
				353 = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
				}
				350 = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
				}
				352 = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
				}
				680 = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
				}
				676 = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
				}
				354 = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = not_able_to_create_mesopotamia_and_assyria_middle_east
			set_country_flag = released_kurdistan_dem
			hidden_effect = {
				KUR = {
					add_state_core = 354
				}
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = KUR
					NOT = {
						state = 421
						state = 419
					}
					any_country = {
						OR = {
							tag = SOV
							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						owns_state = PREV
					}
				}
				KUR = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = KUR
					autonomy_state = autonomy_middle_east_protectorate
				}
			}
			KUR = {
				give_resource_rights = { receiver = SOV state = 676 }
				give_resource_rights = { receiver = SOV state = 350 }
			}
			add_resource = {
				type = chromium
				amount = 32
				state = 350
			}
			add_resource = {
				type = steel
				amount = 46
				state = 350
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				KUR = {
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
						add_building_construction = {
							type = arms_factory
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
						add_building_construction = {
							type = arms_factory
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 70
						neutrality = 17
						fascism = 9
						communism = 4
						anarchy = 0
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "Kurdistani Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Kurdistani Division\" division_template = \"Kurdistani Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = KUR

					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Kurdistani Division\" division_template = \"Kurdistani Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

	SOV_migrate_kurdistan = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_form_nation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			NOT = {
				country_exists = KUR
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				country_exists = KUR
				KUR = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = kurdistan_states_own_by_sov_or_pups
				OR = {
					353 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 353
						controls_state = 353
					}
				}
				OR = {
					800 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 800
						controls_state = 800
					}
				}
				OR = {
					354 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 354
						controls_state = 354
					}
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			KUR = {
				add_state_core = 354
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = KUR
					NOT = {
						state = 350
						state = 352
						state = 344
						state = 680
						state = 676
						state = 291
						state = 419
						state = 421
					}
					any_country = {
						OR = {
							tag = SOV
							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						owns_state = PREV
					}
				}
				KUR = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = KUR
					autonomy_state = autonomy_middle_east_protectorate
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				KUR = {
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
						add_building_construction = {
							type = arms_factory
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 70
						neutrality = 17
						fascism = 9
						communism = 4
						anarchy = 0
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "Kurdistani Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Kurdistani Division\" division_template = \"Kurdistani Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = KUR
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Kurdistani Division\" division_template = \"Kurdistani Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = KUR
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {

	SOV_create_free_suez_zone = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_form_nation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {

				country_exists = FAT
			}
		}

					}
				}
				OR = {
					907 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 907
						controls_state = 907
					}
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = canal_suez_is_free_dem
			FSZ = {
				add_state_core = 453
				add_state_core = 446
				add_state_core = 447
				add_state_core = 907
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = FSZ
					any_country = {
						OR = {
							tag = SOV
							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						owns_state = PREV
					}
				}
				FSZ = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = FSZ
					autonomy_state = autonomy_middle_east_protectorate
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = unlock_management_canal_decision
			hidden_effect = {
				FSZ = {
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
						add_building_construction = {
							type = arms_factory
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
						add_building_construction = {
							type = arms_factory
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
						add_building_construction = {
							type = arms_factory
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 80
						neutrality = 9
						fascism = 5
						communism = 6
						anarchy = 0
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "Suezian Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Suezian Division\" division_template = \"Suezian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = FSZ
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Suezian Division\" division_template = \"Suezian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = FSZ
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Suezian Division\" division_template = \"Suezian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = FSZ
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

			factor = 100
		}

					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 858
						controls_state = 858
					}
				}
				OR = {
					859 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 859
						controls_state = 859
					}
				}
				OR = {
					857 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 857
						controls_state = 857
					}
				}
				OR = {
					854 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 854
						controls_state = 854
					}
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			NEJ = {
				add_state_core = 292
				add_state_core = 765
				add_state_core = 678
				add_state_core = 858
				add_state_core = 859
				add_state_core = 857
				add_state_core = 854
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = NEJ
					any_country = {
						OR = {
							tag = SOV
							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						owns_state = PREV
					}
				}
				NEJ = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = NEJ
					autonomy_state = autonomy_middle_east_protectorate
				}
			}
			NEJ = {
				give_resource_rights = { receiver = SOV state = 292 }
			}
			add_resource = {
				type = oil
				amount = 28
				state = 292
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				NEJ = {
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
						add_building_construction = {
							type = arms_factory
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
						add_building_construction = {
							type = arms_factory
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 49
						neutrality = 31
						fascism = 16
						communism = 4
						anarchy = 0
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "Saudi Arabian Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Saudi Arabian Division\" division_template = \"Saudi Arabian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = NEJ
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Saudi Arabian Division\" division_template = \"Saudi Arabian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = NEJ
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Saudi Arabian Division\" division_template = \"Saudi Arabian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = NEJ
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_release_south_arabian = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_form_nation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {

		}

					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 293
						controls_state = 293
					}
				}
				OR = {
					659 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 659
						controls_state = 659
					}
				}
				OR = {
					294 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 294
						controls_state = 294
					}
				}
				OR = {
					658 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
					}
					any_country = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						owns_state = 658
						controls_state = 658
					}
				}
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			ASR = {
				add_state_core = 293
				add_state_core = 659
				add_state_core = 294
				add_state_core = 658
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ASR
					any_country = {
						OR = {
							tag = SOV
							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
						owns_state = PREV
					}
				}
				ASR = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
			SOV = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = ASR
					autonomy_state = autonomy_middle_east_protectorate
				}
			}
			ASR = {
				give_resource_rights = { receiver = SOV state = 658 }
				give_resource_rights = { receiver = SOV state = 294 }
				give_resource_rights = { receiver = SOV state = 293 }
			}
			add_resource = {
				type = oil
				amount = 17
				state = 293
			}
			add_resource = {
				type = oil
				amount = 22
				state = 294
			}
			add_resource = {
				type = oil
				amount = 19
				state = 658
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				ASR = {
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4

							type = arms_factory
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
						add_building_construction = {
							type = arms_factory
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
						add_building_construction = {
							type = industrial_complex
							level = 2
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 72
						neutrality = 17
						fascism = 5
						communism = 6
						anarchy = 0
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "South Arabian Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}

SOV_management_suez_canal = {

	SOV_close_suez_canal = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			FSZ = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
		}

		available = {
			FSZ = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = has_close_suez_canal
				has_country_flag = is_doing_paper_works_blockade
			}
		}

		days_remove = 35

		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_country_flag = is_doing_paper_works_blockade
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_doing_paper_works_blockade
			add_ideas = SOV_Canal_suez_closed
			FSZ = {
				add_ideas = SOV_Canal_suez_closed_2
			}
			set_country_flag = has_close_suez_canal
			clr_country_flag = has_re_open_suez_canal
			custom_effect_tooltip = canal_will_be_closed_except_allies
			hidden_effect = {
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							tag = SOV
							is_subject_of = SOV
							is_in_faction_with = SOV
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = SUEZ_CANAL_BLOCKED_FOR_COUNTRY
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}

	SOV_open_suez_canal = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			FSZ = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			has_country_flag = has_close_suez_canal
		}

		available = {
			FSZ = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_doing_paper_works_blockade
			}
		}

		days_remove = 35

		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_country_flag = is_doing_paper_works_blockade
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_doing_paper_works_blockade
			remove_ideas = SOV_Canal_suez_closed
			FSZ = {
				remove_ideas = SOV_Canal_suez_closed_2
			}
			set_country_flag = has_re_open_suez_canal
			clr_country_flag = has_close_suez_canal
			custom_effect_tooltip = canal_will_be_open_everyone
			hidden_effect = {
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							tag = SOV
							is_subject_of = SOV
							is_in_faction_with = SOV
						}
					}
					clr_country_flag = SUEZ_CANAL_BLOCKED_FOR_COUNTRY
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}

	SOV_close_access_suez_countries = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_break_treaty

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			FSZ = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_civil_war = yes
					has_country_flag = is_victim_of_russian_blockade
				}
				is_major = yes
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_domination_middle_east
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_civil_war = yes
					has_country_flag = is_victim_of_russian_blockade
				}
				is_major = yes
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = has_close_suez_canal
				has_country_flag = is_doing_paper_works_blockade
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = can_not_blockade_more_than_two_countries
				check_variable = {
					var = blockade_suez_count
					value = 2
					compare = less_than
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				is_subject = no
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = SOV
					is_in_faction_with = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		days_remove = 14

		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_country_flag = is_doing_paper_works_blockade
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = from_will_not_be_able_use_suez
			hidden_effect = {
				clr_country_flag = is_doing_paper_works_blockade
				FROM = {
					set_country_flag = SUEZ_CANAL_BLOCKED_FOR_COUNTRY
					set_country_flag = is_victim_of_russian_blockade
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.484 days = 1 }
				}
				add_to_variable = {
					var = blockade_suez_count
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_opinion = {
					target = FROM
					value < 1
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_open_access_suez_countries = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_exchange_intelligence_data

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			FSZ = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_country_flag = SUEZ_CANAL_BLOCKED_FOR_COUNTRY
				has_country_flag = is_victim_of_russian_blockade
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_domination_middle_east
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				has_country_flag = SUEZ_CANAL_BLOCKED_FOR_COUNTRY
				has_country_flag = is_victim_of_russian_blockade
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = has_close_suez_canal
				has_country_flag = is_doing_paper_works_blockade
			}
			FROM = {
				is_subject = no
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = SOV
					is_in_faction_with = SOV
				}
				has_country_flag = is_victim_of_russian_blockade
			}
		}

		days_remove = 14

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_doing_paper_works_blockade
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_doing_paper_works_blockade
			custom_effect_tooltip = from_will_be_able_use_suez
			hidden_effect = {
				FROM = {
					clr_country_flag = SUEZ_CANAL_BLOCKED_FOR_COUNTRY
					clr_country_flag = is_victim_of_russian_blockade
					country_event = { id = russia2_russia.485 days = 1 }
				}
				subtract_from_variable = {
					var = blockade_suez_count
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_opinion = {
					target = FROM
					value > 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

SOV_develop_france_united_russia = {

	SOV_develop_military_industries_france = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_factory

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			FRA = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
		}

		available = {
			FRA = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_improving_france_united_russia
			}
		}

		modifier = {
			civilian_factory_use = 10
		}

		cost = 25

		days_remove = 70

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_improving_france_united_russia
		}

		remove_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = france_gains_15_united_russia
			clr_country_flag = is_improving_france_united_russia
			FRA = {
				random_owned_controlled_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = FRA
					}
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
					add_building_construction = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
				random_owned_controlled_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = FRA
					}
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
					add_building_construction = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = france_puppetization_united_russia
				value = 15
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 50
		}
	}

		}

		visible = {
			FRA = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
		}

		available = {
			FRA = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_improving_france_united_russia
			}
		}

		modifier = {
			civilian_factory_use = 3
		}

		cost = 25

		days_remove = 180

		complete_effect = {
			FRA = {
				add_ideas = SOV_Russian_scientist
			}
			set_country_flag = is_improving_france_united_russia
		}

		remove_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = france_gains_25_united_russia
			clr_country_flag = is_improving_france_united_russia
			FRA = {
				remove_ideas = SOV_Russian_scientist
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = france_puppetization_united_russia
				value = 25
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 50
		}
	}

	SOV_send_industrial_advisors_to_united_france = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_construction

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			FRA = {
				is_subject_of = SOV

		available = {
