			factor = 50
		}
	}

	SOV_decrease_autonomy_to_united_france = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_break_treaty

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			FRA = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
		}

		available = {
			FRA = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_improving_france_united_russia
				FRA = {
					has_autonomy_state = autonomy_russian_satellite
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = 100_or_more_puppet_united_france
				check_variable = {
					var = france_puppetization_united_russia
					value = 100
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 100

		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FRA = {
						has_autonomy_state = autonomy_russian_influence
						is_subject_of = SOV
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					SOV = {
						set_autonomy = {
							target = FRA
							autonomy_state = autonomy_russian_puppet
						}
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = france_becomes_russian_puppet_united
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FRA = {
						has_autonomy_state = autonomy_russian_puppet
						is_subject_of = SOV
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					SOV = {
						set_autonomy = {
							target = FRA
							autonomy_state = autonomy_russian_satellite
						}
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = france_becomes_russian_satellite_united
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = can_not_decrease_autonomy_anymore_united_france
			}
			set_variable = {
				var = france_puppetization_united_russia
				value = 0
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 50
		}
	}
}

SOV_cancel_resource_rights = {

	cancel_resource_rights = {
		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_support

		visible = {
			has_country_flag = giving_46_rights_to_sov
			has_full_control_of_state = 46
			SOV = {
				exists = yes
				has_country_flag = sov_receiving_46_rights
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_country_flag = giving_46_rights_to_sov
			has_full_control_of_state = 46
		}

		days_remove = 10

		cost = 10

		remove_effect = {
			SOV = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_romania.12 days = 1 }
				remove_resource_rights = 46
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

SOV_switch_country_soviet_fragmented = {

	SOV_switch_to_country = {

		icon = generic_form_nation

		target_array = global.russia_reworked_russian_states

		visible = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_ai = yes
				NOT = {
					tag = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = FROM.capital
			}
		}

		available = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
					has_war = no
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			FROM = {
				change_tag_from = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
}

SOV_rename_soviet_cities = {

	SOV_rename_stalingrad = {
		icon = GFX_decision_generic_decision

		visible = {
			OR = {
				owns_state = 217
				controls_state = 217
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				OR = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_country_leader = {
								character = SOV_Leon_trotsky
								ruling_only = yes
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							has_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed_trotsky
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							has_country_leader = {
								character = SOV_Vasily_stalin
								ruling_only = yes
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							has_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed_vasily
						}
					}
					else = {
						has_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed_trotsky
						has_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed_vasily
						has_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed
						has_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed_tsar
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_country_leader = {
								character = SOV_Kirill_vladimirovich
								ruling_only = yes
							}
							has_country_leader = {
								character = SOV_Vladimir_kirillovich
								ruling_only = yes
							}
							has_country_leader = {
								character = SOV_Anastasia_nikolaevna
								ruling_only = yes
							}
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						has_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed_tsar
					}
				}
				else = {
					NOT = {
						has_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed
					}
				}
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = 217
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_full_control_of_state = 217
		}

		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_government = communism
					}
					OR = {
						has_country_leader = {
							character = SOV_Kirill_vladimirovich
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							character = SOV_Vladimir_kirillovich
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							character = SOV_Anastasia_nikolaevna
							ruling_only = yes
						}
					}
				}
				set_province_name = { id = 3529 name = "Tsaritsyn"}
				hidden_effect = {
					set_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed_tsar
					217 = {
						set_state_name = "Tsaritsyn"
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_government = communism
					}
				}
				set_province_name = { id = 3529 name = "Volgograd"}
				hidden_effect = {
					set_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed
					217 = {
						set_state_name = "Volgograd"
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_leader = {
						character = SOV_Leon_trotsky
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
				set_province_name = { id = 3529 name = "Trotskygrad"}
				hidden_effect = {
					set_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed_trotsky
					217 = {
						set_state_name = "Trotskygrad"
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_leader = {
						character = SOV_Vasily_stalin
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
				set_province_name = { id = 3529 name = "Vasilygrad"}
				hidden_effect = {
					set_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed_vasily
					217 = {
						set_state_name = "Vasilygrad"
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				reset_province_name = 3529
				hidden_effect = {
					clr_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed
					clr_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed_trotsky
					clr_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed_vasily
					clr_global_flag = SOV_stalingrad_renamed_tsar
					217 = {
						reset_state_name = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_rename_leningrad = {
		icon = GFX_decision_generic_decision

		visible = {
			OR = {
				owns_state = 195
				controls_state = 195
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_government = communism
				}
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = SOV_leningrad_renamed
					has_global_flag = SOV_leningrad_renamed_petrograd
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_country_leader = {
								character = SOV_Alexander_kerensky
								ruling_only = yes
							}
							has_country_leader = {
								character = SOV_Ivan_nikolaevich
								ruling_only = yes
							}
							has_country_leader = {
								character = SOV_Vsevolod_mikhailovich_eikhenbaum
								ruling_only = yes
							}
							has_country_leader = {
								character = SOV_Peter_arshinov
								ruling_only = yes
							}
							has_country_leader = {
								character = SOV_Alexei_borovoi
								ruling_only = yes
							}
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						has_global_flag = SOV_leningrad_renamed_petrograd
					}
				}
				else = {
					NOT = {
						has_global_flag = SOV_leningrad_renamed
					}
				}
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = 195
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_full_control_of_state = 195
		}

		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_government = communism
					}
					OR = {
						has_country_leader = {
							character = SOV_Alexander_kerensky
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							character = SOV_Ivan_nikolaevich
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							character = SOV_Vsevolod_mikhailovich_eikhenbaum
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							character = SOV_Peter_arshinov
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							character = SOV_Alexei_borovoi
							ruling_only = yes
						}
					}
				}
				set_province_name = { id = 3151 name = "Petrograd"}
				hidden_effect = {
					set_global_flag = SOV_leningrad_renamed_petrograd
					195 = {
						set_state_name = "Petrograd"
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_government = communism
					}
				}
				set_province_name = { id = 3151 name = "Saint Petersburg"}
				hidden_effect = {
					set_global_flag = SOV_leningrad_renamed
					195 = {
						set_state_name = "Saint Petersburg"
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				reset_province_name = 3151
				hidden_effect = {
					clr_global_flag = SOV_leningrad_renamed
					clr_global_flag = SOV_leningrad_renamed_petrograd
					195 = {
						reset_state_name = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 500
		}
	}

					set_global_flag = SOV_kuibyshev_renamed

					}

			}

				hidden_effect = {
					clr_global_flag = SOV_kuibyshev_renamed
					251 = {
						reset_state_name = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}

			factor = 100
		}
	}

	SOV_rename_istanbul = {
		icon = GFX_decision_generic_decision

		visible = {
			OR = {
				owns_state = 797
				controls_state = 797
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = 797
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		available = {
			has_full_control_of_state = 797
		}

		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_government = neutrality
					OR = {
						has_country_leader = {
							character = SOV_Kirill_vladimirovich
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							character = SOV_Vladimir_kirillovich
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							character = SOV_Anastasia_nikolaevna
							ruling_only = yes
						}
					}
				}
				set_province_name = { id = 9833 name = "Tsarigrad" }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_global_flag = SOV_istanbul_renamed_tsarigrad
					797 = {
						set_state_name = "Tsarigrad"
					}
					SOV = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_subject = no
								has_government = neutrality
								has_cosmetic_tag = RUS
								has_full_control_of_state = 219
								has_full_control_of_state = 2
								has_full_control_of_state = 797
								has_global_flag = SOV_istanbul_renamed_tsarigrad
								NOT = {
									is_in_array = { global.rome_tsarigrad_moscow_achievement = THIS }
								}
							}
							add_to_array = { global.rome_tsarigrad_moscow_achievement = THIS }
							set_variable = { global.rome_tsarigrad_moscow_achievement_date@THIS = global.date }
							set_country_flag = russia_reworked_new_achievement
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_global_flag = russia_reworked_achievements_enabled
								}
								scoped_sound_effect = "russia_reworked_unlock_achievement"
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_province_name = { id = 9833 name = "Konstantinopol" }
				hidden_effect = {
					set_global_flag = SOV_istanbul_renamed
					797 = {
						set_state_name = "Konstantinopol"
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

				}
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			SOV = {
				start_border_war = {
					change_state_after_war = no
					attacker = {
						state = 565
						num_provinces = 3
						on_win = russia2_america.19
						on_lose = russia2_america.20
					}

					defender = {
						state = 574
						num_provinces = 3

						on_lose = russia2_america.22
					}
				}
			}
		}

		}

			hidden_effect = {
				ITA = {
					remove_ideas = SOV_Russian_italian_diplomacy_neutral
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_non_aggression_pact_with = ITA
				}
				SOV = {
					diplomatic_relation = {
						country = ITA
						relation = non_aggression_pact
						active = no
					}
				}
			}
		}

	SOV_form_military_alliance_with_italy = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_decision

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_country_flag = can_create_faction_with_ita
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = SOV_convince_italy
			}
		}

		cost = 75

		fire_only_once = yes

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = ITA
				ITA = {
					has_civil_war = yes
					has_government = communism
					is_in_faction_with = SOV
				}
				has_completed_focus = SOV_the_tables_have_turned
			}
			OR = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
				is_in_faction = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_government = fascism
				}
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = SOV_fascist_focus_on_europe
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_completed_focus = SOV_restoration_tsar
				}
				NOT = {
					has_completed_focus = SOV_convince_italy
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
		}

		complete_effect = {
			ITA = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_italy.22 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}

SOV_alternative_flag = {

	SOV_alternative_flag_third_rome = {
		icon = GFX_decision_generic_form_nation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_cosmetic_tag = THR
		}

		available = {

#Decisions from the base game
SOV_industry_relocation_russia2 = {

	SOV_relocate_industry_from_moscow_russia2 = {

		icon = generic_construction

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = 219
			}
		}

		available = {
			219 = { #Moscow
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
				arms_factory > 5
				industrial_complex > 1
			}
			573 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV } #Zlatoust
			582 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV } #Magnitogorsk
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 25

		days_remove = 15

		modifier = {

		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 200 # oh shit they are getting close!
				OR = {
					AND = {
						owns_state = 246
						NOT = { controls_state = 246 }
					}
					AND = {
						owns_state = 242
						NOT = { controls_state = 242 }
					}
					AND = {
						owns_state = 205
						NOT = { controls_state = 205 }
					}
					AND = {
						owns_state = 223
						NOT = { controls_state = 223 }
					}
					AND = {
						owns_state = 243
						NOT = { controls_state = 243 }
					}
					AND = {
						owns_state = 224
						NOT = { controls_state = 224 }
					}
					AND = {
						owns_state = 222
						NOT = { controls_state = 222 }
					}
				}
			}

			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				SOV_save_pp_for_manpower_trouble = yes
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					controls_state = 219
				}
				219 = { #Moscow
					remove_building = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 6
					}
					remove_building = {
						type = industrial_complex
						level = 2
					}
				}
				573 = { #Zlatoust
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
					add_building_construction = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 3
						instant_build = yes
					}
					add_building_construction = {
						type = industrial_complex
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}

					hidden_effect = {
						damage_building = { type = arms_factory damage = 0.3 }
						damage_building = { type = industrial_complex damage = 0.1 }
					}
				}
				582 = { #Magnitogorsk
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
					add_building_construction = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 3
						instant_build = yes
					}
					add_building_construction = {
						type = industrial_complex
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}

					hidden_effect = {
						damage_building = { type = arms_factory damage = 0.3 }
						damage_building = { type = industrial_complex damage = 0.1 }
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = relocate_industry_repair_russia2
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_relocate_industry_from_moscow_tt_russia2
		}
	}

	SOV_relocate_industry_from_leningrad_russia2 = {

						NOT = { controls_state = 244 }

						type = arms_factory
						level = 2
						instant_build = yes
					}
					add_building_construction = {
						type = industrial_complex
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}

					hidden_effect = {
						damage_building = { type = arms_factory damage = 0.2 }
						damage_building = { type = industrial_complex damage = 0.1 }
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = relocate_industry_repair_russia2
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_relocate_industry_from_leningrad_tt_russia2
		}

	SOV_order_227_russia2 = {

		icon = generic_army_support

		available = {
			has_war = yes
			any_enemy_country = {
				is_major = yes
				capital_scope = {
					is_on_continent = europe
				}
			}
			has_civil_war = no
			surrender_progress > 0.25
		}

		cost = 50

		fire_only_once = yes

		visible = {
			has_war = yes
			any_enemy_country = {
				is_major = yes
				capital_scope = {
					is_on_continent = europe
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = SOV_Order_227
    			days = 730
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				surrender_progress > 0.25
				factor = 100
			}
		}
	}

				231 = { CONTROLLER = { has_war_with = SOV } }#sneaky QA naval invasion check
				233 = { CONTROLLER = { has_war_with = SOV } }
				234 = { CONTROLLER = { has_war_with = SOV } }
			}
			has_country_flag = SOV_scorched_earth_russia2
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = support_equipment_1
				amount = -50
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					229 = { is_controlled_by = SOV}
				}

						type = infrastructure
						damage = 2
					}
				}
			}

	SOV_scorched_earth_stalingrad_russia2 = {

				227 = { CONTROLLER = { has_war_with = SOV } }

	SOV_scorched_earth_moscow_russia2 = {

		icon = generic_scorched_earth

		available = {

				support_equipment > 49
			}
		}

		cost = 75

		visible = {
			has_war = yes
			has_country_flag = SOV_scorched_earth_russia2
			OR = {
				207 = { CONTROLLER = { has_war_with = SOV } }
				210 = { CONTROLLER = { has_war_with = SOV } }
				241 = { CONTROLLER = { has_war_with = SOV } }
				193 = { CONTROLLER = { has_war_with = SOV } }
				225 = { CONTROLLER = { has_war_with = SOV } }
				240 = { CONTROLLER = { has_war_with = SOV } }
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = support_equipment_1
				amount = -50
			}
			every_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 220
						state = 222
						state = 224
						state = 243
						state = 205
						state = 242
						state = 246
						state = 219
					}
				}
				damage_building = {
					type = infrastructure
					damage = 2
				}
			}

		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

	#202 "Kiev"
	SOV_hold_kiev_russia2 = {

		icon = generic_civil_support

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		#Fail trigger
		available = {
			NOT = { controls_state = 202 }
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = 202
			}
		}

		days_mission_timeout = 90

		fire_only_once = yes

		is_good = yes

		activation = {
			is_subject = no
			has_government = communism
			has_war = yes
			has_civil_war = no
			any_enemy_country = {
				is_major = yes
				capital_scope = {
					is_on_continent = europe
				}
			}
			surrender_progress > 0
			any_enemy_country = {
				any_state = {
					is_controlled_by = PREV
					distance_to = {
						value < 500
						target = 202
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = second_russian_civil_war_in_progress
				has_country_flag = black_revolution_civil_war_in_progress
			}
			202 = {
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
			}
		}

		#Success
		timeout_effect = {
			add_war_support = 0.05
			add_political_power = 100
			202 = { save_event_target_as = state_defended_gpw_russia2 }
			country_event = russia2_russia.495
		}
		#Fail
		complete_effect = {
			add_stability = -0.05
			202 = { save_event_target_as = state_defended_gpw_russia2 }
			country_event = russia2_russia.496
		}
	}

	#Capture 64 "Berlin"
	SOV_capture_berlin_russia2 = {

		icon = generic_tank

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		#Success trigger
		available = {
			OR = {
				controls_state = 64
				any_country = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_war_together_with = ROOT
					controls_state = 64
				}
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = 64
			}
		}

		days_mission_timeout = 180

		fire_only_once = yes

		is_good = no

		activation = {
			is_subject = no
			has_government = communism
			has_war = yes
			has_civil_war = no
			surrender_progress < 0.05
			any_enemy_country = {
				is_major = yes
				capital_scope = {
					state = 64
				}
			}
			any_state = {
				distance_to = {
					value < 500
					target = 64
				}
				OR = {
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
					any_country = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						controls_state = PREV
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = second_russian_civil_war_in_progress
				has_country_flag = black_revolution_civil_war_in_progress
				controls_state = 64
				owns_state = 64
			}
		}

		#Fail
		timeout_effect = {
			add_war_support = -0.05
			add_political_power = -100
			64 = { save_event_target_as = state_captured_gpw_russia2 }
			country_event = russia2_russia.498
		}
		#Success
		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army1
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army1
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army2
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army2
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army2
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army3
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army3
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army3
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army4
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army4
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army4
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army5
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army1
			}
			64 = { save_event_target_as = state_captured_gpw_russia2 }
			country_event = russia2_russia.497
		}
	}

	#Capture 16 "Paris"
	SOV_capture_paris_russia2 = {

		icon = generic_tank

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		#Success trigger

				is_major = yes

				}

				distance_to = {
					value < 500
					target = 16
				}
				OR = {
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
					any_country = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						controls_state = PREV
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = second_russian_civil_war_in_progress
				has_country_flag = black_revolution_civil_war_in_progress
				controls_state = 16
				owns_state = 16

			add_war_support = -0.05
			add_political_power = -100
			16 = { save_event_target_as = state_captured_gpw_russia2 }
			country_event = russia2_russia.498
		}
		#Success
		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army1
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army1
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army2
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army2
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army2
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army3
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army3
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army3
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army4
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army4
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army4
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army5
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army1
			}
			16 = { save_event_target_as = state_captured_gpw_russia2 }
			country_event = russia2_russia.497
		}
	}

	#Capture 2 "Rome"

			has_war = yes
			has_civil_war = no
			surrender_progress < 0.05
			any_enemy_country = {
				is_major = yes
				capital_scope = {
					state = 2
				}
			}
			any_state = {
				distance_to = {
					value < 500
					target = 2
				}
				OR = {
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
					any_country = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						controls_state = PREV
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = second_russian_civil_war_in_progress
				has_country_flag = black_revolution_civil_war_in_progress
				controls_state = 2
				owns_state = 2
			}
		}

		#Fail
		timeout_effect = {
			add_war_support = -0.05
			add_political_power = -100
			2 = { save_event_target_as = state_captured_gpw_russia2 }
			country_event = russia2_russia.498
		}
		#Success
		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army1
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army1
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army2
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army2
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army2
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army3
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army3
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army3
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army4
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army4
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army4
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army5
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army1
			}
			2 = { save_event_target_as = state_captured_gpw_russia2 }
			country_event = russia2_russia.497
		}
	}

	#Capture 126 "London"
	SOV_capture_london_russia2 = {

		icon = generic_tank

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		#Success trigger
		available = {
			OR = {
				controls_state = 126
				any_country = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					has_war_together_with = ROOT
					controls_state = 126
				}
			}
		}

		highlight_states = {
			highlight_states_trigger = {
				state = 126
			}
		}

		days_mission_timeout = 180

		fire_only_once = yes

		is_good = no

		activation = {
			is_subject = no
			has_government = communism
			has_war = yes
			has_civil_war = no
			surrender_progress < 0.05
			any_enemy_country = {
				is_major = yes
				capital_scope = {
					state = 126
				}
			}
			any_state = {
				distance_to = {
					value < 500
					target = 126
				}
				OR = {
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
					any_country = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						controls_state = PREV
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = second_russian_civil_war_in_progress
				has_country_flag = black_revolution_civil_war_in_progress
				controls_state = 126
				owns_state = 126
			}
		}

		#Fail
		timeout_effect = {
			add_war_support = -0.05
			add_political_power = -100
			126 = { save_event_target_as = state_captured_gpw_russia2 }
			country_event = russia2_russia.498
		}
		#Success
		complete_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army1
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army1
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army2
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army2
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army2
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army3
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army3
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army3
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army4
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army4
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army4
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army5
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army1
			}
			126 = { save_event_target_as = state_captured_gpw_russia2 }
			country_event = russia2_russia.497
		}
	}

	#Capture 41 "Madrid"
	SOV_capture_madrid_russia2 = {

		icon = generic_tank

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

				controls_state = 41

					is_in_faction_with = ROOT

					controls_state = 41

			}
		}

				state = 41
			}
		}

		days_mission_timeout = 180

			is_subject = no

			has_civil_war = no

					state = 41

					value < 500

				}
				OR = {
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
					any_country = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT

				has_country_flag = black_revolution_civil_war_in_progress

		}

					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army1

					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army2
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army3
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army3
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army3
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army4
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {

				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army4
					add_idea = SOV_Unstoppable_red_army5
				}

			else = {

SOV_greater_kurdistan = {

	SOV_ask_kurdistan_territory = {

		icon = GFX_decision_ger_military_buildup

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 10

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					is_neighbor_of = ROOT
					any_country = {
						OR = {
							is_in_faction_with = ROOT
							is_subject_of = ROOT
						}
						is_neighbor_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
			is_subject = no
			has_government = neutrality
			has_completed_focus = SOV_fate_turkey
			KUR = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			has_country_flag = choose_kurdistan_over_other_option_event_tur
			is_subject = no
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					tag = ROOT
					tag = KUR
				}
				any_state = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = FROM
					OR = {
						is_claimed_by = KUR
						is_core_of = KUR
					}
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_fate_turkey
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					tag = ROOT
					tag = KUR
				}
				any_state = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = FROM
					OR = {
						is_claimed_by = KUR
						is_core_of = KUR
					}
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		war_with_target_on_remove = yes

		remove_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = russia2_russia.506
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = FROM
					ratio > 0.9
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_give_back_kurdistan_territory = {

		icon = GFX_decision_ger_military_buildup

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		state_target = yes

		available = {
			FROM = {
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				OR = {
					is_core_of = KUR
					is_claimed_by = KUR
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			ROOT = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
				is_subject = no
				has_government = neutrality
				has_completed_focus = SOV_fate_turkey
				has_country_flag = choose_kurdistan_over_other_option_event_tur
				is_subject = no
			}
			KUR = {
				is_subject_of = ROOT
			}
			FROM = {
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				OR = {
					is_core_of = KUR
					is_claimed_by = KUR
				}
			}
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				OR = {
					is_core_of = KUR
					is_claimed_by = KUR
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			KUR = {
				transfer_state = FROM
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

SOV_slavic_help = {

	SOV_help_slavic = {

		icon = GFX_decision_ger_military_buildup

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_remove = 30

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
			has_completed_focus = SOV_slavic_assistance
			has_government = neutrality
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				has_country_flag = sov_invited_focus_tsar
			}
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 0
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = sov_helping_slavic_country
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_slavic_assistance
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				has_country_flag = sov_invited_focus_tsar
			}
		}

		modifier = {
			civilian_factory_use = 1
		}

		cost = 25

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = sov_helping_slavic_country
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = sov_helping_slavic_country
			FROM = {
				country_event = russia2_russia.505
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}
}

SOV_anna_anderson_legitimacy = {

	SOV_gather_support_tsar = {

		icon = hol_radio_oranje

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = sov_anna_anderson_struggle_over
			}
			has_country_flag = sov_anna_anderson_returns_russia
			has_government = neutrality
			is_subject = no
			has_capitulated = no
			has_completed_focus = SOV_restoration_tsar
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = {
					character = SOV_Kirill_vladimirovich
					ruling_only = yes
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					character = SOV_Vladimir_kirillovich
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = SOV_the_emperor
				has_completed_focus = SOV_the_empress
				has_country_leader = {
					character = SOV_Anastasia_nikolaevna
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = sov_gathering_support_anna
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		days_remove = 25

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_AI_VLADIMIR_KIRILLOVICH_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = sov_gathering_support_tsar
			subtract_from_variable = { anna_anderson_daily_legitimacy_gain = 0.002 }
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = sov_gathering_support_tsar
			add_to_variable = { anna_anderson_daily_legitimacy_gain = 0.002 }
		}

		modifier = {
			custom_modifier_tooltip = anna_anderson_legitimacy_gain_daily_minus_02
		}
	}

	SOV_gather_support_anna = {

		icon = hol_radio_oranje

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = sov_anna_anderson_struggle_over
			}
			has_country_flag = sov_anna_anderson_returns_russia
			has_government = neutrality
			is_subject = no
			has_capitulated = no
			has_completed_focus = SOV_restoration_tsar
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = {
					character = SOV_Kirill_vladimirovich
					ruling_only = yes
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					character = SOV_Vladimir_kirillovich
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = SOV_the_emperor
				has_completed_focus = SOV_the_empress
				has_country_leader = {
					character = SOV_Anastasia_nikolaevna
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = sov_gathering_support_tsar
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		days_remove = 25

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_AI_ANASTASIA_NIKOLAEVNA_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = sov_gathering_support_anna
			add_to_variable = { anna_anderson_daily_legitimacy_gain = 0.002 }
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = sov_gathering_support_anna
			subtract_from_variable = { anna_anderson_daily_legitimacy_gain = 0.002 }
		}

		modifier = {
			custom_modifier_tooltip = anna_anderson_legitimacy_gain_daily_plus_02
		}

	}

	SOV_ask_public_opinion = {

		icon = generic_political_rally

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = sov_anna_anderson_struggle_over
			}
			has_country_flag = sov_anna_anderson_returns_russia
			has_government = neutrality
			is_subject = no
			has_capitulated = no
			has_completed_focus = SOV_restoration_tsar
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = {
					character = SOV_Kirill_vladimirovich
					ruling_only = yes
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					character = SOV_Vladimir_kirillovich
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = SOV_the_emperor
				has_completed_focus = SOV_the_empress
				has_country_leader = {
					character = SOV_Anastasia_nikolaevna
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}

		available = {

		}

		cost = 50

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_AI_VLADIMIR_KIRILLOVICH_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR
						check_variable = {
							var = anna_anderson_legitimacy
							value = 0.5
							compare = less_than
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_AI_ANASTASIA_NIKOLAEVNA_NEUTRALITY_BEHAVIOR
						check_variable = {
							var = anna_anderson_legitimacy
							value = 0.5
							compare = greater_than_or_equals
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = anna_anderson_above_50
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = anna_anderson_legitimacy
						value = 0.5
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				add_to_variable = { anna_anderson_legitimacy = 0.03 }
				clamp_variable = {
					var = anna_anderson_legitimacy
					min = 0
					max = 1
				}
				set_variable = { anna_anderson_legitimacy_gui = anna_anderson_legitimacy }
				multiply_variable = { anna_anderson_legitimacy_gui = 100 }
				multiply_variable = { anna_anderson_legitimacy_gui = 2 }
				round_variable = anna_anderson_legitimacy_gui
				clamp_variable = {
					var = anna_anderson_legitimacy
					min = 0
					max = 200
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = anna_anderson_add_legitimacy_3
			}
			else = {
				subtract_from_variable = { anna_anderson_legitimacy = 0.03 }
				clamp_variable = {
					var = anna_anderson_legitimacy
					min = 0
					max = 1
				}
				set_variable = { anna_anderson_legitimacy_gui = anna_anderson_legitimacy }
				multiply_variable = { anna_anderson_legitimacy_gui = 100 }
				multiply_variable = { anna_anderson_legitimacy_gui = 2 }
				round_variable = anna_anderson_legitimacy_gui
				clamp_variable = {
					var = anna_anderson_legitimacy
					min = 0
					max = 200
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = anna_anderson_remove_legitimacy_3
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_meeting_prince_michael_andreevich = {

		icon = generic_political_discourse

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {

				}
			}

	SOV_discover_truth = {

		icon = generic_arrest

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = sov_anna_anderson_legitimacy_100
				check_variable = {
					var = anna_anderson_legitimacy
					value = 1
					compare = greater_than_or_equals
				}
			}
		}

		is_good = no

		activation = {
			has_country_flag = sov_anna_anderson_returns_russia
		}

		visible = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = sov_anna_anderson_struggle_over
			}
			has_country_flag = sov_anna_anderson_returns_russia
			has_government = neutrality
			is_subject = no
			has_capitulated = no
			has_completed_focus = SOV_restoration_tsar
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = {
					character = SOV_Kirill_vladimirovich
					ruling_only = yes
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					character = SOV_Vladimir_kirillovich
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = SOV_the_emperor
				has_completed_focus = SOV_the_empress
				has_country_leader = {
					character = SOV_Anastasia_nikolaevna
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}

		is_good = no

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_mission_timeout = 222

		timeout_effect = {
            country_event = russia2_russia.514
        }

		complete_effect = {
			country_event = russia2_russia.515
		}
	}
}

SOV_buy_african_colonies_decisions = {

	SOV_buy_african_state = {

		icon = hol_attract_foreign_investors

		state_target = yes

		target_array = sov_african_colonies_purchase_array

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = sov_buying_african_state
			}
			FROM = {
				NOT = {
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = FROM.CONTROLLER
				}
			}
			FROM.OWNER = {
				controls_state = FROM
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				FROM = {
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
				FROM = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
				}
				FROM = {
					is_core_of = FROM.OWNER
				}
				FROM.OWNER = {
					NOT = {
						controls_state = FROM
					}
				}
				FROM.OWNER = {
					has_war_with = ROOT
				}
				FROM.OWNER = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				}
				FROM.OWNER = {
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			has_government = neutrality
			is_subject = no
			has_capitulated = no
			has_completed_focus = SOV_purchase_african_colonies
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 50

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 80
		}

		days_remove = 10

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = sov_buying_african_state
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = sov_buying_african_state
			FROM.OWNER = {
				country_event = russia2_russia.516
			}
		}
	}
}

SOV_encourage_investments_democratic_decisions = {

	SOV_encourage_investment_democratic_in_state = {

		icon = gre_paying_ifc_debt

		state_target = yes

		target_array = sov_democratic_investments_random_states

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 0
			FROM = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
			}
			political_power_daily > 0.09
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
					}
					NOT = {
						is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			owns_state = FROM
			has_government = democratic
			is_subject = no
			has_capitulated = no
			has_completed_focus = SOV_encourage_investments
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		cost = 10

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}

		days_remove = 90

		complete_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { cost_pp_infrastructure = 10 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { cost_pp_infrastructure = FROM.infrastructure_level }
			multiply_temp_variable = { cost_pp_infrastructure = -10 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						check_variable = {
							var = cost_pp_infrastructure
							value = 0
							compare = equals
						}
					}
				}
				add_political_power = var:cost_pp_infrastructure
			}
		}

		modifier = {
			political_power_gain = -0.1
			civilian_factory_use = 1
		}

		remove_effect = {
			FROM = {
				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
				add_building_construction = {
					type = industrial_complex
					level = 2
					instant_build = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						is_coastal = yes
					}
					add_building_construction = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}
					add_building_construction = {
						type = dockyard
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
				else = {
					add_building_construction = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 2
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

SOV_external_threats_decisions = {

	SOV_demand_dismantle_faction = {

		icon = generic_break_treaty

     	available = {
     	    has_completed_focus = SOV_fight_extremist_ideas
			num_faction_members > 1
			surrender_progress < 0.05
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = sov_democratic_vote_started
			}
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = FROM
			}
     	}

		visible = {
			has_government = democratic
			is_subject = no
			has_capitulated = no
			has_completed_focus = SOV_external_threats
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_subject = no
				is_faction_leader = yes
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						has_government = democratic
						has_government = neutrality
					}
					has_added_tension_amount > 10
					has_wargoal_against = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			tag = SOV
			has_completed_focus = SOV_fight_extremist_ideas
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_subject = no
				is_faction_leader = yes
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						has_government = democratic
						has_government = neutrality
					}
					has_added_tension_amount > 10
					has_wargoal_against = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = democratic
				}
				is_subject = yes
				has_capitulated = yes
			}
		}

     	fire_only_once = yes

     	cost = 50

		days_remove = 10

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1000
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = FROM
					ratio > 1
				}
			}
		}

     	complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clear_array = SOV.current_democratic_vote
				clear_array = SOV.current_democratic_vote_not
				clear_array = SOV.current_democratic_vote_for
				clear_array = SOV.current_democratic_vote_against
				clear_array = SOV.current_democratic_vote_registered
				clear_array = SOV.current_democratic_vote_participants
				clr_country_flag = sov_democratic_target_alone
				clr_country_flag = sov_democratic_target_alliance
				clr_country_flag = sov_democratic_vote_started
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = sov_voted_yes_last_vote
							has_country_flag = sov_voted_no_last_vote
							has_country_flag = sov_voted_not_last_vote
						}
					}
					clr_country_flag = sov_voted_yes_last_vote
					clr_country_flag = sov_voted_no_last_vote
					clr_country_flag = sov_voted_not_last_vote
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				save_event_target_as = sov_current_democratic_target_event_target
			}
			set_country_flag = sov_democratic_vote_started
			set_country_flag = sov_democratic_target_alliance
			set_variable = { SOV.current_democratic_target = FROM.id }
			resize_array = { current_democratic_vote = 2 }
			calculate_sov_gui_percentage_democratic_vote = yes
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					exists = yes
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					SOV = {
						add_to_array = { current_democratic_vote_participants = PREV }
					}
				}
				country_event = russia2_russia.527
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = SOV.current_democratic_vote^0
						value = SOV.current_democratic_vote^1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				country_event = russia2_russia.528
			}
			else = {
				country_event = russia2_russia.529
			}
		}
    }

	SOV_demand_puppet_external_threat = {

		icon = hol_war_on_pacifism

     	available = {
     	    has_completed_focus = SOV_defenders_of_democracy
			num_faction_members > 1
			surrender_progress < 0.05
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = sov_democratic_vote_started
			}
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = FROM
			}
     	}

		visible = {
			has_government = democratic
			is_subject = no
			has_capitulated = no
			has_completed_focus = SOV_external_threats
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_subject = no
				is_in_faction = no
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						has_government = democratic
						has_government = neutrality
					}
					has_added_tension_amount > 10
					has_wargoal_against = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			tag = SOV
			has_completed_focus = SOV_defenders_of_democracy
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_subject = no
				is_in_faction = no
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						has_government = democratic
						has_government = neutrality
					}
					has_added_tension_amount > 10
					has_wargoal_against = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = democratic
				}
				is_subject = yes
				has_capitulated = yes
			}
		}

     	fire_only_once = yes

     	cost = 50

		days_remove = 10

		ai_will_do = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1000
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = FROM
					ratio > 1
				}
			}
		}

     	complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				clear_array = SOV.current_democratic_vote
				clear_array = SOV.current_democratic_vote_not
				clear_array = SOV.current_democratic_vote_for
				clear_array = SOV.current_democratic_vote_against
				clear_array = SOV.current_democratic_vote_registered
				clear_array = SOV.current_democratic_vote_participants
				clr_country_flag = sov_democratic_target_alone
				clr_country_flag = sov_democratic_target_alliance
				clr_country_flag = sov_democratic_vote_started
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = sov_voted_yes_last_vote
							has_country_flag = sov_voted_no_last_vote
							has_country_flag = sov_voted_not_last_vote
						}
					}
					clr_country_flag = sov_voted_yes_last_vote
					clr_country_flag = sov_voted_no_last_vote
					clr_country_flag = sov_voted_not_last_vote
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				save_event_target_as = sov_current_democratic_target_event_target
			}
			set_country_flag = sov_democratic_vote_started
			set_country_flag = sov_democratic_target_alone
			set_variable = { current_democratic_target = FROM.id }
			resize_array = { current_democratic_vote = 2 }
			calculate_sov_gui_percentage_democratic_vote = yes
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					exists = yes
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					SOV = {
						add_to_array = { current_democratic_vote_participants = PREV }
					}
				}
				country_event = russia2_russia.527
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = SOV.current_democratic_vote^0
						value = SOV.current_democratic_vote^1
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
				country_event = russia2_russia.528
				hidden_effect = {
					for_each_scope_loop = {
						array = current_democratic_vote_participants

						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									tag = SOV
								}
							}
							country_event = russia2_russia.536
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = russia2_russia.529
				hidden_effect = {
					for_each_scope_loop = {
						array = current_democratic_vote_participants

						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									tag = SOV
								}
							}
							country_event = russia2_russia.537
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
    }
}

SOV_reinstore_german_monarchy_decisions = {

	SOV_restore_german_monarchy = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_ally_imperialist_coup

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet
				has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet_reduced
				has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_no_puppet
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = will_launch_monarchist_insurrection
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = will_launch_monarchist_insurrection
			}
			has_war = no
			is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = has_successfully_contacted_german_exile_monarch
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet
					has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet_reduced
					has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_no_puppet
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = germany_condition_to_restore_kaiser_in_throne
				OR = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							country_exists = GER
						}
						OR = {
							SOV = {
								any_owned_state = {
									is_core_of = GER
								}
							}
							any_country = {
								any_owned_state = {
									is_core_of = GER
								}
								OR = {
									is_in_faction_with = SOV
									is_subject_of = SOV
								}
							}
						}
					}
					GER = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
					}
					any_country = {
						GER = {
							is_subject_of = PREV
						}
						is_in_faction_with = SOV
					}
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia2_russia.228 }
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}

	SOV_ultimatum_foreign_country_for_german_puppet = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_support_imperialist_coup

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = SOV
					has_war_with = SOV
				}
			}
			GER = {
				is_subject_of = FROM
			}
		}

		visible = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet
				has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet_reduced
				has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_no_puppet
			}
			country_exists = GER
			any_country = {
				GER = {
					is_subject_of = FROM
				}
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = SOV
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				GER = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_war = no
			is_subject = no
			country_exists = GER
			NOT = {
				FROM = {
					has_war_with = SOV
					is_in_faction_with = SOV
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = has_successfully_contacted_german_exile_monarch
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet
					has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet_reduced
					has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_no_puppet
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = ger_is_subject_of_from
				any_country = {
					GER = {
						is_subject_of = FROM
					}
					NOT = {
						is_in_faction_with = SOV
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				GER = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		complete_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia2_russia.232 }
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}

	SOV_launch_monarchist_insurrection = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_demand

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet
				has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet_reduced
				has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_no_puppet
			}
			NOT = {
				GER = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
			country_exists = GER
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = any_neighbor_states_is_german
				OR = {
					any_state = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
						any_neighbor_state = {
							is_core_of = GER
							is_owned_and_controlled_by = GER
						}
					}
					POL = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						any_state = {
							is_owned_and_controlled_by = PREV
							any_neighbor_state = {
								is_core_of = GER
								is_owned_and_controlled_by = GER
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			country_exists = GER
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = GER
				GER = {
					OR = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
						is_in_faction_with = SOV
					}
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = has_successfully_contacted_german_exile_monarch
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet
					has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet_reduced
					has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_no_puppet
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 100

		days_remove = 70

		cancel_trigger = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}

		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				random_state = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							state = 762
						}
						is_core_of = GER
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = GER
						any_neighbor_state = {
							OR = {
								is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
								is_owned_and_controlled_by = POL
							}
							NOT = {
								has_state_flag = random_prussian_state_1
								has_state_flag = random_prussian_state_2
								has_state_flag = random_prussian_state_3
								has_state_flag = random_prussian_state_4
								has_state_flag = random_prussian_state_5
							}
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = random_prussian_state_1
				}
				GER = {
					activate_mission = SOV_civil_war_monarchy_incoming
					set_country_flag = is_victim_of_russia_civil_war
				}
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = release_imperial_prussia_and_strat_war_with_germany
			hidden_effect = {
				set_country_flag = will_launch_monarchist_insurrection
				random_state = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							state = 762
						}
						is_core_of = GER
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = GER
						any_neighbor_state = {
							OR = {
								is_owned_and_controlled_by = SOV
								is_owned_and_controlled_by = POL
							}
							NOT = {
								has_state_flag = random_prussian_state_1
								has_state_flag = random_prussian_state_2
								has_state_flag = random_prussian_state_3
							}
						}
					}
					set_state_flag = random_prussian_state_2
				}
				country_event = { id = russia2_germany.34 }
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_state_flag = random_prussian_state_1
							has_state_flag = random_prussian_state_2
							has_state_flag = random_prussian_state_3
						}
					}
					PRE = {
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
				GER = {
					release = PRE
					clr_country_flag = is_victim_of_russia_civil_war
				}
				declare_war_on = {
					target = GER
					type = puppet_wargoal_focus
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						POL = {
							is_subject_of = SOV
						}
					}
					POL = {
						add_to_war = {
							targeted_alliance = SOV
							enemy = GER
							hostility_reason = asked_to_join
						}
					}
				}
				PRE = {
					set_cosmetic_tag = GEC
					declare_war_on = {
						target = GER
						type = annex_everything
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet
							}
						}
						SOV = {
							set_autonomy = {
								target = PRE
								autonomy_state = autonomy_imperial_governorates
							}
						}
						set_politics = {
							ruling_party = neutrality
							elections_allowed = no
						}
						hidden_effect = {
							set_popularities = {
								democratic = 10
								neutrality = 70
								fascism = 10
								communism = 10
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								date < 1941.06.04
							}
							create_country_leader = {
								name = "Wilhelm II"

	SOV_demand_foreign_country_german_land = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_trade_unions_demand

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet
				has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet_reduced
				has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_no_puppet
			}
			FROM = {
				any_state = {
					is_owned_by = PREV
					is_core_of = GER
				}
				NOT = {
					tag = GER
					tag = SOV
					is_in_faction_with = SOV
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				any_state = {
					is_owned_by = PREV
					is_core_of = GER
				}
				NOT = {
					tag = GER
					tag = SOV
					is_in_faction_with = SOV
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = has_successfully_contacted_german_exile_monarch
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet
					has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet_reduced
					has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_no_puppet
				}
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = from_own_core_of_germany
				FROM = {
					any_state = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = PREV
						is_core_of = GER
					}
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		complete_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_russia.229 days = 1 }
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}

	SOV_restore_prussia_monarchy = {

							owner = PRE

					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"9th Infanterie-Division\" division_template = \"Infanterie-Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"10th Infanterie-Division\" division_template = \"Infanterie-Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = PRE
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"11th Infanterie-Division\" division_template = \"Infanterie-Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

							division = "name = \"12th Infanterie-Division\" division_template = \"Infanterie-Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

	SOV_restore_bavaria_monarchy = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_support_imperialist_coup

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_country_flag = decide_to_restore_prussia_and_other_kingdom_for_decisions
			NOT = {
				country_exists = CFR
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				country_exists = CFR
			}
			has_war = no
			is_subject = no
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = bavaria_is_owned_by_root_or_puppet
				OR = {
					54 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					any_country = {
						owns_state = 54
						is_subject_of = SOV
					}
				}
				OR = {
					53 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					any_country = {
						owns_state = 53
						is_subject_of = SOV
					}
				}
				OR = {
					52 = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					any_country = {
						owns_state = 52
						is_subject_of = SOV
					}
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = release_bavaria_as_puppet
			hidden_effect = {
				BAY = {
					inherit_technology = SOV
					add_state_core = 52
					add_state_core = 53
					add_state_core = 54
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = BAY
						any_country = {
							OR = {
								tag = SOV
								is_subject_of = SOV
							}
							owns_state = PREV
						}
					}
					BAY = {
						transfer_state = PREV
					}
				}
				SOV = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = BAY
						autonomy_state = autonomy_puppet
					}
				}
				BAY = {
					division_template = {
						name = "Bavarian Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Bavarian Division\" division_template = \"Bavarian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = BAY
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Bavarian Division\" division_template = \"Bavarian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = BAY
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Bavarian Division\" division_template = \"Bavarian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = BAY
						}
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 10
						neutrality = 70
						fascism = 10
						communism = 10
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}

	SOV_restore_wurttemberg_monarchy = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_support_imperialist_coup

		}

				country_exists = CFR
			}
		}

			NOT = {
				country_exists = CFR
			}
			has_war = no
			is_subject = no

				50 = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
				any_country = {
					owns_state = 50
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = release_wurttemberg_as_puppet
			hidden_effect = {
				WUR = {
					inherit_technology = SOV
					add_state_core = 50
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = WUR
						any_country = {
							OR = {
								tag = SOV
								is_subject_of = SOV
							}
							owns_state = PREV
						}
					}
					WUR = {
						transfer_state = PREV
					}
				}
				SOV = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = WUR
						autonomy_state = autonomy_puppet
					}
				}
				WUR = {
					division_template = {
						name = "Wurttemberg Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Wurttemberg Division\" division_template = \"Wurttemberg Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WUR
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Wurttemberg Division\" division_template = \"Wurttemberg Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WUR
						}
					}
					random_owned_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Wurttemberg Division\" division_template = \"Wurttemberg Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WUR
						}
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 10
						neutrality = 70
						fascism = 10
						communism = 10
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_support_imperialist_coup

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_country_flag = decide_to_restore_prussia_and_other_kingdom_for_decisions
			NOT = {
				country_exists = BAY
				country_exists = WUR
				country_exists = HAN
				country_exists = RHI
			}
		}

		available = {

				country_exists = BAY

			hidden_effect = {
				CFR = {
					inherit_technology = SOV
					add_state_core = 50
					add_state_core = 52
					add_state_core = 53
					add_state_core = 54
					add_state_core = 58
					add_state_core = 59
					add_state_core = 56
					add_state_core = 57
					add_state_core = 51
					add_state_core = 42
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = CFR
						any_country = {
							OR = {
								tag = SOV
								is_subject_of = SOV

						}

					}

				SOV = {

						target = CFR

					}

				CFR = {
					division_template = {
						name = "Rhenish Confederate Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }

							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }

						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }

					}
					division_template = {
						name = "Rhenish Confederate Panzer Division"

							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 1 }

							engineer = { x = 0 y = 1 }

	SOV_fate_of_poland_monarchist_choice_subject = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_operation

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_country_flag = poland_accept_imperial_puppet
			has_country_flag = restoration_german_monarchy_kaiser
		}

		available = {
			country_exists = POL
			is_subject = no
			has_war = no
			has_government = neutrality
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = decide_to_restore_prussia_and_other_kingdom_for_decisions
					country_exists = PRE
					PRE = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = SOV_fate_of_poland_monarchist_choice_subject_tt_trig_pre
					PRE = {
						OR = {
							is_subject_of = SOV
							AND = {
								is_in_faction_with = SOV
								has_government = neutrality
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = has_successfully_contacted_german_exile_monarch
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet
						has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet_reduced
						has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_no_puppet
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = SOV_fate_of_poland_monarchist_choice_subject_tt_trig
					GER = {
						OR = {
							is_subject_of = SOV
							AND = {
								is_in_faction_with = SOV
								has_government = neutrality
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			POL = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
		}

		complete_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia2_russia.248 }
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}

	SOV_fate_of_poland_monarchist_choice_cede_eastern_pol = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_operation

		fire_only_once = yes

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_country_flag = has_given_eastern_poland
			has_country_flag = restoration_german_monarchy_kaiser
		}

		available = {
			is_subject = no
			has_war = no
			has_government = neutrality
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = decide_to_restore_prussia_and_other_kingdom_for_decisions
					country_exists = PRE
					PRE = {
						is_subject_of = SOV
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = SOV_fate_of_poland_monarchist_choice_subject_tt_trig_pre
					PRE = {
						OR = {
							is_subject_of = SOV
							AND = {
								is_in_faction_with = SOV
								has_government = neutrality
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = has_successfully_contacted_german_exile_monarch
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet
						has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_puppet_reduced
						has_country_flag = ger_exiles_accept_no_puppet
					}
				}
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = SOV_fate_of_poland_monarchist_choice_subject_tt_trig
					GER = {
						OR = {
							is_subject_of = SOV
							AND = {
								is_in_faction_with = SOV
								has_government = neutrality
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				POL = {
					is_subject_of = SOV
				}
			}
			country_exists = POL
		}

		complete_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia2_russia.252 }
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}

								has_government = neutrality

			factor = 80
		}
	}

SOV_restore_french_monarchy_decisions_cat = {

	SOV_support_monarchist_movement_france = {

		icon = GFX_decision_eng_propaganda_campaigns

		days_re_enable = 140

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			country_exists = FRA
			NOT = {
				FRA = {
					has_government = neutrality
				}
			}
			FRA = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea
					has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea_2
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				FRA = {
					has_government = neutrality
					is_subject = yes
				}
				has_war_with = FRA
			}
			country_exists = FRA
		}

		cost = 150

		days_remove = 70

		complete_effect = {

		}

		remove_effect = {
			FRA = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = neutrality
					popularity = 0.05
				}
			}
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			FRA = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = not_has_idea_french_monarchist_sentiment
					NOT = {
						has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea
					}
					NOT = {
						has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea_2
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}

	SOV_fund_the_monarchist_party_france = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_attract_foreign_investors

		days_re_enable = 100

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			country_exists = FRA
			NOT = {
				FRA = {
					has_government = neutrality
				}
			}
			FRA = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea
					has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea_2
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			NOT = {
				FRA = {
					has_government = neutrality
					is_subject = yes
				}
				has_war_with = FRA
			}
			country_exists = FRA
		}

		cost = 100

		days_remove = 70

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = boosting_french_monarchy_party
			FRA = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea
					add_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea_2
				}
			}
		}

		cancel_trigger = {
			FRA = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = not_has_idea_french_monarchist_sentiment
					NOT = {
						has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea
					}
					NOT = {
						has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea_2
					}
				}
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = boosting_french_monarchy_party
			FRA = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea_2
					add_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}

	SOV_influence_monarchist_leaders_france = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_political_discourse

		days_re_enable = 35

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			country_exists = FRA
			NOT = {
				FRA = {
					has_government = neutrality
				}
			}
			FRA = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea
					has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea_2
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = not_has_over_100_influence_monarchist
				NOT = {
					check_variable = {
						var = french_monarchist_leader_influence_var
						value = 100
						compare = greater_than_or_equals
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = FRA
				FRA = {
					has_government = neutrality
					is_subject = yes
				}
			}
			country_exists = FRA
		}

		cost = 50

		complete_effect = {

		}

		days_remove = 70

		cancel_trigger = {
			FRA = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = not_has_idea_french_monarchist_sentiment
					NOT = {
						has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea
					}
					NOT = {
						has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea_2
					}
				}
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = french_monarchist_leader_influence_var
			    value = 20
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = wil_add_20_chance_french
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}

	SOV_launch_civil_war_french_monarchist = {

		fire_only_once = yes

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_military

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			country_exists = FRA
			NOT = {
				FRA = {
					has_government = neutrality
				}
			}
			FRA = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea
					has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea_2
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			FRA = {
				neutrality > 0.3
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = boosting_french_monarchy_party
				FRA = {
					has_government = neutrality
					is_subject = yes
					has_war = yes
				}
			}
			country_exists = FRA
		}

		cost = 100

		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				FRA = {
					activate_mission = SOV_civil_war_monarchy_incoming
					set_country_flag = is_victim_of_russia_civil_war
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = more_neutrality_and_more_power_monarchy
			set_country_flag = is_doing_finale_france
			randomize_variable = {
				var = randomize_french_monarchist_leader_influence_var
				distribution = uniform
				min = 0
				max = 100
			}
			round_variable = randomize_french_monarchist_leader_influence_var
			add_to_variable = {
				var = french_monarchist_leader_influence_var
				value = randomize_french_monarchist_leader_influence_var
			}
			round_variable = french_monarchist_leader_influence_var
		}

		days_remove = 70

		cancel_trigger = {
			FRA = {
				has_war = yes
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = not_has_idea_french_monarchist_sentiment
					NOT = {
						has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea
					}
					NOT = {
						has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea_2
					}
				}
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_owned_by = FRA
					}
					set_state_flag = french_state_before_monarchist_war
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = launched_civil_war_for_monarchist_france
			clr_country_flag = is_doing_finale_france
			FRA = {
				clr_country_flag = is_victim_of_russia_civil_war
				remove_ideas = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea
				start_civil_war = {
					ideology = neutrality
					size = party_popularity@neutrality
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}

	SOV_help_french_monarchist_coup_detat = {

		fire_only_once = yes

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_political_rally

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = launched_civil_war_for_monarchist_france
			}
			country_exists = FRA
			NOT = {
				FRA = {
					has_government = neutrality
				}
			}
			FRA = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea
					has_idea = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea_2
				}
			}
		}

		available = {
			hidden_trigger = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = is_doing_finale_france
				}
			}
			FRA = {
				neutrality > 0.6
			}
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = FRA
				has_country_flag = boosting_french_monarchy_party
				FRA = {
					has_government = neutrality
					is_subject = yes
					has_war = yes
				}
			}
			country_exists = FRA
		}

		cost = 150

		complete_effect = {
			FRA = {
				remove_ideas = SOV_french_monarchist_sentiment_idea
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = neutrality
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = neutrality
					long_name = FRA_orleanist_party_long
					name = FRA_orleanist_party
				}
				set_cosmetic_tag = FRA_ORLEANS
				if = {
					limit = {
						date < 1940.8.25
					}
					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Jean III"
						desc = "POLITICS_JEAN_III_DESC"
						picture = GFX_portrait_fra_jean_duke_of_guise
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = moderatism
						traits = {
							duke_of_orleans
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Henri VI"
						desc = "POLITICS_HENRI_VI_DESC"
						picture = GFX_portrait_fra_henry_count_of_paris
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = moderatism
						traits = {
							count_of_paris
						}
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				randomize_variable = {
					var = randomize_french_monarchist_leader_influence_var
					distribution = uniform
					min = 0
					max = 100
				}
				round_variable = randomize_french_monarchist_leader_influence_var
				add_to_variable = {
					var = french_monarchist_leader_influence_var
			    	value = randomize_french_monarchist_leader_influence_var
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							var = french_monarchist_leader_influence_var
							value = 100
							compare = greater_than_or_equals
						}
					}
					SOV = {
						set_autonomy = {
							target = FRA
							autonomy_state = autonomy_imperial_governorates
						}
					}
					FRA = {
						set_popularities = {
							democratic = 10
							neutrality = 70
							fascism = 10
							communism = 10
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					SOV = {
						add_to_faction = FRA
					}
					FRA = {
						add_ai_strategy = {
							type = alliance
							id = SOV
							value = 100
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}

							}
						}
					}
