	SOV_launch_revolution_to_from_indi = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_ignite_civil_war

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			has_country_flag = can_launch_anarchist_civil_war_indivudualist
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_owner_neighbor_of = SOV
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_government = anarchy
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_launching_a_civil_war_anarchist_indi
				has_global_flag = an_anarchist_recolution_is_happening_indi
				has_war = yes
				has_war_with = FROM
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = cooldown_has_passed_210_days_tt
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = is_on_cooldown_anarchist_revolution_indi
					}
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = is_on_cooldown_anarchist_revolution_indi
						days > 210
					}
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				custom_trigger_tooltip = {
					tooltip = has_idea_anarchist_uprising_tt
					OR = {
						has_idea = SOV_Anarchist_uprising
						has_idea = SOV_Anarchist_uprising_2
						has_idea = SOV_Anarchist_uprising_3
						has_idea = SOV_Anarchist_uprising_4
						has_idea = SOV_Anarchist_uprising_5
						has_idea = SOV_Anarchist_uprising_6
						has_idea = SOV_Anarchist_uprising_7
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_civil_war = yes
					has_war_with = SOV
					has_war = yes
					is_subject = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							SOV = {
								has_country_flag = can_launch_anarchist_revolution_major
							}
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						is_major = yes
					}
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { from_army_size = FROM.num_battalions }
			set_temp_variable = { from_owned_controlled_states = FROM.owned_controlled_states }
			multiply_temp_variable = { from_owned_controlled_states = 1.5}
			round_temp_variable = from_owned_controlled_states
			multiply_temp_variable = { from_army_size = from_owned_controlled_states }
			clamp_temp_variable = {
				var = from_army_size
				min = 0
				max = 30000
			}
			has_equipment = {
				infantry_equipment > from_army_size
			}
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = SOV_Anarchist_uprising
					has_idea = SOV_Anarchist_uprising_2
					has_idea = SOV_Anarchist_uprising_3
					has_idea = SOV_Anarchist_uprising_4
					has_idea = SOV_Anarchist_uprising_5
					has_idea = SOV_Anarchist_uprising_6
					has_idea = SOV_Anarchist_uprising_7
				}
				is_neighbor_of = SOV
				check_variable = {
					var = var:num_owned_states
					value = 1
					compare = greater_than
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		days_remove = 70

		fire_only_once = yes

		cancel_trigger = {
			has_war = yes
			has_war_with = FROM
			FROM = {
				has_war = yes
			}
			NOT = {
				has_government = anarchy
			}
		}

		cancel_effect = {
			clr_global_flag = an_anarchist_recolution_is_happening_indi
			clr_country_flag = is_launching_a_civil_war_anarchist_indi
		}

		complete_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_on_cooldown_anarchist_revolution_indi
			set_country_flag = is_launching_a_civil_war_anarchist_indi
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_generic.58 }
			}
		}

		remove_effect = {
			set_global_flag = an_anarchist_recolution_is_happening_indi
			set_country_flag = is_on_cooldown_anarchist_revolution_indi
			clr_country_flag = is_launching_a_civil_war_anarchist_indi
			set_temp_variable = { from_army_size = FROM.num_battalions }
			set_temp_variable = { from_owned_controlled_states = FROM.owned_controlled_states }
			multiply_temp_variable = { from_owned_controlled_states = 1.5 }
			round_temp_variable = from_owned_controlled_states
			multiply_temp_variable = { from_army_size = from_owned_controlled_states }
			multiply_temp_variable = { from_army_size = -1 }
			clamp_temp_variable = {
				var = from_army_size
				min = -30000
				max = 0
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = from_army_size
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_launch_revolution_to_from_indi_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				FROM = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_in_faction = yes
						}
						leave_faction = yes
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								check_variable = {
									var = anarchist_militants_civil_war_strength_var
									value = 1
									compare = equals
								}
							}
						}
						start_civil_war = {
							ideology = anarchy
							size = 0.3
							keep_unit_leaders_trigger = {
								is_unit_leader = yes
							}
							keep_political_leader = yes
							keep_political_party_members = yes
						}
						add_timed_idea = {
							idea = SOV_Anarchist_sabotage
							days = 21
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								check_variable = {
									var = anarchist_militants_civil_war_strength_var
									value = 2
									compare = equals
								}
							}
						}
						start_civil_war = {
							ideology = anarchy
							size = 0.4
							keep_unit_leaders_trigger = {
								is_unit_leader = yes
							}
							keep_political_leader = yes
							keep_political_party_members = yes
						}
						add_timed_idea = {
							idea = SOV_Anarchist_sabotage
							days = 14
						}
					}
					else = {
						start_civil_war = {
							ideology = anarchy
							size = 0.5
							keep_unit_leaders_trigger = {
								is_unit_leader = yes
							}
							keep_political_leader = yes
							keep_political_party_members = yes
						}
					}
					add_ideas = SOV_Anarchist_civil_war_revolution
				}
				random_other_country = {
					limit = {
						original_tag = FROM
						has_government = anarchy
					}
					set_cosmetic_tag = ANAR
					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Anarchists Partisan"
						desc = "ANARCHIST_PARTISAN_DESC"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/SOV/Portrait_Russia_Anarchist_Commune.dds"
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = anarchist
						traits = {

						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								has_country_flag = can_launch_anarchist_revolution_major
							}
						}
						add_ideas = SOV_Guerilla_warfare_tactics
					}
					add_ideas = SOV_Anarchist_civil_war_revolution
					if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								check_variable = {
									var = anarchist_militants_civil_war_strength_var
									value = 1
									compare = equals
								}
							}
						}
						add_timed_idea = {
							idea = SOV_Anarchist_sabotage
							days = 21
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							SOV = {
								check_variable = {
									var = anarchist_militants_civil_war_strength_var
									value = 2
									compare = equals
								}
							}
						}
						add_timed_idea = {
							idea = SOV_Anarchist_sabotage
							days = 14
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 50
		}
	}

	SOV_invite_from_to_anarchist_faction = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_political_discourse

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			SOV = {
				has_idea = SOV_Contact_with_outside
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_government = anarchy
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_inviting_a_country_anarchist
				has_war = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction = yes
					has_civil_war = yes
					has_war_with = SOV
					is_subject = yes
				}
			}
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						SOV = {
							has_completed_focus = SOV_spread_revolution_east
							NOT = {
								has_country_flag = expand_diplomacy_outside_europe
							}
						}
					}
					any_state = {
						is_capital = yes
						is_on_continent = europe
						is_owned_by = FROM
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						SOV = {
							has_completed_focus = SOV_spread_revolution_east
							has_country_flag = expand_diplomacy_outside_europe
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						any_state = {
							is_capital = yes
							is_on_continent = asia
							is_owned_by = FROM
						}
						any_state = {
							is_capital = yes
							is_on_continent = middle_east
							is_owned_by = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						SOV = {
							has_completed_focus = SOV_spread_revolution_west
							NOT = {
								has_country_flag = expand_diplomacy_outside_asia
							}
						}
					}
					OR = {
						any_state = {
							is_capital = yes
							is_on_continent = asia
							is_owned_by = FROM
						}
						any_state = {
							is_capital = yes
							is_on_continent = middle_east
							is_owned_by = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						SOV = {
							has_completed_focus = SOV_spread_revolution_west
							has_country_flag = expand_diplomacy_outside_asia
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						any_state = {
							is_capital = yes
							is_on_continent = europe
							is_owned_by = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					has_government = neutrality
					has_government = democratic
				}
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction = yes
					has_civil_war = yes
					has_war_with = SOV
					is_subject = yes
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 50

		days_remove = 70

		fire_only_once = yes

		cancel_trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
		}

		cancel_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_inviting_a_country_anarchist
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_inviting_a_country_anarchist
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_inviting_a_country_anarchist
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_generic.52 hours = 1 }
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 50
		}
	}

	SOV_join_from_to_anarchist_faction = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_political_discourse

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {
			SOV = {
				has_idea = SOV_Contact_with_outside
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = cant_spam_join_faction_anarchist
			}
		}

		available = {
			has_government = anarchy
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = FROM
				has_war = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						tag = GER
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					GER = {
						has_government = fascism
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						tag = JAP
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					JAP = {
						has_government = neutrality
					}
				}
			}
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						SOV = {
							has_completed_focus = SOV_spread_revolution_east
							NOT = {
								has_country_flag = expand_diplomacy_outside_europe
							}
						}
					}
					any_state = {
						is_capital = yes
						is_on_continent = europe
						is_owned_by = FROM
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						SOV = {
							has_completed_focus = SOV_spread_revolution_east
							has_country_flag = expand_diplomacy_outside_europe
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						any_state = {
							is_capital = yes
							is_on_continent = asia
							is_owned_by = FROM
						}
						any_state = {
							is_capital = yes
							is_on_continent = middle_east
							is_owned_by = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						SOV = {
							has_completed_focus = SOV_spread_revolution_west
							NOT = {
								has_country_flag = expand_diplomacy_outside_asia
							}
						}
					}
					OR = {
						any_state = {
							is_capital = yes
							is_on_continent = asia
							is_owned_by = FROM
						}
						any_state = {
							is_capital = yes
							is_on_continent = middle_east
							is_owned_by = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						SOV = {
							has_completed_focus = SOV_spread_revolution_west
							has_country_flag = expand_diplomacy_outside_asia
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						any_state = {
							is_capital = yes
							is_on_continent = europe
							is_owned_by = FROM
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						FROM = {
							tag = GER
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						GER = {
							has_government = fascism
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						FROM = {
							tag = JAP
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						JAP = {
							has_government = neutrality
						}
					}
				}
				is_faction_leader = yes
				NOT = {
					has_civil_war = yes
					has_war_with = SOV
				}
			}
		}

		cost = 25

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = cant_spam_join_faction_anarchist
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_generic.55 hours = 1 }
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 50
		}
	}
}

SOV_mission_anarchist_revolution = {

	SOV_anarchist_revolution_timeout = {

		icon = generic_civil_support

		available = {
			OR = {
				has_war = yes
				has_war_with = SOV
				NOT = {
					SOV = {
						has_government = anarchy
					}
				}
			}
		}

		activation = {
			has_country_flag = is_victim_of_russian_anarchism
		}

		visible = {

		}

		is_good = no

		fire_only_once = yes

		days_mission_timeout = 70

		timeout_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_victim_of_russian_anarchism
            custom_effect_tooltip = we_will_enter_civil_war_anarchist_tt
        }
	}
}

SOV_anarchist_the_peoples_commune_formation = {

	SOV_form_commune_eastern_europe_puppet = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_form_nation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {

		}

		available = {
			has_government = anarchy
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_form_commune_eastern_europe_available_tt
				must_owns_20_valid_eastern_european_states_trigger_anarchist = yes
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				give_core_to_EAC_puppet = yes
			}
			SOV = {
				release_autonomy = {
					target = EAC
					autonomy_state = autonomy_russian_commune_people
					freedom_level = 0.5
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				EAC = {
					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Council of Eastern Europe"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/SOV/Portrait_Russia_Anarchist_Commune.dds"
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = anarchist
						traits = {

						}
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 5
						neutrality = 5
						fascism = 5
						communism = 5
						anarchy = 80
					}
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "Eastern European Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "Eastern European Tank"
						priority = 2
						regiments = {
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 4 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 0 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 1 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 2 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 3 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 4 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 0 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 1 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 2 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 3 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							light_tank_recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Eastern European Division\" division_template = \"Eastern European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = EAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Eastern European Division\" division_template = \"Eastern European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = EAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Eastern European Division\" division_template = \"Eastern European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = EAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"4th Eastern European Division\" division_template = \"Eastern European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = EAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"5th Eastern European Division\" division_template = \"Eastern European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = EAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"6th Eastern European Division\" division_template = \"Eastern European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = EAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"7th Eastern European Division\" division_template = \"Eastern European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = EAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"8th Eastern European Division\" division_template = \"Eastern European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = EAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"9th Eastern European Division\" division_template = \"Eastern European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = EAC

			}

				NOT = {
					tag = EAC
				}
				any_state = {
					is_core_of = EAC
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = FROM
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_form_the_communes_of_peoples
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_subject_of = SOV
				NOT = {
					tag = EAC
				}
				any_state = {
					is_core_of = EAC
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = FROM
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do =  {
			factor = 100
		}

		complete_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_generic.60 }
			}
		}

		}

		visible = {

				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			any_state = {
				is_core_of = EAC
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

			factor = 100

					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Council of Northern Europe"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/SOV/Portrait_Russia_Anarchist_Commune.dds"
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = anarchist
						traits = {

						}
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 5
						neutrality = 5
						fascism = 5
						communism = 5
						anarchy = 80
					}
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "Western European Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "Western European Tank"
						priority = 2
						regiments = {
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 4 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 0 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 1 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 2 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 3 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 4 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 0 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 1 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 2 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 3 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							light_tank_recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Western European Division\" division_template = \"Western European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Western European Division\" division_template = \"Western European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd Western European Division\" division_template = \"Western European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"4th Western European Division\" division_template = \"Western European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"5th Western European Division\" division_template = \"Western European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"6th Western European Division\" division_template = \"Western European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"7th Western European Division\" division_template = \"Western European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"8th Western European Division\" division_template = \"Western European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"9th Western European Division\" division_template = \"Western European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"10th Western European Division\" division_template = \"Western European Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st Western European Tank\" division_template = \"Western European Tank\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WAC
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd Western European Tank\" division_template = \"Western European Tank\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WAC

							division = "name = \"5th Western European Tank\" division_template = \"Western European Tank\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = WAC
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 50
		}
	}

	SOV_integrate_western_european_puppet = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_nationalism

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		available = {
			WAC = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
		}

		visible = {
			WAC = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_subject_of = SOV
				NOT = {
					tag = WAC
				}
				any_state = {
					is_core_of = WAC
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = FROM
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_form_the_communes_of_peoples
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_subject_of = SOV
				NOT = {
					tag = WAC
				}
				any_state = {
					is_core_of = WAC
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = FROM
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do =  {
			factor = 100
		}

		complete_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_generic.62 }
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_give_western_northern_anarchist_land = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_draw_up_staff_plans

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			WAC = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			any_state = {
				is_core_of = WAC
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			WAC = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			any_state = {
				is_core_of = WAC
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do =  {
			factor = 100
		}

		complete_effect = {
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = WAC
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					NOT = {
						is_core_of = SOV
					}
				}
				WAC = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_form_commune_south_western_asia_puppet = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_form_nation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {

		}

		available = {
			has_government = anarchy
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_form_commune_south_western_asia_available_tt
				must_owns_20_valid_south_western_asian_states_trigger_anarchist = yes
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				give_core_to_SWA_puppet = yes
			}
			SOV = {
				release_autonomy = {
					target = SWA
					autonomy_state = autonomy_russian_commune_people
					freedom_level = 0.5
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				SWA = {
					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Council of South West Asia"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/SOV/Portrait_Russia_Anarchist_Commune.dds"
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = anarchist
						traits = {

						}
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 5
						neutrality = 5
						fascism = 5
						communism = 5
						anarchy = 80
					}
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "South West Asian Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "South West Asian Tank"
						priority = 2
						regiments = {
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 4 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 0 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 1 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 2 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 3 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 4 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 0 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 1 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 2 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 3 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							light_tank_recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st South West Asian Division\" division_template = \"South West Asian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SWA
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd South West Asian Division\" division_template = \"South West Asian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SWA
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd South West Asian Division\" division_template = \"South West Asian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SWA
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"4th South West Asian Division\" division_template = \"South West Asian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SWA
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"5th South West Asian Division\" division_template = \"South West Asian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

		available = {
			AEA = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
		}

		visible = {
			AEA = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_subject_of = SOV
				NOT = {
					tag = AEA
				}
				any_state = {
					is_core_of = AEA
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = FROM
				}
			}
		}

		target_root_trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = SOV_form_the_communes_of_peoples
		}

		target_trigger = {
			FROM = {
				exists = yes
				is_subject_of = SOV
				NOT = {
					tag = AEA
				}
				any_state = {
					is_core_of = AEA
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = FROM
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do =  {
			factor = 100
		}

		complete_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = russia2_generic.64 }
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_give_eastern_asian_anarchist_land = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_draw_up_staff_plans

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			AEA = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			any_state = {
				is_core_of = AEA
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			AEA = {
				is_subject_of = SOV
			}
			any_state = {
				is_core_of = AEA
				is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
				NOT = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do =  {
			factor = 100
		}

		complete_effect = {
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = AEA
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					NOT = {
						is_core_of = SOV
					}
				}
				AEA = {
					transfer_state = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_form_commune_southern_eastern_asian_puppet = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_form_nation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		visible = {

		}

		available = {
			has_government = anarchy
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = SOV_form_commune_southern_eastern_asian_available_tt
				must_owns_20_valid_south_eastern_asian_states_trigger_anarchist = yes
			}
		}

		fire_only_once = yes

		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				give_core_to_SAE_puppet = yes
			}
			SOV = {
				release_autonomy = {
					target = SAE
					autonomy_state = autonomy_russian_commune_people
					freedom_level = 0.5
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				SAE = {
					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Council of South East Asia"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/SOV/Portrait_Russia_Anarchist_Commune.dds"
						expire = "1965.1.1"
						ideology = anarchist
						traits = {

						}
					}
					set_popularities = {
						democratic = 5
						neutrality = 5
						fascism = 5
						communism = 5
						anarchy = 80
					}
					inherit_technology = SOV
					division_template = {
						name = "South East Asian Division"
						priority = 1
						regiments = {
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
							infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
						}
						support = {
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					division_template = {
						name = "South East Asian Tank"
						priority = 2
						regiments = {
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 1 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 2 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 3 }
							light_armor = { x = 0 y = 4 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 0 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 1 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 2 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 3 }
							light_armor = { x = 1 y = 4 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 0 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 1 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 2 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 3 }
							motorized = { x = 2 y = 4 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 0 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 1 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 2 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 3 }
							motorized = { x = 3 y = 4 }
						}
						support = {
							light_tank_recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
							engineer = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						}
					}
					random_controlled_state = {
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"1st South East Asian Division\" division_template = \"South East Asian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SAE
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"2nd South East Asian Division\" division_template = \"South East Asian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SAE
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"3rd South East Asian Division\" division_template = \"South East Asian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SAE
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"4th South East Asian Division\" division_template = \"South East Asian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SAE
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"5th South East Asian Division\" division_template = \"South East Asian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SAE
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"6th South East Asian Division\" division_template = \"South East Asian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SAE
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"7th South East Asian Division\" division_template = \"South East Asian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
							owner = SAE
						}
						create_unit = {
							division = "name = \"8th South East Asian Division\" division_template = \"South East Asian Division\" start_experience_factor = 0.3 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"

SOV_anarchist_project_planning_league = {

	SOV_anarchist_project_civilian_industry_league = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_operation

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 6
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_doing_plan_anarchist_league
			}
		}

		days_re_enable = 140

		visible = {
			
		}

		modifier = {
			civilian_factory_use = 7
		}

		cost = 25

		days_remove = 70

		ai_will_do =  {
			factor = 25
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_doing_plan_anarchist_league
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_doing_plan_anarchist_league
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				}
				random_owned_state = {
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
					add_building_construction = {
						type = industrial_complex
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_anarchist_project_military_industry_league = {

		icon = GFX_decision_ger_military_buildup

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 6
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_doing_plan_anarchist_league
			}

		modifier = {

		}

			factor = 25
		}

			set_country_flag = is_doing_plan_anarchist_league
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_doing_plan_anarchist_league
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				}
				random_owned_state = {
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
					add_building_construction = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_anarchist_project_border_fortification_league = {

		icon = GFX_decision_hol_draw_up_staff_plans

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 19
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_doing_plan_anarchist_league
			}
		}

		days_re_enable = 210

		visible = {
			
		}

		modifier = {
			civilian_factory_use = 20
		}

		cost = 50

		days_remove = 140

		ai_will_do =  {
			factor = 25
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_doing_plan_anarchist_league
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_doing_plan_anarchist_league
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = PREV
						any_neighbor_state = {
							NOT = {
								is_core_of = PREV
								is_controlled_by = PREV
								any_country = {
									is_in_faction_with = SOV
									owns_state = PREV
								}
							}
						}	
					}
					add_building_construction = {
						type = bunker
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
						province = {
							all_provinces = yes
							limit_to_border = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_anarchist_project_dockyard_upgrade_league = {

		icon = GFX_decision_generic_merge_plant_ship

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 4
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = is_doing_plan_anarchist_league
			}
		}

		days_re_enable = 90

		visible = {
			
		}

		modifier = {
			civilian_factory_use = 5
		}

		cost = 50

		days_remove = 35

		ai_will_do =  {
			factor = 25
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_doing_plan_anarchist_league
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_doing_plan_anarchist_league
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					any_state = {
						is_coastal = yes
					}
				}
				random_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						is_coastal = yes
					}
					add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
					add_building_construction = {
						type = dockyard
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	SOV_anarchist_project_infrastructure_upgrade_league = {

		icon = GFX_decision_rubber

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 14
			NOT = {

			}
		}

		visible = {

		modifier = {
			civilian_factory_use = 15
		}

		cost = 50

		days_remove = 140

		ai_will_do =  {
			factor = 25
		}

		complete_effect = {
			set_country_flag = is_doing_plan_anarchist_league
		}

		remove_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = is_doing_plan_anarchist_league
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_road_of_league_free_tt
				hidden_effect = {
					every_state = {
						limit = {
							infrastructure < 5
							is_owned_and_controlled_by = PREV
						}
						add_building_construction = {
							type = infrastructure
							level = 1
							instant_build = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

SOV_release_contested_territory_league = {
	
	SOV_transfer_contested_territory_anarchism = {
		icon = GFX_decision_generic_decision

		allowed = {
			original_tag = SOV
		}

		available = {
			any_country = {
				NOT = {
					TAG = ROOT
				}
				is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				any_state = {
					is_owned_by = PREV
					NOT = {
						is_core_of = PREV
					}
				}
			}
		}

		visible = {
			
		}

		ai_will_do =  {
			factor = 2500
		}

		complete_effect = {
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					NOT = {
						TAG = ROOT
					}
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						is_owned_by = PREV
						NOT = {
							is_core_of = PREV
						}
					}
					ROOT = {
						transfer_state = PREV
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
